title: ARM - Master Admin - Set default terminal to receive notifications/ transactions
description: As a Master Admin, I would like to set which terminal is default*Case 1: I use feature "View As" or as a Master Admin to set default terminal*# I would see a new column named “Receive Notification” before column “Action”## For historical data:  the first terminal based on created date asc will be set as a default terminal automatically## I can set another terminal as the default##* I would receive a message “The current default terminal of <business name> is <the current default terminal name>. Would you like to replace it with terminal <new terminal name>?”##* Click Yes##** Display “<terminal name> has been set as the default terminal of <business name> successfully.” Refresh page and that terminal is checked when closing the pop-up.##** Display “<terminal name> has been set as the default terminal of <business name> unsuccessfully. Please try again.” → nothing changes when close the pop-up.##* Click Cancel → nothing changes when closing the pop-up.# *Mar 22, 2021 - Case 2: I deregister a default terminal:* #* If the merchant have > 1 terminal: the first terminal based on created date asc will be set as a default terminal automatically#* If the merchant have only one terminal: the merchant will not have any default terminal

title: [BE] External Sand Dollar Card - Upgrade Internal QR Code
description: *Upgrade Internal QR Code With New Pattern:*new PATTERN: xxxxxxxx.YYYxxxxxxxx: prefix as characterYYY: postfix as numberic

title: [iOS] - Kanoo App - Kanoo Users Scan External Merchant QR
description: As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to make a SD payment at any merchant that accept SD, include the ones are not in Kanoo system.I can process these features: Pay with card, Air Pay ( card details), Transfer money ( P2P)Validation for fields:* The system auto trim leading and trailing spaces before validating *Airpay in card details for a beneficiary not in Kanoo* # I access SD card details then select Scan to pay to scan beneficiary's QR ( beneficiary can be merchant or person)## *Feb 19, 2021*: I will be moved to another screen named is External Payment (reference UI) → I see QR value first with text “Recipient Address” then### If the scanned QR has an amount > 0#### I don't have to enter the amount. The field is grey-out and button “Continue” is enabled. -Field amount: only accept positive numbers and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integers. Max length is 10 character, I cannot type more-#### I can type memo, limit is 500 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details” ### If he scanned QR has an amount <=0 or blank#### I have to enter the amount. Field amount: only accept positive number and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integers. Max length is 10 characters, I cannot type more. Button Continue is enabled if the entered amount > 0#### I can type memo, limit is 500 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details”# Click Continue -> move to Enter PIN# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages# I have to pay the amount + convenience fee named "Sand Dollar Card - Convenience Fee" ( configured on Visipay). The balance will use the latest internal SD balance to process# I would see a successful screen ( reference UI) if payment successful or "An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service." if payment fail## If invalid QR code → message “Invalid QR code.”## If merchant does not have SD card: “The beneficiary does not exist. Please check the entered information then try again."# *Feb 2, 2021*: -I receive push notification "You have made an external payment on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external payment on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the payment is successful-# *Feb 2, 2021:* -I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)-# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" with fee in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI)# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance - paid amount - fee# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|smart-link] Git: Kanoo GitHub\\Kanoo Mobile App\\02-Concept\\Sand Dollar Card.xd

title: [CLOSED] - [BE] Kanoo App - External Merchants Scan Kanoo Users QR
description: *Pay with card for merchant not in Kanoo*# I access SD card details then give my QR to staff for scanning# I only receive push notification "You have made an external payment on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external payment on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the payment is successful# I have to pay the request amount + fee ( if have - configured from the merchant)# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI). The amount is including fee # The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen# KYC limitation is not applied# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)!image-20210118-031645 (130677db-340f-409a-8906-878b82092bd4).png|width=33%!

title: External Sand Dollar Card - Auto Sync Transaction
description: Whenever kanoo users or merchants transfer money with those who don't have Kanoo app, transactions must be recorded and sync automatically*Case 1: Sync all sand dollar transactions transferred to kanoo user or merchant on ARM and Visipay** External payment transaction are created, confirm on Visipay admin and ARM transaction make sure:** External amount and balance are correct.** Name category: External Payment** Correct beneficiary and remitter** Transactions are sorted descending by transaction time* Balance report is update correctly.*Case 2: Sync all sand dollar transactions transferred to kanoo user** External payment transaction are created, confirm Kanoo app make sure:** External amount is correct.** Name category: External Payment** Correct remitter** Transactions are sorted descending by transaction time* Balance is update correctly.* Receive notification.* KYC is not applied*Case 3: Receive Money in POS - Merchant transaction is synced by background job and POS pulls sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction after.*# Transaction is synced to Kanoo system.## External payment transaction is created and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM without staff and terminal info.# POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction## Sand dollar transaction is displayed on POS screen.## Staff confirm transaction successfully.## Transaction is displayed on Transactions menu on POS.## Make sure 1 external payment transaction is created.## Exernal payment transaction is updated and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM with staff and terminal info.*Case 4: Receive Money in POS - POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction before merchant transaction is synced by background job.*# POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction## Sand dollar transaction is displayed on POS screen.## Staff confirm transaction successfully.## Transaction is displayed on Transactions menu on POS.## Exernal payment transaction is created and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM with staff and terminal info.# Waiting for background job sync sand dollar transaction run completely.## Make sure 1 external payment transaction is created.## Staff and terminal info is kept on external transaction.## *Case 5: Kanoo users and merchants continuously receive money from external** Receive transactions based on sending times.

title: [CLOSED] - [iOS] - Kanoo App - External Merchants Scan Kanoo Users QR
description: *Pay with card for merchant not in Kanoo*# I access SD card details then give my QR to staff for scanning# I only receive push notification "You have made an external payment on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external payment on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the payment is successful# I have to pay the request amount + fee ( if have - configured from the merchant)# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI). The amount is including fee # The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen# KYC limitation is not applied# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)!image-20210118-031645 (44238f3d-2d42-4afd-b508-3dead92eae87).png|width=33%!

title: PWK - Internal SD Payment, Gifted Cash Card
description: As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to make payments with my SD card for feature PWK.*Case 1: I pay with Kanoo Cash Card*# After login successfully, I would see below information ( reference UI)# I can get back to login pay# My cash card is used by default, it shows information ( refference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page# I enter PIN then continue the payment like the current process.*Case 2: I pay with Gift Cash Card*# After login successfully, I would see below information ( reference UI)# I can get back to login pay# My cash card is used by default, it shows information ( refference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page# I click change to list all my current cards#* If this merchant does not accept gift cash card, I wont see it in the list#* If this merchnat accept gift cash card, it shows information ( refference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page# I select gift cash card -> close the list -> chosen card replace the current card# I enter PIN then continue the payment like the current process.# Balances and transaction are updated on App ( wallet, transaction history and latest transaction), ARM (balance, transaction) and Visipay ( reserve account, transaction, cash card) correctly*Case 3: I pay with SD*# After login successfully, I would see below information ( reference UI)# I can get back to login pay# My cash card is used by default, it shows information ( refference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page# I click change to list all my current cards# I select SD card -> close the list -> chosen card replace the current card# I enter PIN then continue the payment like the current process.#* Check KYC hold limitation for merchant -> I get a pop-up with message "Cannot process the transaction. Merchant has reached the maximum holdings. Please contact the Merchant administrator for support.” → cancel the process#* Check KYC transaction limitation based on my SD's card level -> I get a pop-up with message "You cannot transact more than $<number> a month.” or “You cannot transact more than $<number> a year.” → cancel the process#* If the merchant does not have SD card -> I get a pop-up with message "The Sand Dollar card is temporarily not supported for this merchant. Please try with another card.”# Balances and transaction are updated on App ( wallet, transaction history and latest transaction), ARM (balance, transaction) and Visipay ( reserve account, transaction, SD card) correctly!image-20210120-060453.png|width=33.33333333333333%!UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3bf107e8-64e5-4fe9-9414-0d023d4a56a2-6ea2/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3bf107e8-64e5-4fe9-9414-0d023d4a56a2-6ea2/|smart-link] Git: Kanoo GitHub\\Kanoo Mobile App\\05-Export\\Bill Pays\\Pay with Kanoo.xd

title: KZ site - Internal Sand Dollar Payment, Gifted Cash Card
description: As a consumer who has a SD card, I can use my SD card to pay my order on KZ site or school menuAt “Cart” page# *Case 1: I pay with Kanoo Cash Card*## My cash card is used by default, it shows information ( reference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page## I enter PIN then continue the payment like the current process.## The order will be created and show on the chosen POS ( reuse the current flow)## The order will be created on App ( reuse the current flow)# *Case 2: I pay with Gift Cash Card*## My cash card is used by default, it shows information ( reference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page## I click change to list all my current cards##* If this merchant does not accept gift cash card, I wont see it in the list##* If this merchant accept gift cash card, it shows information ( reference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page## I select gift cash card -> close the list -> chosen card replace the current card## I enter PIN then continue the payment like the current process.## Balances and transaction are updated on App ( wallet, transaction history and latest transaction), ARM (balance, transaction) and Visipay ( reserve account, transaction, cash card) correctly## The order will be created and show on the chosen POS ( reuse the current flow)## The order will be created on App ( reuse the current flow)# *Case 3: I pay with SD*## My cash card is used by default, it shows information ( reference UI), the balance at the time I get to this page## I click change to list all my current cards## I select SD card -> close the list -> chosen card replace the current card## I enter PIN then continue the payment like the current process.##* Check KYC hold limitation for merchant -> I get a pop-up with message "Cannot process the transaction. Merchant has reached the maximum holdings. Please contact the Merchant administrator for support.” → cancel the process##* Check KYC transaction limitation based on my SD's card level -> I get a pop-up with message "You cannot transact more than $<number> a month.” or “You cannot transact more than $<number> a year.” → cancel the process##* If the merchant does not have SD card -> I get a pop-up with message "The Sand Dollar card is temporarily not supported for this merchant. Please try with another card.”## Balances and transaction are updated on App ( wallet, transaction history and latest transaction), ARM (balance, transaction) and Visipay ( reserve account, transaction, SD card) correctly## The order will be created and show on the chosen POS ( reuse the current flow)## The order will be created on App ( reuse the current flow)UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6e983c7f-b98a-44ab-9b47-227c1f5a3198-3bcb/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6e983c7f-b98a-44ab-9b47-227c1f5a3198-3bcb/|smart-link] Git: Kanoo Mobile App\\05-Export\\KANOO-2339 Single Merchant Sale Site\\Another Payment Method

title: BE - Kanoo App - Message notification
description: As a Kanoo user experiencing Message feature, I should have the ability to receive push notifications of new messages. The main goal of this push notifications is to help users to avoid missing mesages that may be crucial to them.*Acceptance Criteria:** *Every time* someone sends one message to me, I should receive a push notification that “<sender full name> sent you a message“. For instance, “David Kenny sent you a message”. Clicking on this notification directly leads me to that channel * *Every time* someone in a chat group sends one message to me, I should receive a push notification that “<full name of sender in that group > sent you a message“. For instance, “David Kenny sent you a message”. Clicking on this notification directly leads me to that channel * I receive push notification in cases below** Kanoo app is running in background** I’m staying at Kanoo app in screens** In Message Screen, I can NOT receive push notif of the one that I have been chatting with but I can receive push notif of others.* Ensure that I’m also able to see this notification in lock screen as other notifications, assuming that I’m being logged in Kanoo app* This notification is NOT stored in Notification page+_Notification Settings_+* When going to Notification Setting page then turning on “All Notifications“, I can receive any push notifications as normal. title: Card Deletion - Enhance Flow and UI
description: As a Kanoo consumer, I get confused after I delete my credit cards then add them again, I get message that this card is already in the system.a. The current flow: consumer delete a card on app → Visipay admin delete that card → that card is completely deleted from the systemb. The enhance flow:# After deleting card successfully on app → the card is completely deleted from the system → I receive message “Your credit card is deleted successfully.” → close the pop-up → back to card list → I can not see it on the list# Being verified fail over 3 times → the card is completely deleted from the system → I receive message “You have entered wrong amount all 3 times. The Credit card will be deleted.” → close the pop-up → back to card list → I can not see it on the list   3. Delete unsuccessfully → I receive message “Your credit card is deleted unsuccessfully. Please try again or contact customer service.”   4. This card can not be found on Visipay. Remove function delete credit card on Visipay   5. Old transactions are recorded.

Ex: Wednesday 09/30/2020**** Delivery Time/ Pickup Time - required field:: a dropdown list shows the time that the customer will receive his/ her order. Format hh:mm. The next period is chosen by default.**** Pickup Address - required field: list all branches of the store and sorted by alphabet. Can only select one. The first one in the list will be chosen by default ***** Address: must-have***** Phone: optional. Format +1242156789**** *Sep 16, 2020:* Button Confirm → click to turn off the pop-up → entered data will be saved for all cases ( refresh the page, change the delivery method,..) until the confirm button is clicked again***** If a required field is left blank, a red text below “This field is required.”***** If the email is invalid, a red text below the field “Invalid email address format.”*** {color:#ff5630}If selects Pay now {color}{color:#ff5630}*Sep 26, 2020:*{color}**** For logged in user → save as delivery option**** For guest: pop-up required phone and email → button confirm → validate like the current processes*** Click Delivery Method again **** Select the previous option → open the pop up to edit → click button confirm to save**** Select another option → the customer must enter all information** *Sep 3, 2020*: -Add Datetime Picker into Pickup or Delivery method-* *\[Sep 01, 2020]* When User click on “Proceed to Checkout” button. It is disabled by default if the customer has not selected a delivery method or the cart is empty:** *Sep 16, 2020:* If quantity input is greater than the available amount or equal to 0, red text below the product “Quantity must be between 0 and <max quatity>”** *Sep 8, 2020*: if the product(s) is out of stock, a pop-up with content “Some items are out of stock. Would you like to remove them?”*** Click Yes to turn off the pop-up and removed out of stock items, stay at the shopping cart page*** Click Cancel to turn off the pop-up and stay at the shopping cart page** Open a pop-up “Checkout with Kanoo”*** Content “Please login to check out with Kanoo”*** Text field “Email”*** Text field “Password”*** Button Log In → click to validate**** If a text field is left blank, a red text below the blank field “This field is required.”**** *Sep 16, 2020:* If enter incorrect email, a red text below the email field “This email address is not registered with Kanoo, please correct it or create a new account.”**** If enter incorrect password, a red text below the password field “You have entered an invalid password. Attemped <number>/5”**** If enter over limitation, turn off the current pop-up then open a new one named “Error” with content “Your account has been locked. Please contact your Administrator.” → click OK → return to the home page and view the site as guess. Once being locked, the user can not log in on App and forced to log out ( if currently in app).**** If login successfully, move to the “Confirm Purchase” page*** Option “Check out as guess” → move to page (Follow ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2344|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2344|smart-link] )** The “Confirm Purchase” page will appear if user has logged in (Follow ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2345|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2345|smart-link] )** If the cart is empty → show content “There are no items in your cart”** -Show “Select Checkout method” popup to Guest. (Follow ticket- [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2344|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2344|smart-link] -)-* *Sep 3, 2020:* *-\[Sep 01, 2020]-* -If quantity input is greater than the available amount, show an error inline “Maximum purchase quantity is <Available amount>. Please check your cart.”-

title: KZ Home Page
description: * Reuse the existing screens of the web app.** Store detail but show konnect zone only.** Don’t show anything related to the tenant but use merchant’s details.** -Hide the flow of showing gift cards and we will define this flow for this new site in phase 2.-** *-\[Sep 01, 2020]-* -Remove \[Buy Gift Card] button and hide Gift Card category in KZ to Guest. It’s only visible to Kanoo User.-** *Sep 8, 2020*: Remove \[Buy Gift Card] button and hide Gift Card category in KZ** *\[Sep 01, 2020]* Campaign section will show information (include Campaign description). Only Kanoo’s User can add these campaigns to their Wallet. “Add to Wallet” button is hidden for Guest.** *\[Sep 01, 2020]* Show all active promotions. Hide Like, Comment, Share features.** *-\[Sep 01, 2020]-* -Add search box On top of the site, search by all products across the KZ (all categories).-*** *Sep 3, 2020*: allows searching by product options, name. “Search products…” by default. Only search for categories type Product** *-\[Sep 01, 2020]-* -Add Sign in button on top of the site- ** *Sep 3, 2020*: Add icon avatar next to the icon cart, click to open a list:*** Sign in: show if the user has been not logged in → click to open a pop-up → click “x” to turn off the pop up**** Title: Log In to Kanoo **** Text field “Email”**** Text field “Password”**** *Sep 16, 2020:* Button Log In → click to validate***** If a text field is left blank, a red text below the blank field “This field is required.”***** If enter an incorrect email, a red text below the email field “This email address is not registered with Kanoo, please correct it or create a new account.”***** If enter an incorrect password, a red text below the password field “You have entered an invalid password. Attemped <number>/5”***** *Sep 21, 2020*: If the login account is not a consumer, red text with content "You cannot login using this email because it has been registered for other purposes."***** *Sep 21, 2020*: If enter over limitation, -turn off the current pop-up then open a new one named “Error”- red text with content “Your account has been locked. Please contact your Administrator.” → click OK → return to the home page and view the site as a guess. Once being locked, the user can not log in on App and forced to log out ( if currently in-app).*** Log out: show if the user has been logged in  → open a pop-up “Log Out” with content “Are you sure you want to Log Out?”**** Click Yes → return to the home page and view the site as guess**** Click Cancel → turn off the pop-up.* *Sep 3, 2020*: Customers will see** Business information *** Business logo: on the top left of the web and the bottom left→ click will back to the home page*** Business banner*** Business address: the registered address*** Ratings: remove “View Ratings”*** Distance from the Business location to customer location. Format <decimal number> miles away.*** *Sep 7, 2020*: click View More to see list of Branches. Default show 5 branches. Scale to fit if the branches <=5. Allow scrolling*** Directions: click to pop-up a map, customers can zoom in and out, the store is marked.*** % off*** Hours open*** Business category and sub-category*** Phone: format +1242012345** Campaign:*** List all active campaigns of the KZ. Default show 6 campaigns sorted by the latest creation date. Allow swiping to see more.*** Image*** Name*** Value*** Expiration date: format “Offer Until: mm/dd/yyyy”*** Button “Add to Wallet” → click then change to “Already in Wallet”. This button only show for registered user** Categories: list all active categories in KZ, sorted by alphabet. Categories gift card will be hidden -for guesses.-** Promotions: show all active promotions ( image, video), sorted by the latest creation date. No actions like, comment, shares.** Footer links: home, Disclaimers, T&C, Privacy Policy, Contact Us → click to open a new page with corresponding links.** Copyright 2020 - <domain name> - All Rights Reserved*Note:** All campaigns and promotions have set rules. when a guess accesses the link, he/ she would not see those campaigns and promotions.* KZ is active but its start date is a future date will be considered as an inactive KZ.

title: ARM Merchant - Konnect Zone - Configure and Generate Store Link
description: As a merchant I want to have an own site for my konnect zone so that customers can browser and purchase my products there while there is another option for me to sell my products under marketplaces (tenants).* *\[Sep 01, 2020]* The KZ link is one time generated. The link is not modifiable.* *Sep 3, 2020*: There are 2 links:** The first link named “Store Link”: this is the link generated by the system, it is considered as KZ’s id and cannot be changed*** *Sep 16, 2020:* Format: [https:/domain/kz/|https://domain/kz/code-or-id]xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx . “xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx” will be filled after creating a KZ successfully.**** A text below “Store Link” with content “This is a unique link generated by the system for your business website. Changing it is not allowed.”*** *Sep 7, 2020*: click on the link to copy, a tooltip appears with content “Copied”*** *Sep 10, 2020*: **** -If the merchant tries to edit the link → Click “Finished: Save to my Konnect Zone Manager\!” → red text with content “This field cannot be changed."-**** When creating a new KZ, no buttons in 2 links** The second link named “Alternative Link” this is the link generated by the system and can be changed by the merchant*** *Sep 16, 2020*: a text below “Alternative link” with content “This alternative link is can be used as a friendly URL for easy typing directly into the browser. It’s modifiable but should only contains alphanumeric characters(a-z0-9), dash symbol(-), and has to be unique for all of our merchants. Ex: https://DomainName/kz/mcdonald-arizona.”*** *Sep 16, 2020*: Format: [https://domain/kz/|https://domain/kz/code-or-id]xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx. “xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx” will be filled after creating a KZ successfully and exactly like the “Store Link”. No limit length and not allow space. Not allow entering by default *** *Sep 10, 2020*: When updating a KZ, display buttons “Save”  and “Cancel”** *-Sep 7, 2020:-* -click the button “Edit” → the field will be editable → replace the button Update with 2 buttons Save and Cancel-** *Sep 9, 2020*: the system will check if the new link is duplicated with any links in the system, displays a red text with content “This link has already been used. Please enter a different one.”** *Sep 7, 2020*: click Cancel to return the previous link value** *-Sep 7, 2020-*-: Save success → replace the buttons Save and Cancel with the button Edit-* Remove option Private.* *Sep 16, 2020*: click “Save” to save the updated info:** Update successfully, pop-up with content “The alternative link has been updated successfully.”** Update unsuccessfully, pop-up with content “The alternative link has been updated unsuccessfully. Please try again.”** If the “Editable” is left blank → click “Save”→ red text below “This field is required.”** If the link contains space → click “Save”→ red text below “The name part of the alternative link only allows alphabet characters(a-z) or dash symbol(-). Ex: [https://Domain|https://domain/]Name/kz/mcdonald-arizona.”* *Sep 16, 2020*: the merchant can upload image used as his/ her website’s banner at “Banner Image Link” area, the system will check the uploaded file:** If upload an unsupported file, pop-up with content “This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file." → click OK to turn off the pop-up and cancel the uploading.** If upload an unsupported image’s size, pop-up with content “This image's width exceeds the allowable limitation ( 1920px)." or “This image's height exceeds the allowable limitation ( 350px).” or both→ click OK to turn off the pop-up and cancel the uploading.** If upload over 50MB, pop-up with content “This image exceeds the allowable limitation ( 50MB).” → click OK to turn off the pop-up and cancel the uploading.* *Sep 7, 2020:* -I have “Copy” button to copy the links when they are available to use.-

title: Spike - Cashback Point with percentage
description: Investigate code and review:# Current code to config the point cash back# Current code to calculate the point cash back when user make the payment# All related API that is using for the point cash back feature

title: [BE] Checkout - Display Cashback Rewards in Confirm Payment
description: We need to show points rewarded for the order in the checkout process to customer, if the merchant has offer for cashback reward in points.Cashback Rewards are applied for the payment types below by Kash Kard and Credit Card as well:* Purchase order (Buy product)* Purchase gift card.* Pay at store.* Make payment via AirPay with the QR code of merchant at store.* Make payment for an unpaid order at store.* Pay with \[tenant] widgetScreens applied: Confirm Payment screen!image-20210728-143751.png|width=285,height=476!Note:* The amount that will be used to calculate the point reward is the final amount user pay (exclude cause2fund amount).** For example: Sub-total: 10; Tax: 1; Gift card: -2; Coupon: -3; Point used: -4; Cause2Fund.** => Amount = 10+1-2-3-4 = 2. the point reward will be calculate base on $2* Point Cashback Percentage calculator** Exchange point: 1USD = 100pts** Cashback points = (Purchase Amount *_Cashback Percentage)*_100pts** For example, if your cashback percentage is 5% and you spend $8.40 on your KK, you will get Cashback Reward = (8.4*0.05)*100 = 42 points

title: [iOS] Notify prevents withdrawals from 7UT to ETH
description: * Update for Hyt app: Some HYT users are sending 7UT to ETH wallets using the “withdraw” feature. We should post a notice that they have to read and dismiss every time before making any transfer.When user click “withdraw” button, we will show:*English*{{Withdrawing your 7UT tokens is an irreversible action. Make sure the address you are sending to is capable of holding 7UT tokens. Sending to any other address including your ETH wallet address will result in a permanent loss of your 7UT tokens.}}*Spanish:*{{Retirar sus tokens 7UT es una acción irreversible.  Asegúrese de que la dirección a la que está enviando sea capaz de contener tokens 7UT.  El envío a cualquier otra dirección, incluida la dirección de su billetera ETH, resultará en la pérdida permanente de sus tokens 7UT}}*Let’s update this in the app and force update all HYT customers** Update text for all Kard app“Business Address” instead of "Address"”Dirección de Negocios” instead of “Dirección”Step to view it: Wallet → Select Kash Kard → Load → Fund with Bank Account → View Instruction!image-20210720-102534.png|width=1125,height=1821!!image-20210720-104603.png|width=334,height=643!

title: [FE][BE] - Configure Cashback Point with Fixed-value and Percentage
description: As a merchant admin, I want to be able to configure Point Cashback with fixed-value and percentage for my store on ARM.+*AC:*+* Access new tab Cashback Rules after Promotions tab of Campaigns screen.** *_Discount_**** Customers will pay for the amount after the discount.*** By default, the amount field is 0%.** *_Point Reward:_* Customers pay for the full amount (except C2F amount) and get points rewarded to their point balance to redeem for later order or exchange to reward Mastercard.** I can see the point balance to configure Reward Value reasonably** I can add more rows if I want, after adding the list of rows will be sorted from the smallest to largest.*** _Value Type: display combo box with 2 options: Fixed-value and Percentage. Default: Percentage_**** User can select _Fixed-value_ or Percentage**** By default, the amount of each line shown as View mode (the fields will be grey out).*** _Pay At Least:_**** User needs to pay at least an certain amount to get cashback point to wallet. This amount should be the final amount which user has to pay for any payment types.**** The amounts of each row must be different from each other and the system will select one range matching to pay amount to apply the cashback rule. If two rows have the same amount, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“This cashback rule is existing.“_*{color}**** I can add more rows if I want, after adding the list of rows will be sorted from the smallest to largest.*** _Cashback Amount:_ This is the number of points for Point Reward. The number must be larger than 0, if not showing the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Amount must be larger than 0.“_*{color}**** When Value Type is Fixed-value, default is 0 point(s)**** When Value Type is Percentage, default is 0 %**** Error handling:***** If the value is 0 or empty, display message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Amount must be larger than 0.“_*{color}***** If the value is equal to the previous value, display message: “{color:#00b8d9}*_Cashback Amount value is existing“_*{color}*** _Edit button:_ On clicking, the page should be changed to Edit mode, Edit button is replaced by Save and Cancel buttons.****  After editing:***** Save: on clicking, the new change is applied and the list of rules will be sorted again.****** Success message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was saved successfully.“_*{color}****** Failed message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was saved unsuccessfully.“_*{color}***** Cancel: on clicking, the page should be changed to View mode only.**** Error handling:***** If the value is 0 or empty, display message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Amount must be larger than 0.“_*{color}***** If the updated value is equal to the remaining value, display message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Amount value is existing“._* {color}*** _Delete button:_ On clicking, show a confirmation pop-up (the UI will be as same as the current UI of ARM pop-up):**** Title: *Delete Cashback Reward***** Message: *_Are you sure to delete this cashback reward?_***** Buttons:***** Yes: Close the pop-up, the row is gone.****** Success message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was deleted successfully.“_*{color}****** Failed message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was deleted unsuccessfully.“_*{color}***** No: Close the pop-up only.Here’s the mockup[^Cashback Points.pdf]

title: Flutter - Marketplace - Store Details - Gift Card tab
description: *AC:*On Store details screen, I can see the Gift cards tabTapping on this opens Gift card list screen, list of all gift cards which are approved and active from that store in the system* Each gift card displayed here must belong to at least one Konnect Category of this active Konnect Zone* -I can filter gift card with category by the filter icon on the Search field:-** -On clicking the icon, show the list of categories screen.-** -I can select/deselect one or multiple categories to filter.-** -I can search by category name. If there are not any categories of no results when searching, show the message- *-_“No Categories Found.“_-*** -For each selected category, it will be highlighted.-** -I can tap the Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to the Gift card tab.-** -Filter icon should be highlighted and colored if I am using the filter.-** -Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Products-* -By default, I will see the list of Gift cards from all categories (-*-All-*-).-* I can search gift card by gift card name:** I can search with any words, characters, or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keywords.** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online, and Products.* By default, the list of the gift cards will be sorted by create/ modified date, -the value range pricing and price(highest to lowest)-, discount percentage (high to low), if multiple gift cards have the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).* If no gift card is available or no matched searching/filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No Gift Cards found.“_*{color}.* For each gift card, I want to see:** Gift card image** The value of a gift card** Gift card name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use an ellipsis if the name is too long.* On tapping a gift card, I can see the detail screen.

title: Flutter - Marketplace - Store Details - Products tab
description: *AC:*On Store details screen, I can see the Products tabTapping on it opens Product list screen, these are all products of that store* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category* I can search product by product name** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Home, Products and Gift card in store details* I can filter product with product category by the filter icon on Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the Filter Product screen.*** In this screen, separating 2 sections:*** Category: Tapping on this opens Select Category screen**** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.**** I can search by category name. In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_***** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.** Filter icon should be highlighted and colored if I am using filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Home, Products and Gift card in store details*** Sort by: I can sort product list by**** Latest: sorting product list by latest created date**** Price:***** Lowest to Highest***** Highest to Lowest*** By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).*** For the sort buttons (Latest, Price), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.** I can tap Clear button on Filter screen to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories and sort by will be unselected and reloaded, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.** If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Product image** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* User can scroll down to view all products

title: GreenCom - Add some google analytic code to consumer web site
description: The first code is for Google Analytics (GA). Having this code on site is going to allow us to collect a virtual cornucopia of data; which we can later use to identify who's visiting/where they're from/what they are doing/etc. Copy and paste this code as the first item into the <head> of every webpage you want to track - depending on the site, this will likely be in a header.php or something similar (the webdev will know).{noformat}<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics --><script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-200276065-1"></script><script>  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}  gtag('js', new Date());  gtag('config', 'UA-200276065-1');</script>{noformat}Part 1: have the webdev paste this code as high in the <head> of the page as possible:{noformat}<!-- Google Tag Manager --><script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src='https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-M3SDWV2');</script><!-- End Google Tag Manager -->{noformat}Part 2: have the webdev pastethis code immediately after the opening <body> tag:{noformat}<!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript) --><noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-M3SDWV2"height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript><!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->{noformat}{color:#ff5630}*Apply these code for PRODUCTION only*{color}

title: [BE] - Integrate with JoyID API to detect unqualified documents
description: The goal is to detect unqualified documents in the image, so that it can be prevented from the beginning. Ideally, detection should happen in real time, so that the user can interactively move the camera to capture the best image possible. *AC:*While submitting KYC, I want my document to be detected * When document has low image quality:** For passport, display message: Poor scanned image quality. Please try again** For ID card, Diver’s License, Residence Permit*** When scanning the front side, display message: The front of image has poor quality. Please try again*** When scanning the back side, display message: The back of image has poor quality. Please try again* When the image of document is not identity document, display message: There was an error submitting your identity document. We can only accept original documents to verify your KYC. Please try again

title: [Backend] Display Transaction ID on Prime Trust portal
description: As a Team Support user, I want to see the Transaction ID displayed on PT portal, so that I can check on it more quickly*AC:*Accessing Prime Trust portal site ([https://sandbox.cloud-login.primetrust.com/|https://sandbox.cloud-login.primetrust.com/|smart-link] ). Clicking on any user’s account on the list of users, the transaction list of a user displayed.Clicking on View button of a transaction, I can see Transaction ID displayed in Reference in Transaction details viewThese type of Transaction should display Transaction ID:* Loading money(Crypto to KK, KK to Crypto)* -External payment-  !image-20210707-074218.png|width=1373,height=773!

title: [Backend] - User loads money for Kash Kard from cryptocurrency wallet
description: *AC:** After loading successfully, the money flow of cryptocurrency directly goes to Prime Trust, meanwhile the money (no fee) will go through to user’s KK** Prime Trust fee will be kept at Prime Trust** Reserve account will receive Markup earn (if it’s configured on Visipay) and Crypto fee in cryptocurrency* In case of the small amount (under $10.00), the money flow of cryptocurrency will go through to Reserve account as the current** The UI should not change in this case* Prime Trust fee, Markup earn, Crypto fee should be deducted from cryptocurrency wallet.!image-20210706-083639.png|width=352,height=458!The items should be saved on DB:* Mark-up %* VK fee %* VK fixed fee* Fee VAT %* PT rate (include PT fee)* Mark-up rate (Displayed rate)* Mark-up earn* VK Fee* VK Fee VAT* Total VK Fee* Total VK earn* You pay* You receive*Error handling:** If transaction fails due to lacking of money in PT/ unknown error occurred, display message: *_“Unable to load money. Please try again later“._* The Crypto fee and Markup earn that were transferred to Reserve Account will be returned to user immediately.* If the user does not have enough quantity or money, display message: "*Your card does not have enough money. Please choose another card*"

title: [Backend] - User loads money for cryptocurrency wallet from Kash Kard.
description: *AC:** After loading successfully, the money flow in USD should go directly to Prime Trust, meanwhile the quantity of cryptocurrency will go through to user’s cryptocurrency wallet** Prime Trust fee will be kept at Prime Trust** Reserve account will receive Markup earn (if it’s configured on Visipay) and Crypto fee in USD* In case of the small amount (under $10.00), the money flow  will go through to Reserve account as the current** The new UI should not change in this case* Prime Trust fee, Markup earn, Crypto fee should be deducted from KK.!image-20210706-083618.png|width=33.33333333333333%!The items should be saved on DB:* Mark-up %* VK fee %* VK fixed fee* Fee VAT %* PT rate (include PT fee)* Mark-up rate (Displayed rate)* Mark-up earn* VK Fee* VK Fee VAT* Total VK Fee* Total VK earn* You pay* You receive*Error handling:** If transaction fails due to lacking of money in PT/ unknown error occurred, display message: *_“Unable to load money. Please try again later“._* The Crypto fee and Markup earn that were transferred to Reserve Account will be returned to user immediately.* If the user does not have enough quantity or money, display message: "*Your card does not have enough money. Please choose another card*"

title: [FE] - Guest - Delivery method
description: *AC:*Clicking on *“Select“* displays Select Delivery Method modal with 3 methods: Pickup, Delivery, Pay Now* Pickup: selecting Pickup displays a modal including following things ** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal** Full Name** Phone Number** Email: This is added for guest mode** Pickup Date** Pickup Time** Pickup Address: display all locations of that merchant** *“Confirm”* button*** When clicking on the button, we apply the same validation rules as in case of logged user*** After clicking on this button, the modal is closed. Now, *“Select“* text link is changed into *“Pickup”** Delivery: selecting Delivery displays a modal including following things** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal** Full Name** Phone Number** Email: This is added for guest mode** Shipping Address** Receive Order Method: includes 2 radios buttons*** Scan QR Code (displayed as default)*** Leave At Door** Delivery Date: display date-picker** Delivery Time: display time milestones** “Confirm” button*** When clicking on the button, we apply the same validation rules as in case of logged user*** After clicking on the button, the modal is closed. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Scan QR Code” or “Leave At Door“ depending on my selected Receive Order Method.* Pay Now: selecting Pay Now displays a modal including following things: these fields are added for guest mode only** Phone Number** Email** “Confirm” button*** If the phone number is not entered, clicking on “Confirm“ button displays message “Please input phone number“*** If the email is an invalid format, clicking on “Confirm“ button displays message “Invalid email address format.“*** If the email is not entered, clicking on “Confirm“ button displays message “Please input email address“*** After clicking on the button, the modal is closed. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Pay Now”* If I enter Delivery or Pickup or Pay Now information then log in, after login all information is clear so that I have to select Delivery Method again

title: [BE] Web App - Guest - Confirm & Payment
description: As a guest experiencing Greencom products, I should have the ability to check out based on what I have added to shopping cart.*Acceptance Criteria:*+*_Login form_*+* After logging in successfully, I navigate back to shopping cart. Clicking on *“Proceed to checkout“* button navigates to Confirm & Payment screen. This works expectedly as in case of logged user* After payment is complete** It leads me to Complete page including Order ID displayed. There is “Great\!” button. Clicking on this works as normal.** Order: the product should be saved in Orders** Transactions: it records transaction in  Web & Mobile Apps, Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, VK/Tenant Admin*** Transaction Type: Card Purchase+*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ +_button_+* If I do not have an account, selecting +*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ is a quickly better solution.* Selecting this keeps me on *“Confirm Purchase“* screen, includes following things:!image-20210702-010827.png|width=29.953051643192484%!** Delivery Method: _this is the same behavior and UI as in case of logged user_ [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5246|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5246|smart-link] ** Sub total** Tax** You pay** Payment Method: *** Selecting this opens Credit card information pop-up (_this is the same behavior and UI as in case of logged user)_** Only when a delivery method is selected, *“Confirm Payment“* button is appeared and disabled until the user has already confirmed payment method.* After payment is complete* It leads me to Complete page including following things: ** There are a button “Great\!“. Clicking on this navigates to Marketplace.** The text: *** Thank you for ordering via Coffee House.We have received your order number #210702UPE8Kindly check your order status via email.!image-20210702-010209.png|width=33.33333333333333%!* Transactions: it records transaction in  Visipay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, VK/Tenant Admin/ CRS** Transaction Type: Card Purchase* On Confirm & Payment screen, if I log in by Login option from the top menu, it navigates back to Shopping Cart so that I have to proceed to checkout again.* On Complete screen, if I log in by Login option from the top menu, it navigates back to Marketplace

title: [BE] - Guest - Order Status Emails
description: As a guest making payment in Greencom site, I’m able to receive emails about my order status. This help guest keep track of how the status of order is.*Acceptance Criteria:*After completing an order as guest, I receive emails based on delivery methods* Pick up orders: there is always an email sent in cases below** When the order is just created, status is New. This is new email enhanced *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been created“*** When the order status is changed to Preparing *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been preparing“*** When the order status is changed to Ready (the email here includes a QR code and character code to confirm pick-up) *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been ready“*** When the order status is changed to Completed *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been completed“** Delivery orders: there is always an email sent in cases below** When the order is just created, status is New. This is new email enhanced *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been created“*** When the order status is changed to Preparing** When the order status is changed to Ready** When the order status is changed to Shipping (the email here includes a QR code and character code to confirm delivery)** When the order status is changed to Completed* Pay Now Order** When the order is made payment successfully, status is Completed. This is new email enhanced *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been completed“*Email subject is “*Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] is now ready for \[status]*“*Email Template:*!image-20210630-123733.png|width=534,height=522!*Note:* For guest, do *not* display _“Click_ [_here_|https://kard-staging.kardsys.com/admin/order/210630K1AW] _to view your order at Greencom“_

title: Web App - Guest Workflow - Handle the payment validation
description: When guest makes payments by credit card, there is validation message enhancement*Acceptance Criteria:** When making failed payments, display message “We could not verify your payment details, try a different card or contact customer service.“* When AVS failed, display message “Your billing address could not be verified. Please contact your bank.”* When using invalid Credit Card Number, display message “ The card number entered is invalid.”* When entering CVV incorrect, display message “The card authentication data is incorrect.“* When server is not allowed, display message “This card is not supported. Please contact your bank.”* When transaction has been declined, display message “Your transaction has been declined. Please contact your bank.”* In case of insufficient funds, display message “Your transaction has been declined because of insufficient funds. Please contact your bank.”* When credit card token is expired, display message “The card authentication data is incorrect.“* In case of any other reason “We could not verify your payment details. Please try a different card or contact your bank.”

title: [BE] Web App - Guest - Shopping Cart
description: As a guest experiencing Greencom Web platform, I should be able to access shopping cart where I can get a review of selected products. Shopping carts bridge the gap between shopping and buying, so having the shopping cart is extremely important to both guests and logged users*Acceptance Criteria:** There is shopping cart icon on the navigation bar. Clicking on the icon goes to Shopping Cart page where I can view added products* Re-use logics of shopping cart from [\[KP-990] Backend - Save Shopping Cart - Jira (atlassian.net)|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-990]* When I click on *“Proceed to checkout“* button in shopping cart, there is a pop-up displayed, including Login form, *“Checkout as a Guest”* button+*_Login form_*+* This is the form that I can enter my account to make payment ** I can also register as a new user to make payment * The validation is the same as the normal login form* After logging in successfully, I navigate back to shopping cart. Clicking on *“Proceed to checkout“* button navigates to Confirm & Payment screen. This works expectedly as in case of logged user. [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|smart-link] +*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ +_button_+* If I do not have an account, selecting +*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ is a quickly better solution.* Selecting this navigates to *“Confirm Purchase“* screen [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|smart-link] +_Rules for calculating the number of added products_+* As a guest, refreshing page always keeps added products. For instance, a guest has added 4 products then the shopping cart is refreshed. Guest still sees 4 products displayed in cart* If I clear cookies, it clears added products.* If a guest adds some products to cart then logs in, the number of products is the sum of ones added when being a guest and ones added when being a logged user. For instance, user A has signed in and added 4 products to cart then logged out. He adds 6 products to cart as a guest then logs in as account A. After logging in, totally 10 products displayed in cart* If a guest adds 2 products to cart on Greencom site, then continue adding 3 products on Kard site, and logs on to Greencom site. The number of products is not counted when logging on Greencom site, he/she will see 2 products displayed in cart

title: [BE] GreenCom - Web App - Guest - Marketplace - Business To Business Advertising
description: Business To Business Advertising is corporate market advertising*.* This type of advertising aimed only at customers who are other businesses.*AC:*In this section, I have knowledge about the benefits when I register to be a merchantI’m able to see business packages that I can drive my business growth* When tapping on *“Get Started“* button of packages opens new ARM site tab - Registration page straightaway.* Ensure that this works functionally as in case of users who are in ARM site already  and clicked on *“Start“* there*Note:* This only displays on Greencom site* Display the headers as Winter Green color (#70AD47) !image-20210716-065323.png|width=692,height=434!Following the feedback to have the correct display[^GC Mockup v34.pptx]

title: [FE] Web App - Guest View
description: As a guest, I should have a specific view when accessing Greencom site. title: [BE] Web App - Guest - Marketplace
description: As a guest experiencing Greencom Web platform, I should be able to buy products without logging in. *Acceptance Criteria:** On Home screen, clicking on Marketplace menu navigates to Nearby tab in Marketplace page. This tab is always the default tab of page. I can also see tabs: Products, Gift cards, Offers in Marketplace* The Marketplace page is split into 2 sections: ** Stores/products/gift cards/offers will be displayed in 2 rows in the above section *** Display  view more Stores/products/gift cards/offers** The below section is used for Business To Business Advertising [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5209|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5209|smart-link] +_Nearby tab_+* Search merchants: ensure this works functionally as in case of logged users* Filter categories: ensure this works functionally as in case of logged users* Store map and location selection: ensure this works functionally as in case of logged users* When doing actions below, it displays Login Modal** Clicking on *“Connect”* button to connect with merchant on Merchant Details page. After logging in successfully, I stay at Merchant Details page.** Clicking on *“Pay”* button to connect with merchant on Merchant Details page. After logging in successfully, I stay at Merchant Details page.** Clicking on “*Add to Wallet“* buttons of coupons in Campaign section on Merchant Details page.  After logging in successfully, I stay at Merchant Details page.** Clicking on *“Add to Wallet“* buttons of coupons on Coupon Category page. After logging in successfully, I stay at Coupon Category page.** When clicking on *“Gift to Friend“* and *“Add to my Wallet“* buttons on Gift card Details modal in Gift Card Category page.  After logging in successfully, I stay at Gift Card Category page.* Login modal: this the new modal enhanced. It includes** Login form: this applies the validation as login form in [https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/login|https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/login|smart-link] ** Forgot Password:  clicking on this navigates to [https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/forgot-password|https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/forgot-password|smart-link] ** Register: clicking on this navigates to [https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/register|https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/register|smart-link] *  I can click on *“Add to cart“* buttons to add products to my shopping cart as normal+_Gift Cards tab_+* I can see the list of gift cards and search gift cards as normal* When clicking on a gift card, I see Login Modal after clicking on *“Gift to Friend“* and *“Add to my Wallet“* buttons+_Products tab_+* I can see products of all merchants here and click on them to go to their details as normal.* I can click on *“Add to cart“* buttons to add the product to my shopping cart as normal+_Offers tab_+* I can see the list of offers and search offers as normal* When clicking on an offer, I see Login Modal if I click on *“Save Offer“* or *“Redeem Now“* button

In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message- *-_“No Categories Found.“_-***** -For each selected category, it will be highlighted.-** -Filter icon should be highlighted and colored if I am using filter.-** -Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Home, Products and Gift card in store details-*** -Sort by: I can sort product list by-**** -Latest: sorting product list by latest created date-**** -Price:-***** -Lowest to Highest-***** -Highest to Lowest-*** -By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).-*** -For the sort buttons (Latest, Price), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.-** -I can tap Clear button on Filter screen to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories and sort by will be unselected and reloaded, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.-** -If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display- {color:#00b8d9}*-_“No products found.“_-*{color}-.-* -By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (-*-All-*-).-* For each product, I want to see:** Product image** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* User can scroll down to view all products

title: Flutter App - Orders
description: As a customer, I want my orders to be kept in the Orders history so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+There are 2 tabs that are displayed on the Orders screen: Processing tab and Completed tabEach tab will contain all the corresponding orders* For Processing tab: displaying the list of orders with the status is New/ Preparing/ Ready/ Shipping when the delivery method is Pickup or Delivery** For each order, I want to see:*** Merchant logo image*** Business Name: display full name*** Delivery method*** Order ID*** Status**** After a new order is created, the status is New**** The rest of the statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever my order status is updated.**** Unpaid order which is created by staff at the store should be also displayed with the status Unpaid** Tapping on an Order opens the Order Details screen* For Completed tab: only displaying the orders which the status is Completed. ** The delivery method should be kept** Pay Now delivery method will be displayed in the Completed tab all the timeThe list of orders is sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. Updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.

title: Marketplace - Nearby tab
description: As a customer, I want to be able to view the list of merchants who are selling products near me. Depending on the location will display the list of merchants.+*AC:*+* On the *Nearby* tab, I want to see the list of all konnect zones (store) near my position (within 10 miles). * I can scroll down to view more and the list will be sorted by:** Distance from my position (nearest)** Alphabet (business name)* I can tap on Change to update location, all konnect zones (store) near to the new position will be displayed** Tapping on Change will open the Select Location screen ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4870|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4870|smart-link] )*** Searching the location will display the address suggestion, the user can tap on it to select the location*** After selecting, the address is displayed, and ‘Set Location’ button is enabled* Each konnect zone must be active and selected as Show On Marketplace to be shown on this tab.* For each store, I want to see:** Merchant logo image** Business Name: display full name** Store’s address: display full address** The distance from my position to the store** Discount percentage (if available)** Points Cashback (if available)* I can tap on any store to open the Store Details screen (Konnect Zone detail).* I can search store by business name or business category, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*** I can search with any words, characters, or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by *blank characters* or clearing keywords.** Keep the searching results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online, and Shopping.* I can filter stores by tapping the Filter icon on the Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of business categories screen.** I can select/deselect only one category to filter.** Show the name of the selected category. (the default value is *All Categories*).** I can select the *All Categories* to clear the filter.** The filter icon should be bold and colored (depending on tenant theme color) if I am using the filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online, and Shopping.* If no stores are available or no matched searching results, display *_“No stores found“_*.

title: BE - Visipay - Pay flow Gateway Processing Platforms for Card-Present Transactions
description: As a Visipay Admin, I want to configure for Card-Present Transactions using the Worldnet gateway beside the current gateway: Vantiv. So that when unexpected errors occur, transactions still keep going through the  payment gateways configured h3. *Acceptance Criteria:*On the left menu, adding a new item called: *Card Present*Clicking on the Card Present menu opens the Card Present page with the info below:* *Search*: work as the current behavior. When searching no result, display the message: No groups found* *The Group Grid with* ** +Default:+*** _Priority_: 1*** _Group Name_: Default*** _Merchants_: number of merchants*** _Payment Gateways_ - Default: Vantiv*** _Status_: Enable*** _Actions_: Edit and Disable. I can edit the information in a group or disable it.* *Create New Group button:* ** Clicking on it opens the *Create New Group*’ modal with the below details*** _Group Name_: display textbox, max length 50 chars, alphanumeric*** _Merchant Lists_: only displaying the active merchants  **** Allow users to search the names of merchants**** Allow selecting one, multiple, all merchants to add into a group.**** The merchant list in group 1 can be selected to add into the other groups*** _Available Payment Gateways_: display Combobox with****  Default: Vantiv**** Worldnet key names: getting in Card Present Credential*** _Status_ - Default: Enable*** _Save button_: **** Disable the button when not entering the group name or adding merchants**** If entering the same group name(insensitive case), display the message: *_“The group name is existing. Please try another one”_***** I can add many groups with different names.*** Clicking on the 'X' icon or Cancel button to close the modal. * After creating a new group, the information of that group will be displayed on the Group Grid.* If a group using the gateway and that gateway is removed, that group is automatically disabled. When I try to enable that group, display the message: *_“The gateway is not available. Please try another gateway”_*** I should be able to edit that group to use another gateway.* The newly created group should be placed on the top with priority 1. I can drag and drop a group to change the priority of it.** Editing the group will not change the priority of that group.** The priority is set with the highest is 1

_Phone number_** _Address_** _Date chooser: The user can change the day to receive the order._ ** _Time chooser: The user can change the time to receive the order._ ** All changed information should be kept even if the user changes another payment method and back to it.** _Confirm button_*** When a field is empty, should disable and grey out the button*** Enable the button when all fields are filled up: tapping on it will back to the Confirm & Payment screen, Select Delivery Method is updated to the Pickup method* +*_Delivery_*+: when tapping on this will navigate to the screen, named: should be the KYC address. *** If the user has not verified KYC, the delivery address will be empty, user can base on the google maps suggestion to input another one.*** The user can change the address if he/she wants*** After changing the address, this address should be kept even if the user changes another payment method ** _Date chooser:_ The user can change the day to receive the order. title: Marketplace - Checkout
description: When the products are selected, tapping on the Checkout button on the Cart screen should navigate to the Confirm & Payment screen. In this screen should contain the information as below:* *The title: Confirm & Payment** There is a back button on the top left corner so that I can tap on it to back to the shopping cart* *Delivery method section, called: Select Delivery Method*. This is to select a method to take the products. Refer this ticket: [\[KP-4708] Marketplace - Checkout - Delivery Method - Jira (atlassian.net)|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4708]* *Summary section*: This is to display all total amount** Sub Total: the total price of items** Tax: tax of merchant** Coupons: selecting it will open the 'Select Coupon' screen. All added coupons of that store should be displayed. ** Gift card: selecting it will open the 'Select Gift Cards' screen. All GCs which are bought at that store should be displayed. ** Points: display the available point. When selecting it will open a select point modal including: *** Point Availability*** Point to US Dollar*** {color:#ff5630}TBD{color}*** Confirm button** Total: The total price including tax or being discounted by Coupon/GC/Points** Cashback: Point reward of merchant* *Payment method section*: This is to select the method to make payment** When I have verified KYC, display the image of the KK (set as default) with user name and the 4 last number of KK. I can also change another card to make payment**  When I have not verified KYC, display ‘Select Payment Method’ hyperlink*** Tapping on it leads me to the Select Payment Method screen. I can add or select any cards* *'Confirm Payment'* *button*: ** When Delivery or Payment method is not selected, disable and grey out the Confirm Payment button ** When the button is enabled, tapping on it to complete the payment* After payment is complete** It leads me to the Complete screen with the Check icon and the text Payment Completed displayed*** Tapping on “Close” button goes to the Orders screen. Depending on the selected delivery method will navigate to Processing or Completed tab**** Selecting the Pay Now method should navigate to the Completed tab**** Pickup and Delivery should navigate to the Processing tab** Transactions: it records the transaction in Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, Customer Support, VK/Tenant Admin*** Transaction Type: Payment** Ensure the order is also displayed in KardPOS ** Ensure that point rewards function is worked as normal

In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.** I can tap Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Online and Products.* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Product image** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.** Business name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* I can search product by product name and business name:** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online and Products.* I can sort product list by:** Latest: sorting product list by latest created date** Price:*** Low to High.*** High to Low.** Most discounted (based on discount percentage): sorting product list by most discount.* By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).* For three sort buttons (Latest, Price and Most Discounted), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.* If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.* User can scroll down to hide Search field and Sorting price lines, but when they scroll up those lines should appear right away. title: iOS/Android/Web - Consumer Apps - Crypto Card - Open KYC Form from Information pop-up of KYC message
description: With new flow for Crypto server, we will save the Crypto sever on PT acc so user need to pass KYC before using the Crypto card. We need to change new logic for them:*  Crypto SEND MONEY to another Crypto: when tapping/clicking on Send button in crypto card detail, we need to display a button Get KYC Verified on that pop-up so that they can open KYC screen quickly with below logic:* If user is pending for verification, show message: “Your KYC submission is being reviewed and the result will be sent to you soon.” and we need to direct user to KYC status view instead of KYC submit form.* If user is LV1, show the message: “You need to get KYC verified to access this feature” then we have 2 cases:a. User failed KYC verification, after pressing “Get KYC Verified” we need redirect user to KYC status view like #2b. User has never submitted KYC, after pressing “Get KYC Verified”, redirect user to KYC form.!image-20201211-073221.png|width=374,height=857!
