title: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Resend KYC email
description: As a master admin, I would like to resend KYC email for merchants in case they miss the previous email or they forget to submit KYC before.+*AC:*+* I login to ARM site by master admin role.* On Merchant Accounts page, at Merchant Management tab, I want to have one more column named *KYC* before *Action*.* On this column:** Display the current KYC status of merchant: *** Not Verified*** Approved*** Rejected*** Pending*** Inapplicable (if merchant registers an account with Free package)** Display the *Resend* button:*** Select Action: send again the KYC email to merchant, **** If sending successfully, show the message pop-up *_“KYC request email has been sent successfully.“_***** If sending unsuccessfully, show the message pop-up *_“KYC request email has been sent unsuccessfully.“_**** This button is only displayed if merchant hasn’t submitted KYC yet (*Not Verified*) or KYC status is *Rejected*, which their KYC request is not available at KYC Verification tab. For the KYC status *Approve*, *Pending*, and *Inapplicable*, this button should be hidden.*** Resend email content:**** *Not Verified*: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2695|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2695|smart-link] **** *Rejected*: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2696|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2696|smart-link] !image-20210224-043150.png|width=1606,height=797!

title: [Backend] - Visikard Admin - Gift Card Catalog - Show all gift cards
description: As an Admin I want to be able to see all gift cards including ARM and Incomm ones on Gift Card Catalog page instead of seeing the gift cards associated with merchants only as now.* Merchant and Discount columns are empty for gift cards that don't belong to any merchant. This happens for Incomm gift cards only because they are not associated to any merchant when getting from Incomm server.* Disable a gift card - make sure that it is not showed on Online tab and other places of selling gift cards like Konnect Category, Marketplace of Points.* I want to be able to filter gift cards by type (In-Store, Incomm) like Gift Card Report page.* I can search gift cards by name or business name.* On Brand column, I want to view merchant detail of a gift card that is associated with a merchant. Otherwise, show Brand provided by Incomm if it is available. We can reuse the merchant detail form that we have from Visipay if possible. Otherwise, we can show the basic information for the associated merchant.+*_Mockup:_*+[https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/screen/3297d28e-3254-421b-bacc-678a94a6b4c9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/screen/3297d28e-3254-421b-bacc-678a94a6b4c9/|smart-link]

title: Visikard/Tenant Admin Report - Dashboard - Transaction Statistics
description: As a VisiKard admin, I want to be able to view the transaction statistics on Dashboard page of VisiKard Admin site.+*AC:*+*Transaction Statistics** I want to have the chart displaying the transaction statistics.* I want to have the filter set including:** Tenant: Displaying as drop-down list field, which contains all available tenants in system. The default value is *All*.** Type: *** Displaying as a drop-down list field, which contains all the transaction types from Transactions page. The default value is *Card Purchase*.*** I can select multiple tenants to filter.** View Mode: A drop-down list field contains two options:*** By Year: I can select a year that I want to view the chart. The default value is the current year.*** By Month: I select a month of the current year to view the chart. The default value is the current month.* On the chart:** If I select By Year view mode:*** I can see the list of 12 months of the selected year being displayed as the column.*** Each column is a month, which displays the total of transaction amount in that month.** If I select By Month view mode:*** I can see the list of days of the selected month in year displayed as the column.*** Each column is a date, which displays the total of transaction amount on that date.** I can see the total of revenue from All transactions by year or by month depending on what view mode I select.** I can export the chart to pdf file.* -Add Payment Method with below options to display the total amount of transactions that have- *-Remitter-* -or- *-Beneficiary-* -to be the selected method.-** -Kash Kard-** -Credit Card-** -ETH-** -BTC-** -ZVC-** -Bank-+_Notes_+No change for New Users -  the designer will correct the mockup because there is some change for these sections in the new mockup.+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|smart-link]

title: Security issue - Create annotation to prevent consumer user access admin's APIs
description: Currently the consumer user can call the APIs of admin user i.e load list users, load list transaction. We need to prevent them by adding the annotation which allow the visikard admin only

title: Security issue - review internal APIs
description: Currently we are adding API key to header of API automatically. We need to stop this action because it's breaking the security. To stop it we have to check:- Recheck the exclude list in each service, currently only the exclude list in api service working- Manual add the API key for all internal APIs- Add text "/internal/" into the internal APIs to let devops blocks the outside calling

title: Security issue - Do not push the sensitive data to third party
description: Currently we are passing the header (token, API key, deviceId and also the user info) in the header to third party when calling them. Please check and ignore them before sending outWe have the flag to ignore them already, please double check and add them into your methodsThere are:* PrimeTrust* APNS (apple)* Google cloud message or firebase or pax notification* Comdata* Davinci* Incomm* Gift tango(still have the source code but we do not use it anymore)* Entertainment (in future)* Redfin* Switchcommerce* [Authorize.net|http://Authorize.net]* Idology, Usio,[ACH.com|http://ACH.com] (still have the source code but we do not use it anymore)* Twilio* Kanoo* AWS (S3)* JWPlayer* CoinLayer* ACH* Plaid* QuickCard* Others (Rtui, Ommi card, blackhawk..) - Do not know about it

title: BE - Consumer App - Notifications Settings
description: As a customer, I want to be able to configure the settings to receive notifications from the system.+*AC:*+* I want to have a button/link from Notifications screen to open Notification Setting screen or I can open from left menu.* On this screen, I can turn on / turn off one by one type or all types of notifications that I want to get:** *By default:*, Enable Notifications and the types below are on.** When Enable Notifications is on:*** I can turn on / off the notification types below.*** The app will remember my previous settings and turn on exactly what I turned on before.** When Enable Notifcations is off, the notification types below are disabled.* Types of notification.** [Profile|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Profile]** [Pay Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Pay-Card]** [Gift Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Gift-Card]** [Promotion|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Promotion]** [Order|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Order]** [Message|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Message] +*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|smart-link]

If i delete a category being associated with any merchants, show the message pop-up *_“You cannot delete this category because it’s being used.“_** I can create/edit business categories.* I can select a category to view the list of merchants who are associated with it.[https://xd.adobe.com/view/851c1095-e8ac-43b3-8393-b87e38dc53a9-d04f/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/851c1095-e8ac-43b3-8393-b87e38dc53a9-d04f/|smart-link]

title: [BE] - Consumer App - Notifications UI
description: As a customer, I want to view my Notifications screen more clearly and easier to keep track.+*AC:*+* Update the UI and content on Notifications screen: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link] (*Only update the available notification types in this scope)** I can filter my notifications:** Types:*** [Profile|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Profile]: display the notifications of connection with consumer or merchant and KYC verification.*** [Pay Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Pay-Card]: display the notification of transactions (send/receive money, load money, withdraw money, refund, *** [Gift Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Gift-Card]: display the notification of receiving gift card from friend or merchant.*** [Promotion|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Promotion]: display the notification of receiving coupon, new coupon / promotion from merchant and point reward*** [Order|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Order]: display the notification of order status updated** When using filter, I can see the selected type displayed above the list. I can click Show All to view all notifications as before.* Each notification will be shown with read and unread status in the list:** The notifications which is unread, the background is blue.** The notification can be updated to Read when:*** Tap banner notification (system).*** Tap notification on the Notifications screen.*** Tap Mark all as Read at top of Notifications screen.*** Tap Mark as Read on each notification.* I can mark one by one or all notification as Read:** *_Mark all as Read:_* this option should be only shown when there is at least one notification unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.** *_Mark as Read:_* this option should be only shown when the notification is unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.* I can clear one by one or all notifications. When I want to clear all, show the confirmation pop-up.* The number on Notifications item on the left menu is the number of unread message. The maximum is 99+.* In case there’s not any notifications or no filter results, show the message at center *_“No Notifications“_*+*_Mockup_*+: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/f73b7f97-c811-4545-bd13-9011d0d5a112/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/f73b7f97-c811-4545-bd13-9011d0d5a112/|smart-link]

title: Security issue - Reset PIN API can used to reset PIN of all users without any authentication method
description: curl --location --request POST 'https://arm-dev.kardsys.com/index/changewalletpinrecover' \--header 'sec-ch-ua: "Google Chrome";v="87", " Not;A Brand";v="99", "Chromium";v="87"' \--header 'accept: */*' \--header 'x-requested-with: XMLHttpRequest' \--header 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \--header 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.141 Safari/537.36' \--header 'content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8' \--header 'sec-fetch-site: same-origin' \--header 'sec-fetch-mode: cors' \--header 'sec-fetch-dest: empty' \--header 'accept-language: en,es;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8' \--header 'cookie: _ga=GA1.2.1098914514.1600161426; ARM_COUNTRY=US; lang=en; qwertyuiop=556FB4C0A09C97F283D46FBA0CC6084B; JSESSIONID=05D054673DFBA1A3511B1D26CA4EC166' \--data-raw 'email=nguyennhatitit%2Bkard1%40gmail.com&walletPin=4321&userApp=true&tenant=kard'The problem we are trying to fix, is the API above is insecure. Anyone that know this API can reset PIN of any user on the system.

title: ARM Master - Review KYC requests for Merchants
description: +*AC:*+* On clicking Verify button from KYC Verification tab ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2379|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2379|smart-link]), Verify New Merchant Information page will be opened. On the screen, the admin can see all information which merchant has submitted and the uploaded document files (for image admin can click to view as full mode). There are two buttons:** Approve: On clicking, show the Approved pop-up. Closing this pop-up will direct admin to Merchant Accounts page (KYC Verification tab) and KYC status of that merchant is updated to *Approved*.** Reject: On clicking, show the Reject Information pop-up. admin can enter reason (*this reason should be displayed in email of rejecting*):*** Reject:**** If Reject Reason field is missing or filled by blank, -this button is disable (grey out)- show the red message below the field *_“Reject reason is required.“_***** If Reject Reason field is filled, this button is enabled.*** Cancel: On clicking, close Reject Information pop-up only, the action is cancelled.* Merchants will be notified via email upon the approved or rejected verification.+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/6c5a64ff-1dbe-4860-9151-e30a8ad5c556/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/6c5a64ff-1dbe-4860-9151-e30a8ad5c556/|smart-link]

title: ARM - KYC Verification Form
description: +*AC:*+The merchant clicks at the link in email sent to them after registering a new account.They will select Account Type they want to submit KYC verification *INDIVIDUAL* or *CORPORATE*.*_INDIVIDUAL_*{color:#ff5630} {color}* *General Information*** Full Name** Phone Number** Email** Date of Birth** Gender* *Address Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Country* State* City* Street Address* Postal Code|* Country* Region* City* Street Address* Postal Code|* *Identity Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Tax Country* Tax State* SSN or TIN|* Tax Country* Indentification Number|* Continue button: On clicking, the Upload Document is opened:** Merchant can select one of four types of {color:#ff5630}*image* {color}document to upload: ID Card / Driver Licence / Passport / Residence Permit** Merchant clicks Continue button to finish submitting.Refer this link for more details: [https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzqYf4ilA2o-peph?e=gwhaKA|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzqYf4ilA2o-peph?e=gwhaKA|smart-link] *_CORPORATE_* *Company Information** *General Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Company Name* Email* Phone Number* Country* State:* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Tax State* Social Security Number* Region of Formation|* Company Name* Email* Phone Number* Country* Region* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Identification Number* Region of Formation|* *Documents:* Merchant can select the document to upload. ({color:#ff5630}*image* {color}and {color:#ff5630}*document*{color})* Continue button: On clicking, the next screen (*Representative Information*)*Representative Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Title* Full Name* Email* Phone Number* Gender* Date of Birth* Country* State* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Tax State* Social Security Number|* Title* Full Name* Email* Phone Number* Gender* Date of Birth* Country* Region* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Identification Number|* Document** Merchant can select one of four types of {color:#ff5630}*image* {color}document to upload: ID Card / Driver Licence / Passport / Residence Permit.* Merchant clicks Continue button to finish submitting.Refer this link for more details: [https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzz8KLBsk7kXEbXb?e=4ZqcOe|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzz8KLBsk7kXEbXb?e=4ZqcOe|smart-link] +_Note:_+* For image documents, allow user to import the file with extensions *jpeg / jpg, png*. The maximum size is 50MB for each file.* For text document, allow user to import the file with extensions *pdf, doc, docx*. The maximum size is 50MB for each file.* If user uploads any other files with invalid extension, show the error message {color:#00b8d9}*_“The extension of file is unsupported. Please import another file.“_*{color}+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/|smart-link]

title: KanooPOS - Pay Unpaid Order
description: +*AC:*+* I click Pay Order button of unpaid orders from Order List or Order Detail screen to open the payment screen (same as when tapping Pay button from the menu list):** The paid amount is auto-filled by the order amount. Payment Cards will be the same, too.** Discount field will be not displayed.** The function works on this screen will be as same as the old flow. (scan Cash Card / Gift Cash Card / Sand Dollar with gift card)* After payment successfully:** If making payment from Order List screen (Unpaid tab):*** I will be navigated back to Order List screen (All Orders tab)*** The order status is updated to *Completed* and it will be synced to Kanoo mobile/web app.** If making payment from Order Detail screen (Unpaid tab):*** I will be navigated back to Order Detail screen (All Orders tab)*** The order status is updated to *Completed* and it will be synced to Kanoo mobile/web app.+_Note_+If the order is created for user A, there’s only user A who can make payment for this order, if another user makes payment, show the message *_“You cannot make payment because this order belongs to another user.“_* (this message is applied when making payment by cash card, gift cash card, sand dollar and gift card)+*Mockup:*+Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/cea24c53-9cb9-4d81-b8b4-34ca81967da9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/cea24c53-9cb9-4d81-b8b4-34ca81967da9/|smart-link] Tablet: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/1fa22270-100f-400c-8d53-0c037b26123c-4af1/screen/71c1fefb-178f-49ec-a54b-b5e8b9b3ea75/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/1fa22270-100f-400c-8d53-0c037b26123c-4af1/screen/71c1fefb-178f-49ec-a54b-b5e8b9b3ea75/|smart-link]

title: Notification email for KYC result (approved or rejected)
description: +*AC:*+||{color:#36b37e}*_Approved_*{color}|||Dear *\[Merchant Name]*,We are happy to inform that your KYC verification has been approved.Please configure your merchant account and raise your successful business\!Arm Corporate Office4480H South CobbDrive #321Smyrna, GA 30080All Arm emails will be sent from our [support@kardsys.com|mailto:support@kardsys.com] domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses.|||{color:#ff5630}*_Rejected_*{color}|||Dear *\[Merchant Name]*,We are sorry to inform that your KYC verification has been rejected for some reasons:*\[Reject Reason]*You can click {color:#00b8d9}+here+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}to try again.Arm Corporate Office4480H South CobbDrive #321Smyrna, GA 30080All Arm emails will be sent from our [support@kardsys.com|mailto:support@kardsys.com] domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses.|Attach the hyper link at “here“, merchant can click that to open KYC form page to resubmit, on the form all inputted info should be kept for merchant (including document files and images that they uploaded), so that they can modify more quickly.Template:!image-20210127-025205.png|width=603,height=345!

We will never contact you from any other addresses.”+_Note:_+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/|smart-link]

title: Android - Merge 4 consumer apps to 1 single branch
description: Our 4 apps the almost the same. They only have some differences on theme but we are maintaining 4 separated branch for them. That take a lot of effort and could cause bugs if developer have mistake on code merging.So we will change the approach to build 4 app on only 1 source code base. To do that we need:# Create a new branch to use that to build 4 apps.# Make this branch to have ability to build 4 apps. For iOS, we can use Build Target, for Android we can use build variants to do that.# Here are some differences between these apps: (I will have QC to list out these differences in detail to make sure that we cover all of them)#* Theme: colors and icons.#* Inviting commission flow.# Work with DevOps to integrate the CI/CD process to build these apps  from the new branch.# Merge new feature, bug fixing of S2053 to this branch to make sure that we have the latest codeNote: This ticket will be test on next sprint

title: [Backend] - Check Wallet PIN for Payment Transactions
description: As a system admin, I want users to authenticate by enter wallet PIN (or use fingerprint / face ID) before doing any transactions of the app.+*AC:*+*_Load Money_** Load with cash at store (KardPOS)!image-20210128-105126.png|width=248,height=541!* Load from card to card!image-20210108-033626.png|width=267,height=559!After tapping Load button, show Enter Your PIN screen:* If the fingerprint / face ID is enabled already: Show the pop-up using fingerprint / face ID at first, if user does not want to use it, they can enter PIN, the screen will display an icon and text *_“Make Transaction with Face ID“_* / *_“Make Transaction with Fingerprint“_* for user to use if they need.* If the fingerprint / face ID is not enabled yet: user can only enter PIN, but the screen will display a check box *“Use Face ID for next transactions”* or *“Use Fingerprint for next transactions“*, when checking that box and making the current transaction with PIN successfully, Face ID / Fingerprint feature will be auto-enabled on Settings screen and user can make transactions by Face ID / Fingerprint next time.** If PIN is correct, Load transaction is done completely.** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect. Attempted x/5.“_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}_._{color} User will have maximum 5 attempts, if he/she fails at the last time (5th) show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your wallet has been locked due to entering PIN incorrecly too many times. You can reset your PIN to unlock your wallet.“_*{color}, closing pop-up will direct user to Home screen. This pop-up will appear every time user makes any other transactions.*** After resetting PIN successfully, they can use that PIN to make transactions without being locked any more.** The max attempt should be configurable on Server.Enter Your PIN screen will be opened for other transactions below:*_Withdraw:_* after tapping Withdraw button* Withdraw cash** If PIN is correct, show the QR code of withdraw.** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}!image-20210108-033748.png|width=270,height=570!* Withdraw to bank account:** If PIN is correct, withdraw transaction is done completely.** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}!image-20210108-040108.png|width=270,height=580!*_Refund:_* after tapping Refund icon* If PIN is correct, show the QR code of refund.* If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}!image-20210108-034003.png|width=269,height=572!*_Send Money:_* After tapping Send button* If PIN is correct, Send transaction is done completely.* If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}!image-20210108-034759.png|width=266,height=579!*_Payment_** AirPay / Buy Products (by money or point): After tapping Confirm Payment** If PIN is correct, payment transaction is done completely.** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}!image-20210108-034837.png|width=268,height=573!* Buy Gift Card (by money or point): After tapping OK on the pop-up** If PIN is correct, payment transaction is done completely.** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}!image-20210108-040758.png|width=267,height=561!*_Direct Funding_*!image-20210128-105154.png|width=247,height=538!*_Membership Payment_*!image-20210128-105540.png|width=1636,height=1108!!image-20210128-105922.png|width=1626,height=859!*_External Payment (Pay with HYT/Kard/GreenCom/Kingdom)_**_Exchange Points To Money for Mastercard_*!image-20210128-105231.png|width=246,height=537!+_Note:_++*Mockup:*+Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f57c22e-77b0-42bc-83a0-962d1de6028b-6a04/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f57c22e-77b0-42bc-83a0-962d1de6028b-6a04/|smart-link] Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6b060f78-d348-462b-821b-06eeb773d76c-3e55/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6b060f78-d348-462b-821b-06eeb773d76c-3e55/|smart-link] +_Note:_+If user changes wallet PIN in another device, then they uses fingerprint / face ID on their own device to make transactions, they will see a dialog message {color:#6554c0}*_“Your PIN has been changed. Please enter the new PIN to process this transaction.“_*{color}. After closing this dialog, user needs to enter their new PIN, and below the PIN field they can see a checkbox *“Use Fingerprint for next transactions“* / *“Use Face ID for next transactions“*, user can check on that to make transactions with fingerprint / face ID next time.When user wallet was locked, everytime they make transaction by entering PIN, they will see the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your wallet has been locked due to entering PIN incorrectly too many times. You can reset your PIN to unlock your wallet.“_*{color}

title: Kanoo - Notification for updating order status
description: As a Kanoo user, I want to see the notification every time my order status is updated.+*AC:*+* When the status is update to Preparing: _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Your order #_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_is now being prepared._{color}_“_* When the status is updated to Ready:** Pickup order: _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Your order #_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_is now ready for pickup._{color}_“_** Delivery order: _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Your order #_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_is now ready for delivery._{color}_“_* When the status is updated to Shipping (delivery order): {color:#00b8d9}_Your order_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}#{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _is now being delivered._{color}_“_* When the status is updated to Completed: “{color:#00b8d9}_Your Order_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}#{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _has been completed._{color}“Email Content:* Subject: Kanoo - Order Updated* Sample content:“Dear \[Customer Name],Your order at \[Business Name] is now being prepared.<Order Detail table>Click {color:#00b8d9}+here+ {color}to view your order detail at Kanoo.*CaribPay (Bahamas) Ltd.*Suite #7 Millennium Mall, WestAtlantic Drive, P.O. Box F-42796Freeport, Grand BahamaThe Bahamas_All Kanoo emails will be sent from our_ [_customerservice@kanoopays.com_|mailto:customerservice@kanoopays.com] _domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses._“* On clicking {color:#00b8d9}+*_here_*+{color}, I can be navigated to Order Detail page of the web app. I should be required to login if I haven’t login before.+*Mockup:*+

title: KanooPOS - Handle order status and message on refund request from user
description: +*AC:*+* When user requests refund for an order:** This order will be moved to All Orders tab.** \[Scan to Confirm Delivery] / \[Scan to Pickup] and \[Complete] buttons will be hidden.** Show *Pending Refund* status below the current order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed)** *When the order status is* *New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping*:*** If the request is approved: Show the status *Refund Approved* below the current order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping).*** If the request is rejected: **** Move this order to Pickup / Delivery tab (\[Scan to Confirm Delivery] / \[Scan to Pickup] and \[Complete] buttons will be displayed again).**** Show *Refund Rejected* status below below the current order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping).**** This order should be kept processing as usual.** *When the order status is Completed:****  If the request is approved: Show *Refund Approved* status below the current order status (Completed).*** If the request is rejected: Show *Refund Rejected* status below the current order status (Completed).+_Note:_+* If the staff updates order status to Preparing or Ready after user requests refund: Show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order cannot be updated due to being requested to refund.“_*{color}_._ After closing pop-up:** Order List: The order is removed from Pickup / Delivery tab and moved to All Orders tab.** Order Detail: *** Reload the screen and show *Pending Refund* status below the current order status.*** \[Pickup] / \[Delivery] and \[Complete] buttons will be hidden* If the staff updates order status to Completed (scanning / taking note) after user requests refund: Show the message pop-up while scanning / taking note {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order cannot be completed due to being requested to refund.“_* {color}_._ After closing pop-up and get back to the previous screen:** Order List: The order is removed from Pickup / Delivery tab and moved to All Orders tab.** Order Detail: *** Reload the screen and show *Pending Refund* status below the current order status.*** \[Pickup] / \[Delivery] and \[Complete] buttons will be hidden+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|smart-link]

title: ARM - Store - Product - Associate product to a category when creating or editing
description: As a merchant admin, I want associate each of my products to a product category, so that customers can filter and buy easily.+*AC:*+* On Create Product page, I want to see one more field named *Category*.* There’s a empty field and a button named Select Category.* On clicking the button:** Select Category pop-up is opened which contains all categories (from Category tab at Store page), each category will have a checkbox that I can select. After selecting, I can click Save button to close the pop-up and the selected categories will be filled in the empty field.** I can select multiple categories.** The list of categories should be sorted by alphabet.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/bfc6e9fd-c1d1-4fab-a2bb-cfa7758db706-ea95/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/bfc6e9fd-c1d1-4fab-a2bb-cfa7758db706-ea95/|smart-link]

title: [BE] Display status for Order (Order List and Order Detail)
description: As a customer, I want my created orders to display the status so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_**.** There are 3 refunding statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_Pending Refund / Refund Approved / Refund Rejected._* (this is available now on Kanoo app)* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from KanooPOS app and Order Delivery app whenever my order status is updated.* I want the status to display on four tabs of Orders screen (Pickup, Delivery, Unpaid and All Orders tabs) and Order Detail screen.** For Pickup tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready*** For Delivery tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping* ** For Unpaid tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *Unpaid*** For All Orders tab: displaying both delivery and pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping, Completed, Cancelled* and refund statuses *Pending Refund, Refund Approved and Refund Rejected.** The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/1a487558-777c-4c02-8c1b-63a4dc139d89/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/1a487558-777c-4c02-8c1b-63a4dc139d89/|smart-link]

title: Order Delivery App - Order Detail screen
description: +*AC:*+* On tapping any orders on Orders List from any tabs, I can open Order Detail screen.* On this screen:||*Ready*||*Shipping*||*Completed*|||* Order number* Order status* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door** Delivery Time/Address* A button to show directions on map* Map* Order detail information.* \[PICK UP] button: On tapping** The button is disappeared and reaplaced by \[COMPLETE ORDER] button.** The status is updated to Shipping.|* Order number* Order status* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door** Delivery Time/Address* A button to show directions* Map* Order detail information.* \[COMPLETE ORDER] button. On tapping this:** *Scan QR Code:* There are three options shown:*** SCAN TO CONFIRM: The customer presents me the QR code of order to scan. After scanning successfully, navigate me back to Order Detail screen and the status updated to Completed.*** CONFIRM WITHOUT SCANNING: I can skip scanning action and completed the order by taking note (photo or text). After taking note successfully, navigate me back to Order Detail screen and the status updated to Completed.*** CANCEL: Close the Action Sheet, nothing’s changed.** *Leave At Door*: Show the screen to take a photo and note. On this screen, I can take note if I want or I can skip this action. Below is DONE button, on tapping I can complete this type of order and will be navigated to Order Detail screen again (Completed status).|* Order number* Order status* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door** Delivery Time/Address* A button to show directions* Map* Order detail information.* Note (if available).|+_Note:_+* Show Direction button:** This button is displayed when the delivery address is correct (existing on Google map). I can tap this to open the map app and that app shows me direction automatically.** This button is hidden when the delivery address is incorrect (not existing on Google map). I have to contact customer to get the correct address and open the map application manually and find way to get there.* Map:** The app is displayed when the delivery address is correct (existing on Google map). I can see on the map the delivery address is marked by red icon.** The map is hidden when the delivery address is incorrect (not existing on Google map). In this case, below the address I can see a red warning text _“_{color:#ff5630}*_The address cannot be found._*{color}_“._* Note: This part can the note of text or photo depending which type I take note while completing order. If I can skip this action, this should show nothing here. The mamximum input at Note field is 500 characters including space.+Mockup:+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|smart-link]

title: Order Delivery App - Order List screen
description: +*AC:*+* On Order List screen:** I can see Log Out icon and Scan icon at the top of screen. ** On tapping Scan icon, show the scanning screen, the shipper can scan QR code of the order to view Order Detail screen. After scanning, the shipper can tap COMPLETE ORDER button to complete order right away without scanning anymore, at that time the status on Order Detail screen updated to Completed.** Separate the screen into 3 tabs named *_Ready_*_,_ *_Shipping_* _and_ *_Completed_*||*Ready*||*Shipping*||*Completed*||| |* Show the number badge on the tab zone, this represents for the number of orders which I picks from Ready tab, for each order updated to Completed, this number will go down.| ||* Show all Ready orders of delivery type.Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|* Show all Shipping orders picked by me from Ready tab.Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|* Show all Completed orders (picked and shipped) by me.Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.||* Search: customer name, phone number, order number and address.|* Search: *same as Ready list.*|* Search: *same as Ready list.*||* Filter:** Delivery Type: *All* / *Leave At Door* / *Scan QR Code*. The default value is *All*.** Date: date range. The default value is *Select a date range*.* Filter icon should be highlighted when it’s used.|* Filter: *same as Ready list.*|* Filter: *same as Ready list.*||* Sorting: by the oldest one (late delivered) to the newest one from top downwards. (past orders to future orders).|* Sorting: *same as Ready list.*|* Sorting: the list will be sorted by completed date. (which one is completed first will be at the top).||* For each order, show:** Customer name** Phone number** Order number** Delivery time:*** This is black normally if the time is after the current date time. (Ex: My current date time is 10/09/2020 04:13 PM, and the delivery date time shows 10/09/2020 05:13 PM).*** This is highlighted if the time is before the current date time. (Ex: My current date time is 10/09/2020 04:13 PM, and the delivery date time shows 10/09/2020 03:13 PM).** Delivery Type: *_Scan QR Code_* / *_Leave At Door_*** \[PICK UP] button. On clicking:*** The current list should be reloaded.*** The order should be moved to Shipping tab.*** The number badge on Shipping tab is increased.*** The other shipper cannot see this order on his/her app.*** Push notification on consumer apps.|* For each order, show: *same as Ready list without any buttons*.|* For each order, show: *same as Ready list without any buttons*.||* When the other staff updates any orders to Ready on KanooPOS, that should be synced to this list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1371|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1371|smart-link] ).| | ||* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )| +_Note:_+* The School Menu order will not be displayed on this app.* The customer name should be displayed maximum 2 lines and show the pickup / delivery address fully.* Search orders:** Customer Name: I can search with first name / last name / the phrase contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Phone Number: I can search with full phone number or the string of number contained in the phone number.** Delivery Address: I can search with full address or the phrase contained in the address.** Order Number: I can search with full order number or the string of number contained in the order number.** If no orders found, I want to see the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“No orders found._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}. This message shown directly on the screen and center-aligned.* Date: Follow this format MM/DD/YYYY (Ex: 04/21/2020 - 09/21/2020).* For each order shown on the list:** All the information displayed on the order must match to the one on consumer app.** Customer’s name and phone number must match to the order info when customer makes the order. There info would be fixed for each order.* In case there are two shippers tapping \[PICKUP] button at the same time on Ready tab, the one goes after will see a message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order has been picked up by another staff.“_*{color}* For Scanning feature on this app (from Home screen and Shipping Order Detail screen: if scanning the QR code of order which status is New, Preparing or Ready, show the error message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order is not available for delivery.“_*{color}+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|smart-link]

title: [Android] KanooPOS - Display and update status for Order
description: As a staff using KanooPOS app, I want the created orders to display the status so that I can track and manage them more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on the order: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed._** There are 3 refund statuses that can be displayed on the order: *_Pending Refund / Refund Approved / Refund Rejected_*_._ {color:#ff5630}*These statuses only displayed when user requests refund and the merchant admin approves / rejectes that request.*{color}* After a new order is created, the status is New.* I want the status to display on three tabs of Orders screen (Pickup, Delivery and All Orders tabs) and Order Detail screen.** For Pickup tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *New*, *Preparing*, *Ready*** For Delivery tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *New*, *Preparing*, *Ready*, *Shipping*.** For Unpaid tab: displaying the unpaid orders.** For All Orders tab: displaying both delivery and pickup orders which the status is *New*, *Preparing*, *Ready*, *Shipping*, *Completed, Unpaid* and refund statuses *Pending Refund*, *Refund Approved*, *Refund Rejected*.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.* I can update status for each order at any tabs:** When the status is New, I can update to Preparing only: the order status is updated to Preparing** When the status is Preparing, I can update to Ready only: the order status is updated to Ready** When the status is Ready, *** Pickup orders: I can update to Completed by two ways:**** Scan QR code: the customer will present the QR code of their order to me, after scanning succesfully, navigate me to Order Detail screen (Completed status) and show the toast message *_“Order Completed\!“_*.**** Manually: in case the customer forgets to bring their device, I can require them to provide their personal info (phone number, ID card…) and allow them to pick up their order without scanning. I can take note (write and take a photo) to keep track or skip, after that, navigate me to Order Detail screen (Completed status) and show the toast message *_“Order Completed\!“_*. I can see the note below the Order Detail screen.*** Delivery orders: KardPOS staff cannot update anymore. The shipper can see the Ready order at Ready tab of Order Delivery app and pick to deliver.* For School Menu orders, it only has two statuses New and Completed. After having been just created, the status is New and the order is on Pickup tab. At Order Detail, I can complete each item of order by Complete button or I can complete all by Pickup button of Order List. After completing all items of order, the status is updated to Completed.* When I update status an order on KanooPOS, that should be synced up to:** Kanoo app / Kanoo web / KZ site.** Kanoo Order Delivery app.** KanooPOS app login on another device.+_Note:_+* Pickup button is only enabled when the status of Pickup order is Ready. Otherwise, it will be grey out.* The mamximum input at Note field is 500 characters including space.* If an order is updated by two staffs at the same time, who goes after will get a message pop-up *_“This order has been processed by another staff.“_* and update the status to the latest status of that order.* User can only request to refund for their orders when the status is Completed, which means refund statuses (Pending Refund, Refund Approved, Refund Rejected) only displayed on completed orders (both Order List and Order Detail screens) at All Orders tab.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|smart-link]  {color:#ff5630}*_Note: For the Pay Now orders, they will be displayed at All Orders tab all the time._*{color}

title: [Android] Kanoo app - Display status for Order (Order List and Order Detail)
description: As a Kanoo user, I want to see the status for each order on Order screen, so that I can keep track my order processing.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_**.** There are 3 refunding statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_Pending Refund / Refund Approved / Refund Rejected._* (this is available now on Kanoo app)* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from KanooPOS app and Order Delivery app whenever my order status is updated.* I want the status to display on four tabs of Orders screen (Pickup, Delivery, Unpaid and All Orders tabs) and Order Detail screen.** For Pickup tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready*** For Delivery tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping*** For Unpaid tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *Unpaid*** For All Orders tab: displaying Delivery/ Pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping, Completed, Cancelled* and Unpaid orders and refund statuses *Pending Refund, Refund Approved and Refund Rejected.** The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.+_Note:_+* User can only request to refund for their orders when the status is Completed, which mean:** Refund button should be hidden for orders at Pickup and Delivery tabs, it’s only displayed on completed orders at All Orders tab.** Refund statuses (Pending Refund, Refund Approved, Refund Rejected) only displayed on completed orders (both Order List and Order Detail screens).** On Order Detail screen (pickup or delivery), the Pickup / Delivery button is fixed at bottom, user can slide the rest of screen to see more info.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|smart-link]

title: Order Delivery App - Login
description: As a system admin, I want to support merchant staffs using Order Delivery App with two platforms Kard and Kanoo as well.+*AC:*+* On Login page I can see:** Logo App: Kanoo Order Delivery** User ID field: the staff will enter his/her user ID.** PIN field: the staff will enter his/her PIN of user ID and login.* After login successfully, the app will show Order List screen containing orders of the merchant where the staff is working for. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2452|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2452|smart-link] )* Every staff created from ARM can login.+_Note:_+* The staff can be logged out if:** Another staff login with the same account on another device.** Session timed out.* The staff can login on KanooPOS and Order Delivery app by the same account.+*Mockup*++:+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/c80e3e06-51e2-467b-8d1f-12ee6f4db272/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/c80e3e06-51e2-467b-8d1f-12ee6f4db272/|smart-link]

title: [iOS] Researching for using the same source code for 4 apps: Kard, HYT, GreenCom, KingdomPay
description: Our 4 apps are having the same features. They just have some differences in UI: logo, images, colorBut we are having 4 separate code branches for them thus we need a lot of effort for code picking, coping to these apps and this also have risks if the developer misses something on the code picking process.This ticket is for research to find a better way to manage the source code of our apps1. Research if we can use the same source code (the same branch) for building 4 apps.2. Find a "feature toggle" solution to handle the differences between these apps3. Draft estimate for the changeNote for QC: Testing is not required for this ticket

title: [BE][KardPOS] Enhancement for an unpaid order details screen after scanning successfully
description: As a staff, after user scans to make payment for unpaid order, I should get notification.+*AC:*+I scan unpaid order to make paymentAfter scanning successfully, show the Notification screen (Completed) with message *“Payment Completed\!“*After close the screen, show Unpaid order with Completed status.!image-2020-12-18-10-26-28-654.png|width=200,height=183!

title: ARM - Store - Categories - Add Products to Categories
description: As a merchant admin, I want to be able to view product categories configured by the tenants that I am associated with to group my products. +*AC:*+* At Store page, I want to have a new tab named Category next to Product tab. * For Category tab:** If the business is not a partner of any tenants, this page will show the empty table of categories with the text *_“No categories found.“_*** If the business is a partner of one or multiple tenants, this page will show the table of categories taken from those tenants, this table will include columns below:*** Name: displaying category name*** Tags: displaying tags of the category*** Number of Products: displaying the number of products of the merchant that belongs to each category.*** Action: display the button named Edit Product List** I can search category by category name and tags.* I want to have the pagination for this tab if the number of categories is more than 10. The maximum number of categories displayed on a single page is 10.* I can open a category and add my products to add into it. A category can contain multiple products.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/844a1563-10f5-4ac4-aace-bbdb6ee84fd8-d119/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/844a1563-10f5-4ac4-aace-bbdb6ee84fd8-d119/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Marketplace - Products Tab
description: +*AC:*+On Marketplace screen, I want to have one more tab named Products.*_Products_** On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system.* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active.* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.** I can search by category name. In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.** I can tap Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Online and Products.* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Product image** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.** Business name:*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* I can search product by product name and business name:** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online and Products.* I can sort product list by:** Latest: sorting product list by latest created date** Price:*** Low to High.*** High to Low.** Most discounted (based on discount percentage): sorting product list by most discount.* By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).* For three sort buttons (Latest, Price and Most Discounted), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.* If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.* User can scroll down to hide Search field and Sorting price lines, but when they scroll up those lines should appear right away. (make it like Shopee app as the video attachment below).+*Mockup:*+ Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8227ec41-8467-4f94-b272-147480d22e9d-d774/screen/d2a472b8-0a4a-49de-988b-8e9b8e9e66b6/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8227ec41-8467-4f94-b272-147480d22e9d-d774/screen/d2a472b8-0a4a-49de-988b-8e9b8e9e66b6/|smart-link]  Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c072332-d71c-4043-8c5f-3b213aba9305-6954/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c072332-d71c-4043-8c5f-3b213aba9305-6954/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Tenant Admin - Manage Product Categories
description: As a tenant admin, I want to be able to define the product categories for my marketplace platform starting from the list of default categories provided by the system.+*AC:*+On the left menu, I click an item named Product Categories to open Product Categories page.On Product Categories page, I can see:* *Import Category* button: On clicking, Import Category pop-up is opened and displays the list of categories created for System. On this list, each item will have a checkbox, I can search and select what category I want to import. There are two buttons:** Import: Close the pop-up, the selected categories will be displayed as a table. Show the message as a toast *_“Imported successfully\!“_* ** Cancel: Close the pop-up, the action is cancelled.* The table of categories including the columns below:** Name: displaying category name** Tags: displaying tags of category** Action:||*Buttons*||*Action*|||Remove|On clicking, Remove Category pop-up is opened:* Message: *_“Are you sure to remove the category_* {color:#6554c0}*_\[name]_*{color}*_?“_** Buttons:** Remove: Close the pop-up and remove the category from the reference.** Cancel: Close the pop-up and the action is cancelled.{color:#ff5630}*When a category is removed from the list of tenant, it will not impact to the list of system admin.*{color}|* I can search category on the table by name and tags* The pagination is displayed below the table.+_Note:_+ When importing, the list of categories on pop-up is filtered by which categories have not existed yet from the list of tenant. (For ex: At first, tenant admin imported 10 categories from system from 1 to 10, if system admin adds a new category, the list on pop-up only displays categories which are added by system admin.On the table of product categories:* Name and Tags should be displayed maximum only one line.* If Name and Tags are too long, there should have ellipsis, if admin hovers the mouse cursor on it, he can see the full Name and Tags.In case if there’s not any categories or no results of searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/1d39b0ff-0859-42a5-8762-576d7c93024b-486a/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/1d39b0ff-0859-42a5-8762-576d7c93024b-486a/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Visipay - Card Listing
description: +*AC:*+* Remove Kash Kard, Credit Card items from the left menu.* I click a new menu items (above ) to open Cards page.* On the page, I can see:** The list of cards ({color:#ff5630}*including Kash Kard, Credit Card, Crypto (BTC/ETH/ZVC) Card*{color}) is displayed as a table including columns below:*** No.*** First Name*** Last Name*** Email Address*** Card Number**** Show *the last 4 digits* for Kash Kard and Credit Card**** Show *the last 4 characters of address* for BTC, ETH or ZVC Card*** Expiration Date: displaying format *mm/yy* (if available)*** Status: displaying *Active* or *Inactive**** Card Type: displaying *Kash Kard*, *Credit Card*, *Crypto**** Account Type: **** Card Type is Kash Kard:***** Consumer: displaying *Personal****** Merchant: displaying *Business***** Card Type is Credit Card: displaying the name of card issuer (*JCB/ Discover**/* *Visa/ American Express/ Diners Club/ Mastercard*)**** Card Type is Crypto: displaying *Bitcoin / Etherum / Zevencoin**** Balance: displaying the balance of Kash Kard only, format *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $550.42, $6,500.00)*** Tenant:**** Display *Kard* / *GreenCom* / *KingdomPay* / … for consumer.**** Display *Default* for business** I can filter the list of cards by Card Type, Account Type, Tenant and Status.** I can search the card by First Name, Last Name, Email Address and Card Number.** I can export CSV file.** I want to see the sorting icon on some columns:*** First Name: sorting by alphabet*** Last Name: sorting by alphabet*** Balance: sorting by lowest or biggest+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/bca21d81-e675-41be-ae33-c022e9ba7ff8-e9f1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/bca21d81-e675-41be-ae33-c022e9ba7ff8-e9f1/|smart-link]

title: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Seperate into 2 tabs
description: +*AC*+* We will split the merchant accounts page into two tabs *Merchant Management* (Current) and *KYC Verification*. * KYC Verification Tab will display the table with the following columns:** Business Name: displaying the business name from registration info.** Account Type: *Individual* or *Corporate*** Email: displaying the email of registration info.** Phone Number: displaying the phone number of registration info.** Country: displaying fully the country name of registration info.** KYC Status (*Pending* / *Approved* / *Rejected*)** Date of Request (KYC verification requested date)** Action:*** Verify button (when the KYC status is Pending): [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2907|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2907|smart-link] *** View Details button (when the KYC status is Approved or Rejected): **** Approved status: On clicking, admin can open the KYC info page with Approved status at top.**** Rejected status: On clicking, admin can open the KYC info page with Reject status at top and the reject reason at bottom. Merchant can re-submit the KYC when the status is rejected (merchant receives the email with the re-submit link). After merchant re-submits KYC already, View Details button is replaced by Verify button again.* On this tab:** Admin can search by business name, email, phone number. If searching session has no results, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“No KYC Requests Found.“_*{color}** Admin can filter by KYC status.** Admin can export CSV file. The columns of file and data will be as same as this tab.+_Note:_+* On KYC Verification tab, there are only merchants who has submitted KYC form to be displayed.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/|smart-link]

title: [Android] - KardPOS Tablet - Scan Product Barcode with External Device
description: As a merchant staff I want to be able to scan product’s barcode using the external device with the same method that we are using for Pay with QR function so that I don’t need to use the tablet’s camera with the current function because using camera will consumer the device battery much.* Add new tab “Enter Code” to the current screen of scanning product like we have for Pay with QR method.* A product will be added into the order if scanned product barcode is valid automatically so that they can continue with other products without doing anymore step. Otherwise, show the message “The product barcode is invalid.” and the popup will be closed automatically after 3 seconds or staff can click on Close button to close the error popup.UI mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/c90832e9-36a1-4fa1-bdfb-f3fdb3a5ca4a-9c5b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/c90832e9-36a1-4fa1-bdfb-f3fdb3a5ca4a-9c5b/|smart-link] *For Android, we will user the Tharo device for testing*

title: Web - Invite - Update for Finder Commission
description: As a consumer, I want to be able to invite both consumer and merchant to join the system, so that I can get invitation bonus.+*AC:*+I click Invite on the top menu to open Invite page.On the screen, I want to have two tabs Invite Users and Invite Businesses*_Invite Users_*I can see a text to show that how much I can get the bonus for inviting someone.*(refer to the excel file)*Below the text, I can see the form which I can enter my friend’s name, email and some info to send the invitation email. The UI will be as same as the current one on web app.{color:#ff5630}*Updated message:*{color}If the bonus configuration on Visipay is:* Invitee bonus is $x.xx and Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee is $y.yy: {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join \[tenant] platform. Click \[invitation link] to sign up to get a bonus $x.xx in points after the first payment minimum $y.yy with Kash Kard.”_*{color}* Invitee bonus is $x.xx and Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee is $0.00: {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join \[tenant] platform. Click \[invitation link] to sign up to get a bonus $x.xx in points.“_*{color}* Invitee bonus is $0.00 and Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee is $y.yy: {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join \[tenant] platform. Click \[invitation link] to sign up and make the first payment minimum $y.yy with Kash Kard. Please contact admin for more details about the commission plan.”_*{color}* Invitee bonus is $0.00 and Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee is $0.00: {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join \[tenant] platform. Click \[invitation link] to sign up. Please contact admin for more details about the commission plan.”_*{color}*_Invite Businesses_*Above the title, I can see a logo representing for business.I can see a text to show that how much I can get the bonus for inviting someone to join ARM platform.*(refer to the excel file)*Below the text, I can see the form which I can enter my friend’s name, email and some info to send the invitation email. The UI will be as same as the current one on web app.{color:#ff5630}*Updated message:*{color}If the bonus configuration on Visipay is:* Invitee bonus is $x.xx and Purchase Subscription Plan is checked: {color:#00b8d9}“{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join ARM. Click \[invitation link] to sign up to get a bonus $x.xx in points after purchasing an ARM subscription plan.”_*{color}* Invitee bonus is $x.xx and Purchase Subscription Plan is unchecked: {color:#00b8d9}“{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join ARM. Click \[invitation link] to sign up to get a bonus $x.xx in points.”_*{color}* Invitee bonus is $0.00 and Purchase Subscription Plan is checked: {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join ARM. Click \[invitation link] to sign up and purchase an ARM subscription plan. Please contact admin for more details about the commission plan.”_*{color}* Invitee bonus is $0.00 and Purchase Subscription Plan is unchecked: {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Inviter Name] has invited you to join ARM. Click \[invitation link] to sign up. Please contact admin for more details about the commission plan.”_*{color}+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/17bb6d7a-af42-4530-8451-80db16e19b7a-42e8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/17bb6d7a-af42-4530-8451-80db16e19b7a-42e8/|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Invite - Update for Finder Commission
description: As a consumer, I want to be able to invite both consumer and merchant to join the system, so that I can get invitation bonus.+*AC:*+I tap Invite icon on Home screen to open Invite screen.On the screen, I want to have two tabs Invite Users and Invite Businesses*_Invite Users_*Above the title, I can see a logo representing for people.I can see a text to show that how much I can get the bonus for inviting someone.{color:#00b8d9}*(refer to the excel file for displaying)*{color}*_Invite Businesses_*Above the title, I can see a logo representing for business.I can see a text to show that how much I can get the bonus for inviting someone to join ARM platform.{color:#00b8d9}*_(refer to the excel file for displaying)_*{color}Below each tab screen, I can see an Invite button at bottom. On tapping, the dialog will be opened which I can choose method to send inviation (mail, SMS or any other media apps).+_Note:_+User can invite an email with two types Consumer and Business at the same time.User should be navigated back to Invite screen after sending invitation successfully.XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/06077a05-a263-41a9-b726-b53bc8bbcd01-5354/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/06077a05-a263-41a9-b726-b53bc8bbcd01-5354/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Visipay - Commission Configuration - Update for Finder Commission
description: As a Visipay admin, I want to be able to configure the finder commission for inviting consumer and ARM merchant to the system.+*AC:*+* I click on Commission Configuration on left menu to open Commission Configuration page.* On the page I can see two sections Consumer Invitation Bonus and Business Invitation Bonus.!339fe4d7-f9f0-43a0-a815-7ce6c0d95d96.png|width=1920,height=1259!*_Consumer Invitation Bonus_*I want to have three fields:* Bonus for Inviter field: ** I can enter bonus amount for inviter.** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00* Bonus for Invitee field: ** I can enter bonus amount for invitee.** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00* Condition (Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee field): ** I can enter minimum purchase amount of invitee so both inviter and invitee can get bonus. *** Note: this is applied for all payment flow by Kash Kard we have currently in system including buying product / gift card, pay with QR, scan to pay (AirPay & unpaid order), Pay With HYT.** {color:#ff5630}*This is only applied for paying by kash kard.*{color}** This condition amount is only applied for only one order and at any time. *** Example: the condition is $10.00, after registering, invitee can make order many times, the system will check which time the pay amount matches to the condition amount and offer points to either inviter or invitee.** If the amount is $0.00, which means after the invitee signs up an account successfully, the bonus will be offered right away for inviter and invitee.*_ARM Merchant Invitation Bonus_*I want to have three fields:* Bonus for Inviter field: I can enter bonus amount for inviter.** I can enter bonus amount for inviter.** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00* Bonus for Invitee field: I can enter bonus amount for invitee.** I can enter bonus amount for inviter.** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00* Condition (Purchase Subscription Plan checkbox): ** I can check/uncheck so both inviter and invitee can get bonus.** This condition will be checked by default. If this is unchecked, inviter and invitee can get bonus if invitee do not purchase ARM Subscription plan.+_Note:_+* Bonus will be offered to users as points. The points are taken from the default merchant of tenant.* If the invitee bonus is configured, the inviter bonus is also required, which means that the admin can configure bonus for inviter only but both must be provided if the invitee has bonus. In case when the invitee has bonus and the inviter bonus is empty or $0.00, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Bonus for Inviter is required.“_*{color}* If the bonus amount is $0.00 or the condition is unchecked, we do not show Condition on Invite screen of mobile or web app.* For the Condition (Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee field): invitee has to make payment minimum the amount once time only, for example: the condition amount is $100.00, invitee has to pay minimum $100.00 so either invitee or invitee can receive the bonus.* Record on My Rewards screen (Point tab of Wallet): ** Description: “Invitation Bonus“.!image-20201221-070640.png|width=323,height=701!
