title: [Android] KardPOS PAX - Received and Process Unpaid Order
description: As a merchant staff, I want to be able to process payment for an unpaid order after it’s sent from the tablet device.+*AC:*+* On PAX device, when the Order Detail screen is auto-opened and the Payment Method pop-up is auto-displayed, I will choose a method to process payment.* The method list includes:** Pay with Card: Customer will give the physical credit card to make payment.** Pay with Cash: Customer will give cash to make payment.** Pay with QR: Customer will present the QR code of Kash Kard or Credit Card on app to make payment.* After payment successfully, I will be navigated back to Order Detail screen and the order status is updated to Completed.

title: [Android] - KardPOS Tablet - Send Unpaid Order to Connected Device (PAX)
description: +*AC:*+* I have configured the connection between my KardPOS app on the tablet device to KardPOS on PAX device already. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2180|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2180|smart-link]).* I can send orders to PAX device in 2 cases:||*Cases*||*Actions*|||I’m creating a casual order on KardPOS app of tablet device. When I click Create Order button:|* On PAX device, the Order Detail screen of the current order is auto-opened and Payment Method pop-up is auto-displayed as well.* I can select a method to process payment on PAX.||I created an unpaid order already. On Order List or Order Detail screen (tablet), when I click Pay Order button:|* On PAX device, the Order Detail screen of the current order is auto-opened and Payment Method pop-up is auto-displayed as well.* I can select a method to process payment on PAX.|

title: [Android] - KardPOS - Connect PAX device
description: As a merchant staff, I want to be able to connect KardPOS app on mobile/tablet device to KardPOS app on PAX device, so that I can make unpaid order and help the customer to make payment more quickly and conveniently.+*AC:*+* I click a new item on the list menu on KardPOS named *Connect Device* to open Connect Device screen.* On the screen, I can see:** Text: *_“To connect a PAX device, you have to enter the serial number to the below field.“_*** A field to enter.** Save button: On clicking show the message pop-up *_“You have configured successfully.“_** After the connection is configured already, if I want to connect another PAX device, I can open this screen and edit the serial number.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4245a048-635e-472f-b1d4-6463968b350c-1716/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4245a048-635e-472f-b1d4-6463968b350c-1716/|smart-link]

title: Kanoo - BE - Save Shopping Cart
description: As a customer I want to be able to save products to my shopping cart to order then.+*Acceptance Criteria:*+* Show the toast message “{color:#00b8d9}*_Product added to cart_*{color}“ every time adding product to cart successfully.* On Home screen and marketplace screen, I can see a new icon next to Pay Bills icon named *Cart*, on tapping I can be navigated to Your Cart screen. ** The number badge should be shown on Cart icon of Home screen and Marketplace screen. The number badge will be refreshed when the home screen is opened** If only number is refreshing, user should not see the loading circle, it is a bad UX, just call the API to refresh and update the UI when it done* I can select and add products from different merchants to my Cart.* I can select a product multiple times to add to my Cart.* Cart is saved on server and I can see it after that on all devices (Kanoo app, Kanoo Web and KZ site)* I can open Product Detail screen (mobile) / pop-up (web) from the Cart screen (for product including or not including options).* For each product on the cart, I want to see:** Product name** Product image** Quantity field to edit** Product price (Original price - Discount price)** Options for a product (if available)* Cart should be update when:** I added a new product from a store detail / shopping screen to my cart.** I update the number of product that I want to buy on Cart detail screen:** I remove any products on cart detail screen* I can see Checkout button for each merchant on Cart like the web app is doing.+_Validation Rules:_+* If there is no products in the cart, show the message at center of screen {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your Cart Is Empty.“_*{color}* The cart on Kanoo app or web will be only synced to KZ site of the default konnect zone:** Ex: User adds 3 items of store A and 2 items of store B, when login to KZ site default of A he/she will see 3 items of A. Similarly, he/she will see 2 items of B.* For the product which has options, user can tap on that product (image or option) to edit options of that one.* User can edit the number of a product they want to buy:** By (+) or (-) buttons:*** User can decrease the number to 0 to remove a product from the cart.*** User can increase maximum to the current inventory number of a product.** By enter manually. If they enter the number larger than the current inventory number of that product, show the toast message saying {color:#ff5630}*_“This product has_*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}{color:#ff5630}*_x_*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}{color:#ff5630}*_items left in stock.“_*{color}, then the number user enters will be auto-changed to *x*. (*x: the current inventory number of a product*).* When user is at Product screen, the merchant admin disables any products, user adds that product to cart, show the toast message {color:#ff5630}*“*{color}{color:#ff5630}*_This product is not available currently._*{color}{color:#ff5630}*“*{color}* If the cart on mobile app and web app has the same number (3 items): ** *_User removes all 3 items on mobile app:_**** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart Detail page, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** If they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, they should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** *_User removes or makes payment 1 of 3 items on mobile app_**** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart page, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, they should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** *_User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely_**** On web app, if they click Checkout button, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, they should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** *_User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely_**** On web app, if they update any item on web app (edit number, change options, …), show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“_. After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.* When user opens Cart screen (from Home screen / left menu) or tapping Checkout button on Shopping Cart screen , if there is any products being changed before they make payment:** *_Case 1: For products which changed or affected by Product Image / Product Title / Option / Description / Inventory Number (out of stock or not enough in stock) or the category containing product deleted by merchant admin._**** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}*** After close the pop-up:**** The products which have been changed should be removed.**** Keep the products which have not been changed anything.** *_Case 2:  For products which changed or affected by Price or Tax_**** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}*** Show the list of products normally.*** Update the latest price and tax for products which are changed about price and tax.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Kanoo app - Marketplace - Shopping
description: As a Kanoo user, I want to have a Marketplace screen on the app so that I can explore the stores aroung my current position.+*AC:*+*_Shopping_** On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system. * The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active and set as default as well.* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.** For each selected category, it will be highlighted. ** I can tap Clear button to clear all filter. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to Shopping tab.** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.** Business name:*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* I can search product by product name and business name, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.** Keep the searching results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between Nearby, Online and Shopping.* I can sort product list by:** Latest: sort product list by latest created date** Price:*** Low to High*** High to Low.** Most discounted (based on discount percentage): sort product list by most discount.* By default, the list of products will be sorted by created date (Newest).* If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.* User can scroll down to hide Search field and Sorting price lines, but when they scroll up those lines should appear right away. (make it like Shopee app as the video attachment below). Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/393838ac-d44f-4d3d-b082-07092fb59c7d|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/393838ac-d44f-4d3d-b082-07092fb59c7d|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Kanoo app - Marketplace - Gift Cards
description: As a Kanoo user, I want to have a Marketplace screen on the app so that I can explore the stores around my current position.+*AC:*+*_Gift cards_** On this tab, I want to see the list of all gift cards which are approved and enabled in system.  * The list will be sorted by: ** Most discounted (percentage).** Alphabet (if gift cards have the same discount percentage )* For each Gift Card, I want to see:** Gift card image** Gift card name** Gift card value (single or multiple): displaying in USD and points as well.** Discount percentage (if available)** Business name* I can search gift card by gift card name or business name, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.** Keep the searching results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.* I can filter gift card by tapping Filter icon on Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of business categories screen.** I can select -deselect- only one category to filter.** Show the name of the selected category. (the default value is *All Categories*).** I can select the *All Categories* to clear filter.** Filter icon should be bold and colored (Kanoo theme color) if I am using filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when:*** -Returning Gift Cards tab from any store details screen.-*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Gift Cards and Shopping.* If no gift cards is available or no matched searching results, display *_“No gift cards found“_*.* I can click any gift cards to buy (Checkout flow will be kept as the current one).Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/7d050279-d850-4c97-b76f-d54e427b90e9|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/7d050279-d850-4c97-b76f-d54e427b90e9|smart-link]

title: [Backend] - Consumer App - Display transaction of external payment
description: As a customer, I want to see the transaction on my consumer app after I make external payment with any e-commerce sites.+*AC:*+*_Transaction List screen_** Transaction Type: *_Payment_** Remitter: ** Kash Kard/*xxxx** Credit Card/*xxxx** BTC Card/*xxxx** ETH Card/*xxxx** ZVC Card/*xxxx* Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx* Amount: display amount in USD, -if I make payment by crypto card, let’s also display amount in BTC/ETH/ZVC currency and exchange rate.-*_Transaction Detail screen_** Transaction Type: *_Payment_** Amount: display amount in USD -if I make payment by crypto card, let’s also display amount in BTC/ETH/ZVC currency and exchange rate.-* Transaction ID* Description: Make payment externally by Kash Kard / Credit Card / BTC Card / ETH Card / ZVC Card.* Status: Completed* Transaction Date* Remitter:** Kash Kard/*xxxx** Credit Card/*xxxx** BTC Card/*xxxx** ETH Card/*xxxx** ZVC Card/*xxxx* Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx+_Note:_+ The UI design should be as same as the current one on mobile app.

title: ARM Merchant - Product - having a lack of bar-code-printing icon
description: # Rollback the function of printing a barcode of a product on Products screen.## Barcode is always generated using UPC.## Disable Print button if UPC is empty.# ARM Merchant - Edit a product## Allow merchant to scan barcode of their product to fill in into UPC screen instead of entering that text manually.

title: Store Details - Connected
description: When I access to a store details of a merchant, I cannot know if I have set a connection with that merchant so that I cannot start a conversation with that merchant* UI and behavior: reference Kanoo App* I would like to set a connection with a merchant in his store details like Kanoo app. * After set the connection with the merchant, I could start to chat with that merchant* I access to a store details, I would see if I have set a connection with that merchant ( sync with Kanoo app)

title: Kanoo - View Unpaid Order
description: +*AC:*+* I tap Orders button to open Order List screen.* On Order List screen, I can see one more tab named *Unpaid* next to Delivery tab. This tab will contain all unpaid orders created from KanooPOS tablet. * The unpaid orders are also contained by All Orders tabs.* The list on Unpaid tab will be sorted by created date (latest).* After being paid from KanooPOS ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2137|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2137|smart-link] ):** The order will be moved to All Orders tab with Completed status.** Refund button will be displayed on Order Detail screen of this order, user can request refund for this order.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|smart-link]

title: KanooPOS - View, Pay and Cancel Unpaid Order
description: +*AC:*+*_View unpaid orders_*I tap Orders button to open Order List screen.||*Unpaid tab*||*All Orders tab*|||Only display all unpaid orders.|Display all unpaid orders as well as the orders which are paid already (Completed).|*_Pay unpaid orders_** For each unpaid order from Order List screen, I can see two buttons Pay Order and Cancel. These two buttons are also displayed on Order Detail screen.* Pay Order button: refer to the ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2699|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2699|smart-link] *_Cancel unpaid orders_** On tapping Cancel button, show the pop-up:** Title: Cancel Order** Message: *_“Are you sure to cancel this order?“_*** Options:*** Yes: Close the pop-up, show the toast message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Order cancelled.“_*{color}*** No: Close the pop-up, nothing’s changed.* After cancel successfully:** Show Orders screen (All Orders tab) if cancelling from Orders screen.** Show Order Detail screen if cancelling from Order Detail screen.** The order on consumer app:*** Update status to Cancelled.*** Change from Unpaid to All Orders tab.+_Note:_+* When user A create unpaid order, there’s only user A who can make payment for his/her order, user A’s friend cannot do it by their QR Code of Cash Card.* On this scope of release, the staff can only scan the QR code of Cash Card from Kanoo app, they cannot scan gift card.* A Gift Cash Card can be used only if the merchant is associated with the government.+*Mockup*+:[https://xd.adobe.com/view/76a23d44-e4eb-4090-9405-859e6365dd17-23f1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/76a23d44-e4eb-4090-9405-859e6365dd17-23f1/|smart-link]

title: KanooPOS Tablet - Create Order
description: As the merchant staff, I want to be able to create an order for customer at store.+*AC:*+I tap Create Order button on the menu list to open Create Order screen. The button should be located at the first home screen after I login to KanooPOS.On Create Order screen:* At top, I can see three fields First Name, Last Name and Phone Number and an edit icon, on clicking the Customer Information Dialog is opened, it includes fields below:** Phone Number (*required*): On this field I can select the country code (country flag and number code) before entering the phone number behind, the app will check the phone number and it will suggest the list of users matching to that phone number. In this case, First Name and Last Name fields will be auto-filled afterwards.** First Name: auto-filled from the phone number.** Last Name: auto-filled from the phone number.* I can see the list of product categories of my merchant. ** This list displays all product categories created by merchant admin:*** When I select a specified category, show the list of products associated with that category.*** When I select All, show all products by the display condition below.** This list is sort by category name (alphabet).** I can slide to see more.* Below the list of product categories, I can see the list of products belonging to the current category. ** {color:#6554c0}+*Display Condition*+{color}{color:#6554c0}+:+{color} Each product being displayed on the screen must be contained by at least one konnect category (Product type), and this konnect category must belong to at least one konnect zone which is being active.** A product can be still displayed even if it’s not associated with any product categories:** For each product, I can see product image, product name, price (original and discount price) and Add button. I can tap that to add product to the cart:*** For a product which have no options: it will be added to Cart right away.*** For a product which have options inside: Product Detail pop-up will be opened. I can select options and tap Add to List button to add it to Cart.** The list of product will be sorted by the latest created date from top downwards.* Below the list of products, I can see Scan Products button: I can tap that to open Scanning Product screen. When Scanning Product screen is opened, I can see Browse Products button, I can tap that to switch again the list of products screen again. In case scanning invalid barcode, show the message “Invalid barcode. Please try again.“* I can search products by product name or barcode.* At right side, I can see the cart zone containing products added:** For each product of Cart, I can see: *** Product image, product name, product price (discounted), product options.*** Quantity field: I can edit the number of products I want to buy by tapping + / - button or modifying the number.*** (x) icon: I can tap to remove the product out of Cart.** Above the Cart, I can see Clear button. On tapping, I can remove all products out of Cart. The confimation pop-up will be displayed *_“Are you sure to remove all items?“_* and two buttons:*** OK: Close the pop-up and remove all items from cart.*** Cancel: Close the pop-up and nothing’s changed.** Below the Cart, I can see Sub Total, Tax and Total amounts and Create Order button. ** On tapping Create Order button, Payment Method pop-up is opened:*** Pay with QR: After selecting, the payment screen is opened (same as when tapping Pay button from the menu list):**** The paid amount is auto-filled by the order amount. Payment Cards will be the same, too.**** Discount field will be not displayed.**** The function works on this screen will be as same as the old flow. (scan Cash Card / Gift Cash Card / Sand Dollar with gift card)*** Pay Later: Save as an unpaid order.+_Note:_+* A guest (Non-Kanoo user) cannot make an unpaid order. Confirm button is only enabled if Phone number, First name and Last name are filled by a Kanoo user info.* A product cannot be displayed on Create Order screen in cases below, if it’s added to cart before, when tapping Create Order button and when making payment, show the error message pop-up *_“Order failed\! There’s an error occurred with the business. Please contact Administrator for support.“_*_._ When closing this pop-up, all invalid products will be removed from the cart and from the list.** Merchant account is deactivated / expired.** Konnect zone is paused / expired.** Konnect category is deleted / changed. (if it is the only category which contains product)** The product is disabled or deleted on ARM site.* If a product is changed something about *Product Image, Product Name, Price* (both original and discounted price), *Option*, *Tax*, when tapping Create Order button or when making payment, show the error message pop-up *_“Order failed\! Some products have been changed.“_*_._ When closing this pop-up, all changed products will be removed from the cart.* A product can be displayed even if it’s out of stock or not, the staff can add to cart as usual, when tapping Create Order button or when tapping making payment, the pop-up will be shown and contain the list of products which are out of stock or not enough quantity. (if available). This should be as same as KardPOS app.* A Gift Cash Card can be used only if the merchant is associated with the government. +*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f442811-8f92-4b36-9c2a-8d5fe05bc2f3-6a17/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f442811-8f92-4b36-9c2a-8d5fe05bc2f3-6a17/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] - Kanoo web - Marketplace - Shopping tab
description: As a Kanoo user, I want to have a Shopping tab on Marketplace page, so that I can search and buy product more easily.+*AC:*+* On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system. * Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active and default as well.* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.** I can select Clear button to clear filter.** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.* By default, I can see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use smaller font size if the price is too long.** Business name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.** Add to Cart button: *** The behavior when click on this button should be the same with the button add to Card on Product category detail screen so I can add product to my cart with this button* I can search product by product name and business name.* I can sort product list by:** Latest (created date of product)** Price:*** Low to High*** High to Low** Most discount (based on discount percentage): For example product A and B has discount percentage 5% and 10%, product B will be above product A.* By default, the list of products will be sorted by Price (Low to high).* If no products are available or no matched searching / filtering results, display *_“No products found.“_*.* When I scroll down to see more products, the search box and the sort button should be hide and when I scroll up, they should be show again. Please refer to this behavior for this AC !demo_gif.gif|width=28.49462365591398%!+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Kanoo app - Marketplace - Nearby
description: +*AC:*+*_Nearby_** On this tab, I want to see the list of all konnect zones (store) near my position (within 10 miles). I can scroll down to view more and the list will be sorted by:** Distance from my position (nearest)** Alphabet (business name)* Each konnect zone must be active and selected as Show On Marketplace to be shown on this tab.* For each store, I want to see:** Merchant logo image** Business name** Business category** Store’s address** The distance from my position to the store** Discount percentage (if available)** Rating stars* I can tap on any stores to open Store Detail screen (Konnect Zone detail) .* I can search store by business name or business category, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by *blank characters* or clearing keyword.** Keep the searching results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.* I can filter stores by tapping Filter icon on Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of business categories screen.** I can select / deselect only one category to filter.** Show the name of the selected category. (the default value is *All Categories*).** I can select the *All Categories* to clear filter..** Filter icon should be bold and colored (Kanoo theme color) if I am using filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.* If no stores is available or no matched searching results, display *_“No stores found“_*.Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/|smart-link]

title: [Arm][Menu Item] - Change the label from "Load" to "Load with Cash"
description: Load with Cash at merchant, but now the UI just shows "Load" when funding to KK at merchant  !image-20201119-102519.png|width=1787,height=938!. To avoid confusion for users, I think we should update it to "Load with Cash"

title: BE - Consumer App - Update Notifications for Buying Products
description: +*AC:*+||*Current Behavior*||*Update*|||!image-20210208-023802.png|width=356,height=764!|Title: *Point Reward*Content:* For each item of any types of product, user can get a defined number of points, we should sum up all points as one notification: *_“You got <number> points for buying products.”_* (Ex: User buys 5 iPhones, each item he can get 10 pts, so the notification is “You got 50 points for buying products.“)* For cashback points: *_“You got <number> cashback points after making payment $<amount>“_* (You got 10 cashback points after making payment $100.00“)Image: Business Logo ImageRefer to this document: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link]|+_Note:_+ This ticket will be applied for buying product flow from consumer app and KardPOS as well.

title: Kanoo - ARM Admin - Set default merchant for Kanoo web app
description: As a Kanoo master admin, I want to setup a default merchant to display on Home page of Kanoo web app.+*AC:*+* I login to ARM by admin account.* On the list of menu items, I can see a new one named Default Merchant.* On clicking I can open the page Default Merchant.* I can see two drop-down list fields:** Business: show the business name*** The default value is “Select a business”. *** Only show the list of businesses which are being active.*** When I select any merchants, Konnect zones list below will be shown correspondingly.** Konnect zone: show the konnect zone name*** The default value is “Select a konnect zone”.***  *Nov 30, 2020:* Only show the list of konnect zones which are being active and set as default KZ of each merchant.* I can see Save button to save a new konnect zone of any merchants as a default merchant.* After setting default merchant succcesfully, show a message pop-up: *_“The default merchant was set up successfully.“_*+Note:+* If the master admin deactivates a merchant account and sets up default merchant with that account failed, let’s show the message *_“The merchant has been deactivated currently.“_** -If the merchant admin pauses a konnect zone and the master admin sets up default merchant with that konnect zone failed, let’s show the message- *-_“The konnect zone has been deactivated currently.“_-** If the konnect zone of any merchant is not selected as default, paused or expired and the master admin sets up default merchant with that konnect zone failed, let’s show message *_“The konnect zone is invalid.“_** If the merchant account is deleted and the master admin sets up default merchant with that merchant failed, let’s show message *_“The merchant has been deleted.“_*

title: KardPOS - Order List - Support filter and search orders
description: As a staff at store, I want to be able to filter the list of orders which has been created at the terminal with the same location with me, so that I can find it and make payment quickly.+*AC:*+* I click Orders button to open Order List screen.* On the screen:** I can filter the order list by options below:*** Location: displaying the list of locations which have been registered terminals by a drop-down list. I can select one location to filter the list.*** Order Date: displaying Today by default, user can select a date range to filter the list. *** Status: *(This filter option is hidden for Completed tab)***** All (default): displaying all orders with all statuses**** New**** Preparing**** Ready**** Shipping**** Unpaid*** Type:**** All (default): displaying both Delivery and Pickup orders**** Delivery**** Pickup*** When filter is being used:**** The icon should be highlighted.**** The filter should not sync each other tabs.*** I can clear all the filter.** I can search orders by Order Number, Customer Name.*** This function is only worked on each tab seperately, which means user can only search orders with New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping on Processing tab only, and it is similar on Completed tab.*** When using search: **** Search results should be auto-cleared after clearing the keywords, show all orders as before.**** The results should be kept when user switches between 2 tabs. It will be gone if user open the other screen.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/1815368c-09ea-4b02-9cd2-8a27972c9050-4d46/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/1815368c-09ea-4b02-9cd2-8a27972c9050-4d46/|smart-link]

title: Web Apps - Pay for a Merchant with Airpay  Method
description: As a customer, I want to be able to pay any merchants by AirPay Method on my app.+*AC:*+ *From Store detail page* {color:#ff5630}*(applied for the ARM merchant only, not InComm merchant)*{color}* I want to have Pay button show on this page.* On tapping Pay button, Enter Amount pop-up is opened (refer to AC1).* After entering amount and tap Continue button, show the Confirm & Pay pop-up, which should follow the current UI of buying product flow (refer to AC1):** If I have verified KYC, the default card is Kash Kard, I can change to Credit Card.** If I haven’t verified KYC yet:*** If I added the credit card, show Credit Card as the default card.*** If I do not add any cards yet, show Select Payment Method, on tapping I can add a new card to pay.* After tapping Confirm Payment button, show Payment Complete page. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from top menu).+_Note:_+In this payment case, coupon Buy X get Y cannot be shown if user wants to redeem coupon, they only can use percentage coupon or voucher.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3768f003-8056-4a23-919d-9e1bc4baa802-623b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3768f003-8056-4a23-919d-9e1bc4baa802-623b/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] - Consumer App - Checkout Order - Display Cashback Points

title: [Backend] - KardPOS - Order Detail - Show QR code of Unpaid order
description: As a merchant admin, I want to show QR code of *unpaid* order for customer to scan and make payment for this type of order.+*AC:*+On Order Detail screen of *unpaid* order, I can see a QR code below Pay Order and Cancel button.Below QR code, there’s a code by text including 12 characters (alphabet and numeric). The customer can scan or type the code to make payment for the order.This QR code will never be expired.User will open mobile app and scan the QR code to make payment.+_Note:_+If I and another staff are handling an unpaid order nearly at the same time:* At Order List screen (Processing tab), tapping on an unpaid order which was paid already will navigate to Completed tab with the message pop-up *_“This order has been completed already.“_** -At Order Detail screen, when user scans QR code, show the message pop-up on consumer app- *-_“This order has been paid already.“_-*-_._- -On KardPOS, tapping Back button will navigate to Order List screen (Completed tab).-*User can scan unpaid order if AirPay setting on ARM site is enabled or not.*

title: [Backend] - Point Reward for Payment
description: As a customer, I expect to see the points rewarded to my wallet for my payment and order purchasing to a merchant if that merchant has cashback rules with points.* I can see record history for cashback points in My Reward section of Points under Wallet.** Icon: reuse the point reward icon.** Message displayed: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback”_*{color}* I can see my points balance to be increased after I make and pay for an order successfully.** Unpaid orders created by merchant staff on KardPOS will not have cashback points until they are paid.* I receive a push notification for my point reward of this with the below content.** {color:#00b8d9}You receive XXX points from \[Merchant Business Name] after purchasing $X.XX{color}Cashback rules are applied for the payment types below by Kash Kard and Credit Card as well:* Purchase order.* Purchase gift card.* Pay with QR at store.* Make payment via AirPay with the QR code of merchant at store.* Make payment for an unpaid order at store.* Pay with HYT / Kard.The amount that will be used to calculate the point reward is the final amount user pay (exclude cause2fund amount).For example: Sub-total: 10; Tax: 1; Gift card: -2; Coupon: -3; Point used: -4; Cause2Fund: 5=> Amount = 10+1-2-3-4 = 2. the point reward will be calculate base on $2

title: [Backend] - KardPOS - Display QR Code for Payment
description: +*AC:*+As a merchant I want to have a screen to show my QR code on KardPOS app for customers to scan to pay for my merchant at store.* Add a new menu item named *Payment QR Code*, on tapping I can open Payment QR Code screen.* Add new screen to show Payment QR Code.* The payment flow is the same as flow of scanning QR code printed from ARM. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1812|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1812|smart-link] ).* After scanning, show Payment Complete on consumer app only.+_Note:_+The QR code from KardPOS must be as same as the QR code from ARM Merchant site.

title: Consumer app - Scan QR code of unpaid order to pay
description: As a merchant, I want to have an option to have QR code of *unpaid* order in order customers to scan to pay.This is the flow.* The staff creates *unpaid* order on KardPOS tablet.* Staff opens that *unpaid* order detail screen and show QR code of that order to customer.* Customer selects Kash Kard or Credit Card from their wallet and select Scan to Pay to scan QR code of that *unpaid* order to pay for it. * After scanning, show Confirm & Pay screen, which should follow the current UI of buying product flow:** The default payment method is Kash Kard or Credit Card, I cannot change it.** I can see Sub Total, You Pay amounts displayed correctly.** I can redeem coupon, gift card or points for this payment.** Cause2Fund option also displayed here.** I can tap Confirm Payment button displayed at the bottom of this screen to continue payment.*** Show Order Completed screen on KardPOS.*** Show Payment Complete screen on consumer app.*** The order status changed from Unpaid to Completed. (moved to Completed tab).

title: [Backend] - Mobile Apps - Pay for a Merchant with Airpay  Method
description: As a customer, I want to be able to pay any merchants by AirPay Method on my app.+*AC1:*+ *From Kash Kard or Credit Card detail screen (*{color:#ff5630}*only applied for ARM merchants only, not InComm merchants*{color}*)*||*Merchant*||*Unpaid Order*|||* On the card detail screen (Kash Kard or Credit Card), I can see a new payment option named *_Scan to Pay_*.* When I tap *_Scan to Pay_*, Scan QR Code screen is opened. I will scan QR code, {color:#ff5630} *which is the AirPay code of merchant* {color}({color:#ff5630}*define in* {color}[https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1811|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1811|smart-link]) or {color:#ff5630}*from KardPOS* {color}([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1815|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1815|smart-link]){color:#ff5630} {color}.* After scanning QR code, Enter Amount screen is opened, I can see:** Merchant name is displayed at the top of this screen and center-aligned** A field to enter an amount.** Continue button: on tapping it’ll show Confirm & Pay screen. This button should be disabled if the amount field is equals to $0.00* Confirm & Pay screen should follow the current UI of buying product flow:** I can see Sub Total, You Pay, Discount, Cashback amounts displayed.** I can redeem coupon, gift card or point for the current payment.** Cause2Fund option also displayed here.** I can tap Confirm Payment button displayed at the bottom of this screen to continue payment.** The default payment method is Kash Kard or Credit Card. I can change if I want.* After tapping Confirm Payment button, show Payment Complete screen. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from left menu).|* On the card detail screen (Kash Kard or Credit Card), I can see a new payment option named *_Scan to Pay_*.* When I tap *_Scan to Pay_*, Scan QR Code screen is opened. * The staff will show me the QR code of unpaid order from KardPOS to scan.{color:#ff5630} {color}({color:#ff5630} {color}[https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1867|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1867|smart-link]{color:#ff5630}*).*{color}* After scanning QR code, the Confirm & Pay screen is opened.* Confirm & Pay screen should follow the current UI of buying product flow:** I can see Sub Total, Tax, You Pay, Discount, Cashback amounts displayed.** I can redeem coupon, gift card or point for this payment.** Cause2Fund option also displayed here.** I can tap Confirm Payment button displayed at the bottom of this screen to continue payment.** The default payment method is Kash Kard or Credit Card. I cannot change if I want.* After tapping Confirm Payment button:** -Show Order Complete screen on KardPOS.-** Show Payment Complete screen on consumer app. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from left menu).** The order status changed from Unpaid to Completed. (moved to Completed tab).|+*AC2:*+ *From Store detail screen* {color:#ff5630}*(applied for the ARM merchant only, not InComm merchant)*{color}* On tapping Pay button, Enter Amount screen is opened (refer to AC1).* After entering amount and tap Continue button, show the Confirm & Pay screen, which should follow the current UI of buying product flow (refer to AC1):** If I have verified KYC, the default card is Kash Kard, I can change to Credit Card.** If I haven’t verified KYC yet:*** If I added the credit card, show Credit Card as the default card.*** If I do not add any cards yet, show Select Payment Method, on tapping I can add a new card to pay.* After tapping Confirm Payment button, show Payment Complete screen. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from left menu).+_Note:_+In this payment case, coupon Buy X get Y cannot be shown if user wants to redeem coupon, they only can use percentage coupon or voucher.air_pay_qr_code_invalid: *_“This code is invalid.“_*user_not_found: *_“The merchant cannot be found.“_*user_disabled: *_“The merchant is currently inactive.“_*air_pay_disabled_feature: *_“AirPay feature is currently inactive.“_*order_completed: *_“This order has been completed already.“_*order_not_unpaid: *_“This order is invalid.“_*invalid_owner_unpaid_order: *_“This order belongs to the other customer.“_*+Mockup:+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a037bbe1-8d31-4365-be20-cc09e818a5ed-f564/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a037bbe1-8d31-4365-be20-cc09e818a5ed-f564/]

title: ARM Merchant - Print Payable QR Code
description: As a merchant admin, I would like to provide a code to customers, so the customers can scan to do payment to me via Airpay method at anywhere and anytime.+*AC:*+* I login to ARM by my merchant account.* I open Account page, and switch to Payment tab.* On Payment Method page, I can see a new tab named *_AirPay_* right next to Point tab.* On clicking *_AirPay_* tab, I can open the screen which contains my payment QR code. On this screen, I can see:** My business logo image.** QR code.** Character code.** Instruction text: {color:#00b8d9}_“_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Please open the mobile app and scan the QR code to process payment._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}_“_{color}** Print QR button: I can print QR code in a large size.** AirPay Settings: I can see three options *_Enable_*_,_ *_SMS Notification_* and *_Email Notification_*. I can check/uncheck one or two options at the same time.*** *_Enable:_***** If this option is checked, customers are able to do payment via AirPay.**** If this option is unchecked, customer are not able to do payment via AirPay. At that time, if my QR code is scanned, show the error message {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_AirPay feature is currently inactive._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}*** *_SMS Notification:_* If this option is checked, I can get a SMS message every time any customer makes payment. This message will be sent directly to my phone number during the registration. **** Message content: {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Your account has received a payment_* {color}{color:#00b8d9}*$<payment amount>*{color}{color:#00b8d9} *_via AirPay_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*.* {color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx_*{color}*“.**** *_Email Notification:_* If this option is checked, I can get an email every time any customer makes payment. This email will be sent to my email address during the registration.**** Email subject: *AirPay Notification***** Email template and content: refer to the template file attached below.*** By default, three options are all checked.* Save button: After ticking any options of notification above, I can click on this button to save the settings** If the settings saved successfully, show the message {color:#00b8d9}_“Notification settings have been saved successfully.“_{color}.** If the settings saved unsuccessfully, show the message {color:#00b8d9}_“Notification settings have been saved unsuccessfully.“_{color}.* After any payment via AirPay being done successfully, the transaction is recorded on Transactions page with transaction category Card Purchase (ARM) and Payment (consumer app).

title: [Backend] - Display Cashback Rules on app
description: As a merchant, I want my cashback rules are showed for my store.* Here are places to show cashback rules.** Marketplace** Search Business** Store Detail* Below is the way to show cashback rules.** Design: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/9f730305-09b8-4808-9e9a-238f2c18e019-ca20/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/9f730305-09b8-4808-9e9a-238f2c18e019-ca20/|smart-link] * Note: We need to remove the old style of displaying the discount percent and replace with the new style

title: Configure Cashback Rules
description: As a merchant admin, I want to be able to configure Cashback Rules for my store on ARM.+*AC:*+* Access new tab Cashback Rules after Promotions tab of Campaigns screen. * Cashback rules are applied for the payment types below by Kash Kard and Credit Card as well:** Purchase order.** Purchase gift card.** Pay with QR at store.** Make payment via AirPay with the QR code of merchant at store.** Make payment for an unpaid order at store.* Cashback Type** *_Instant Discount_**** Customers will pay for the amount after the discount.*** By default, the amount field is 0%.*** I can edit the amount right on the field and click Save button to save the change.*** This is the percentage to be the same as the existing discount configuration “VisiKard Network Commission percent”.** *_Point Reward:_* Customers pay for the full amount and get points rewarded to their point balance to redeem for later order or exchange to reward Mastercard.*** _Pay At Least:_**** User need to pay at least an certain amount to get cashback point to wallet. This amount should be the final amount which user has to pay for any payment types.**** The amounts of each row must be different from each other and the system will select one range matching to pay amount to apply the cashback rule. If two rows have the same amount, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“This cashback rule is existing.“_*{color}**** I can add more rows if I want, after adding the list of rows will be sorted from the smallest to largest.**** By default, the amount of each line shown as View mode (the fields will be grey out).*** _Cashback Amount:_ This is the number of points for Point Reward. The number must be larger than 0, if not showing the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Amount must be larger than 0.“_*{color}*** _Edit button:_ On clicking, the page should be changed to Edit mode, Edit button is replaced by Save and Cancel buttons. After editting: **** Save: on clicking, the new change is applied and the list of rules will be sorted again.***** Success message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was saved successfully.“_*{color}***** Failed message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was saved unsuccessfully.“_*{color}**** Cancel: on clicking, the page should be changed to View mode only.*** _Delete button:_ On clicking, show a confirmation pop-up (the UI will be as same as the current UI of ARM pop-up):**** Title: *Delete Cashback Rule***** Message: *_Are you sure to delete this cashback rule?_***** Buttons:***** Yes: Close the pop-up, the row is gone. ****** Success message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was deleted successfully.“_*{color}****** Failed message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was deleted unsuccessfully.“_*{color}***** No: Close the pop-up only.* Remove “VisiKard Network Commission percent” from the Account tab because the discount configuration is moved to Cashback Rules.Design: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/9f730305-09b8-4808-9e9a-238f2c18e019-ca20/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/9f730305-09b8-4808-9e9a-238f2c18e019-ca20/|smart-link]

This code will expire within 5 minutes right after you receive this mail._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Code: xxxxxx_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Sincerely,_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_\[App Name] Team_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Tenant Signature_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_“_*{color}Sample template:!image-20210223-090032.png|width=1338,height=603!

title: [Android] - Verification Code and Reset Wallet PIN
description: As a system admin, I want to send a verication code to customer if they want to reset their wallet PIN on consumer app.+*AC:*+* User taps Forgot Wallet PIN on Settings screen to open Enter OTP Code screen.* On Enter OTP Code screen, user can see:** Title: *Enter OTP Code.*** Intrusction text: *_“An OTP code has been sent to your email. Please enter the code here to proceed to reset your wallet PIN."_*** A field to enter the code.** *“Send Again”* text below the field allows user to get a new code and countdown time (duration: *60s*). While the time is being counted down, the Send Again text must be disabled.** *Continue* button: open Enter PIN screen, this button is disabled when the code field is empty or filled by blank.* On Enter PIN screen:** Fields: *** New PIN and Verify New PIN: only allow numeric characters, max length: 4 characters.** Confirm button: This button is disabled if New PIN or Verify New PIN field is empty or filled by blank.** OTP code will be verified at this step.*** If the OTP code is correct: **** If Verify New PIN does not match to the New PIN, show the message pop-up *_“Verify new PIN does not match.“_*, and then the verify new PIN field should be deleted for user to enter the code again.**** If matching, show the message pop-up***** Title: *Wallet PIN Updated\!****** Message: *_“You can now use your new wallet PIN.“_****** OK button: navigate user back to Settings screen.*** If the OTP code is incorrect, show the message pop-up *“**_OTP is incorrect. Attempted x/5.“_*_._ User will have maximum 5 attempts, if he/she fails at the last time (5th) show the message pop-up *_“You will be logged out due to entering OTP incorrectly too many times.“_*, tapping OK on the pop-up will kick user out of the app. If user attempts to login again, show the message pop-up *_“Your account has been locked. Please contact Administrator for support.“_**** If the OTP expires, show the message pop-up *_“OTP code has expired.“_** An OTP code will expire within 5 minutes right after user receives the email. (Ex: if user receives at 05:00PM, the OTP code will expired at 05:05PM).+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|smart-link]

title: Web App - Verification Code and Reset Wallet PIN
description: As a consumer, I want to be able to reset my wallet PIN in case I forgot my wallet PIN.+*AC:*+* User taps Forgot Wallet PIN on the drop-down menu to open Enter OTP Code pop-up.* On Enter OTP Code pop-up, user can see:** Title: *Enter OTP Code*** Intrusction text: *_“An OTP code has been sent to your email. Please enter the code here to proceed to reset your wallet PIN."_*** A field to enter the code.** *“Send Again”* text below the field allows user to get a new code and countdown time (duration: *60s*). While the time is being counted down, the Send Again text must be disabled.** *Continue* button: open Enter PIN screen, this button is disabled when the code field is empty or filled by blank.* On Enter PIN page:** Fields: *** New PIN and Verify New PIN: only allow numeric characters, max length: 4 characters.** Confirm button: This button is disabled if New PIN or Verify New PIN field is empty or filled by blank.** OTP code will be verified at this step.*** If the OTP code is correct: **** If Verify New PIN does not match to the New PIN, show the message pop-up *_“Verify new PIN does not match.“_*, and then the verify new PIN field should be deleted for user to enter the code again.**** If matching, show the message pop-up***** Title: *Wallet PIN Updated\!****** Message: *_“You can now use your new wallet PIN.“_****** OK button: navigate user back to Settings page.*** If the OTP code is incorrect, show the message pop-up *“**_OTP is incorrect. Attempted x/5.“_*_._ User will have maximum 5 attempts, if he/she fails at the last time (6th) show the message pop-up *_“You will be logged out due to entering OTP incorrectly too many times.“_*, tapping OK on the pop-up will kick user out of the web. If user attempts to login again, show the message pop-up *_“Your account has been locked. Please contact Administrator for support.“_**** If the OTP expires, show the message pop-up *_“OTP code has expired.“_** An OTP code will expire within 5 minutes right after user receives the email. (Ex: if user receives at 05:00PM, the OTP code will expired at 05:05PM).+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/c1151034-34c0-4629-9a3b-ee577a3d0fe9-9446/screen/688b909f-53b6-419c-ba5a-d73a98abefbd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/c1151034-34c0-4629-9a3b-ee577a3d0fe9-9446/screen/688b909f-53b6-419c-ba5a-d73a98abefbd/|smart-link]

title: Web App - Combine 2 transaction pages on the Top menu and Wallet
description: As a customer, I want to view my transaction history at only one place from the top menu. +*AC:*+ * The transaction list should include all transactions of all statuses: *Completed*, *Pending* and *Rejected*. The list contains all transaction categories defined in the excel file.* Each transaction will have below columns (data) in the table.** -_Transaction ID_-** _Transaction Type_** _Amount_** _Fee_*** Card Load:**** Load money to Kash Kard via cash at Merchant Name**** Load money to Kash Kard from Credit Card**** Load money to Kash Kard from Bank Account (Plaid and Wire Transfer)*** Transfer Money: only show fee for sender, not receiver*** Withdraw (cash and bank account)** _Remitter_** _Beneficiary_** _Status_* I can click on the transaction ID from the table to open Transaction Details pop-up.  ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1862|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1862|smart-link] )* Sort: by created date* Filter:** By category** By status: *All* (default value) / *Rejected* / *Pending* / *Completed*.** Date range: Keep as the current behavior.* I can export CSV file based on the filter set. The CSV file must contain below information:** Transaction ID** Category** Status** Beneficiary** Remitter** Amount** Fee** Store** Name** Project** Transaction Date* Pagination (if available): display 10 transactions per page.* See the format for each transaction in the UI but refer to the excel file for the value of each transaction type.* When no transactions recorded (with a new account), show the message {color:#00b8d9}_“No transactions found“_{color}_._ This message should be used even when filter has no results.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/118ef041-4563-44b4-9750-4df0645a61e3-44dd/?mv=product&mv2=accc&product=Creative+Cloud+Desktop&product-version=5.3.1.470|https://xd.adobe.com/view/118ef041-4563-44b4-9750-4df0645a61e3-44dd/?mv=product&mv2=accc&product=Creative+Cloud+Desktop&product-version=5.3.1.470]

title: Transaction Category of Direct Funding
description: * The system needs to record correct transactions for directing with different cards (cash card, credit card, points and gift card) with *Cause2Fund* category.* One transaction is recorded for one card.* Make sure that the report of Cause2Fund feature does not have any impact because it uses this category.* *Transaction for Direct Funding*** {color:#6554c0}*Transaction List screen*{color}*** *Category:* Cause2Fund*** *Project:* Project Name*** *Amount*: displaying the total amount (card, gift card and points) which user has donated.** {color:#6554c0}*Transaction Detail screen*{color}*** Title: Transaction Type (Cause2Fund)*** Amount: *-* *<money amount>* (Ex: - $5,000.00)*** Transaction ID: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Display an icon next to that allows user to add this transaction ID to clipboard.*** Description:{color:#ff5630} {color}*_“Donate to a project“_**** Status: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- *Completed**** Transaction Date: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Format (Oct 06 at 06:49 PM)*** Remitter: **** If using Kash Kard to donate: show Kash Kard/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of KK)**** If using Credit Card to donate: show Credit Card/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of CC)**** If using gift cards and points only: Remitter field will not be displayed.*** Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of KK)*** Donate Method: displaying all the methods which has been used to donated.*** Gift Card Name: *Gift Card Name* *** Gift Card Amount: diplaying the amount of gift card which has been used.*** Point Amount: diplaying the amount of points which has been used.*** Point Exchange Rate*** Project: *Project Name** These updates are applied for all Transactions of all applications.** Consumer app** Visipay** ARM** Tenant/New Admin+_Note:_+Some fields above can be gone if it has no data or it’s not needed, it includes *Remitter*, *Gift Card*, *Gift Card Amount*, *Point Amount*, *Point Exchange Rate*.Transaction List: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lhGmSgFNFRsloL0PRU-pa4dW0DIr-_L-UO-E6jBRQkY/edit#gid=0|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lhGmSgFNFRsloL0PRU-pa4dW0DIr-_L-UO-E6jBRQkY/edit#gid=0|smart-link]  Transaction Detail: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZxvhDJ_47vq9eQs0Fv-tzLS42Xw4LCrAQjz1ddmi2TU/edit#gid=0|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZxvhDJ_47vq9eQs0Fv-tzLS42Xw4LCrAQjz1ddmi2TU/edit#gid=0|smart-link]

title: Consumer App - Change the rule of rounding number for money in the system
description: +*AC:*+* The new rule of rounding a number:** If the third decimal number (after comma) is less than 5: keep the second decimal number.*** Example: 3.474 ~ 3.47; 3.621 ~ 3.62** If the third decimal number (after comma) is equal to or larger than 5: increase the second decimal number a unit.*** Example: 3.475 ~ 3.48; 3.678 ~ 3.68* We will update the way of rounding number for buying product flow:** Firstly, the *Product Price (discounted)* will be rounded.** The *Tax* amount will be rounded based on the product price (rounded above)** *Coupon/Gift Card/Cause2Fund/Point/* amount will be rounded based on the product price (including Tax and rounded above).** *Total amount (You Pay)* will be the sum of all amounts rounded (Product Price, Tax , Coupon/Gift Card/Point/Cause2Fund).Ex: A product costs $25.99, after discount the price is $24.9504 ~ *$24.95*The tax is 12%, so the tax amount will be 24.95*0.12=2.994 ~ *$2.99*Coupon is 8%, so the coupon amount will be (24.95+2.99)*0.08=2.2352 ~ *$2.24*Cause2Fund is 6%, so the Cause2Fund amount will be (24.95+2.99)*0.06=1.6764 ~ *$1.68*The Total amount will be 24.95+2.99-2.24-1.68 = *$24.02*Here is the full formula for calculating product prices:[^Formula for calculating product prices (75645180-f950-4244-8f59-358c3009764e).xlsx]

Customers will see this screen at the final step when they process the transaction or they can open this when viewing the transaction detail in the Transactions screen or Notifications screen.*** !image-20201023-034410.png|width=1613,height=775!*** *Updated Message:* {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Please transfer money to the below bank account to receive money on your Kashkard._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}*** Below the screen will have the text *_“Your wire instructions might be difference from the above. If you have any doubts or questions please verify your instructions with your account representative or_* [*_support@primetrust.com_*|mailto:support@primetrust.com]*_”._* ** *Load money from Bank via Plaid (Success Pending screen)**** This is the message that we show to customers about this transaction and they don’t need to take any action for this type. Customers will see this screen at the final step when they process the transaction.*** !image-20201023-035531.png|width=1429,height=729!*** ***Updated Message:* {color:#00b8d9}*_“The amount transaction is in progress. We will notify the transaction results shortly.”_*{color}** *Withdraw money from Kash Kard to bank account.* *** Customers will see this screen at the final step when they process the transaction or they can open this when viewing the transaction detail in the Transactions screen or Notifications screen.!image-20201023-035627.png|width=1254,height=759!*** *_Updated Message:_* {color:#00b8d9}*_“In order to confirm your withdrawal request, please verify it by clicking the link that we sent to your email. Note: sometimes our emails might go to your junk folder.“_*{color}* Please refer to the current notification that we have in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link] to define the modified content and action (click to view the detail).

title: Wallet - Cards tab
description: I can see all my cards and gift cards in my wallet Reuse all messages of the current flow on App*Cards** I can see all my cards following order : Kanoo Cash Card → Gifted Cash Card → Credit Card → SD Card* Click “Add New Card” → pop-up to select** Add The Sand Dollar Card : I wont see this option if  I already have a SD card** Add Credit Card* Add SD Card → click move to add page ( reference UI) and reuse all message of the current flow on App* Add Credit Card → click move to add page ( reference UI) and reuse all message of the current flow on App* Each card displays information like the current ones on App{color:#ff5630}Kanoo Cash Card{color}: click move to card details, I would see* UI: reference UI of XD and Kard* QR code expiration time like the current on App* *Click “Load”* → pop-up list all Credit Card and SD Card and Cash in-store** If I choose a card*** Choose a Card → move to Enter Amount screen*** Click “Load” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App*** Successful pop-up → click OK → back to card list** If I choose cash in-store → pop-up show QR code** Validation:*** If enter amount = 0 → red text “Load amount must be greater than 0.”*** If load by credit card fail → pop-up with content “We could not verify your payment details, try a different card or contact customer service.”*** If the credit card is expired → pop-up with content “The credit card has expired.”*** If I reach my KYC limitation → pop-up with content “You cannot load more than $\[number] in a month.”*** If load amount < load fee → pop-up with content “The load amount must be greater than \{number} for paying the transaction fee.”*** If the loading amount is blank, red text “Please enter the money”.*** If the loading amount > card’s balance → pop-up with content “Your card doesn't have enough money to complete the process. Please choose another card.”*** If loading unsuccessfully for any reason, a pop-up with content “The process cannot be completed. Please try again later.”!image-20201013-074607.png|width=50%!* *Click “Refund”* → pop-up ( reference UI) → reuse all messages of the current flow on App** Close the pop-up → refrefresh page → update my balance* *Click “Send”* → pop-up “Send Money To” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App** List all connected users sorted by alphabet name** Click on a user → move to pop-up Enter money** Close the pop-up → refresh page → update my balance** Click back to view the list of connected users** Validation:*** If sending amount is blank, red text “Please fill out all required fields\!”.*** If sending amount =0, red text “Money must be greater than 0.”.*** If the sending amount > card’s balance → pop-up with content “Your card doesn't have enough money to complete the process. Please choose another card.”* *Click “Widthdraw”* → enter withdraw amount → pop -up shows QR code** If enter amount = 0 → red text “Load amount must be greater than 0.”** If the amount is blank, red text “Please enter the money”.** If withdraw amount > card balance, pop-up with content “Your cash card balance is not enough to process withdraw.”{color:#ff5630}Credit Card{color}: click move to card details, I would see* QR code{color:#ff5630}Gift Cash card:{color}  click move to card details, I would see* Definition: Kanoo would like to expose APIs endpoints that allow the External system can invoke to create Coupons, Gift Cards, Cash Card. Especially, the cash card will come with certain limitations such as restricting withdrawal, limiting the spending to only specific merchants. The user can, therefore, have more than one cash card in their wallet. Only Kanoo master admin can perform this function.* QR code* List of Acceptable Merchants* This new cash card can only be used to ( only o Kanoo web):** Buy products** Pay with card => show QR code to POS{color:#ff5630}The SD Card{color}* Definition: Sand Dollar is a digital version of the Bahamian dollar. As a Kanoo’s user, I can create a Sand Dollar card in my wallet, this SD card is synched with the physical SD card. It is managed by Kanoo platform.* QR code* *Click “Load”* → pop-up list all Credit Card and Cash Card** Choose a Card → move to Enter Amount screen** Click “Load” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App** Validation like Cash card* *Click “Send”* → pop-up “Send Money To” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App** List all connected users who already have a SD, sorted by alphabet name** Click on a user → move to pop-up Enter money** *Nov 11, 2020*: note for friend:*** Maximum length: 200 characters including emoji, I can type more than 200, but when I move to the next step → red text appear below the note area “The note’s content has exceeded 200 characters.”*** If message content only contains white space → consider as no message*** If message content starts with white space → remove white spaces** Close the pop-up → refresh page → update my balance** Click back to view the list of connected users** Validation like Cash card* *Withdraw*: → enter withdraw amount → pop -up shows QR code** Validation like Cash card

title: Points redemption
description: As a Kanoo customer, I want to have a page to check my points balance which I was rewarded from different actitivities. On this page, I can also know what I need to do to get points, my point rewarded history, I can use points to buy product or gift card and view my point redemption history.Difference between Kard and Kanoo will be highlighted in {color:#36b37e}Green{color}+*AC:*+I can go to Points Balance page by two ways: * From Home page: clicking Points Balance area.* From the top menu: clicking on Wallet, switching to Points tab.*Points Balance page*I can see my current points balance displayed at the top-center.* *Promotion*: ** I can see the list of gift cards of all merchants.** This list should contains gift cards which are promoted to Wallet Point (I can buy with my points).** Allow scrolling to load and see more* *How to earn points*: ** On clicking, show a pop-up** {color:#36b37e}The pop-up contains the list of activities on which I can do to get the points. (This list is configured on Kanoo Master Admin site) or image “Earn points”.{color}* *My rewards*** On clicking, show a pop-up** The pop-up contains the list of my history rewarded points** This list is sorted by the latest date from the top downwards, all the records having the same date should be group as a date (Ex: October 26, 2020), allow scrolling to view more.* *Reward options*** I would see 2 tabs: Gift Cards and Products** On each tab, I can search by product name or gift card name. ** I can buy gift card and product here totally by my points:*** Buy gift card**** For each gift card shown on Gift Cards tab, I can see the image, the gift card title / amount, point price and which merchant issued that one.**** On clicking any gift card:***** If I do not have enough points: show the message _“You don't have enough points for this order”._***** If I have enough points: I can see two option buttons {color:#36b37e}\[BUY AND STASH] / \[BUY AND GIVE]{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Before completing payment, I should be required to enter my wallet PIN.{color}**** After buying successfully, I can see that gift card on Wallet page (Gift Cards tab).**** {color:#36b37e}*Nov 3, 2020*{color}{color:#36b37e}: {color}{color:#36b37e}-If I buy for my friend, I can choose a date and memo for him-{color}{color:#36b37e}. Remove message field. Send immediately regardless date{color}**** Auto create an order whose status is “Completed” and the amount is total paid points.**** I can use that gift card to redeem when making payment.**** {color:#36b37e}I can view details of that order on Web, App and POS like below image{color}**** !image-20201028-032130.png|width=547,height=330!*** Buy product**** For each gift card shown on Products tab, I can see the image, the product title / money price, point price and which merchant issued that one.**** On clicking any product:***** If I do not have enough points: show the message _“You don't have enough points for this order”._***** If I have enough points: I can see a button Checkout***** I can select delivery options Pickup, Delivery and Pay now.**** {color:#36b37e}Before completing payment, I should be required to enter my wallet PIN.{color}**** {color:#36b37e}I can view details of that order on Web, App and POS{color}**** {color:#36b37e}This type of order will not have Refund feature.{color}* {color:#36b37e}*Nov 3, 2020: Save records*{color}{color:#36b37e} like the current process on Visipay, ARM, App and POS{color}** {color:#36b37e}Visipay ( Transaction) and ARM ( Transaction):{color}** *Nov 30, 2020:* for ARM - Transaction*** Role Master admin → column Transaction amount → keep the current format *** Role Merchant admin → doesn't have column Transaction amount → keep the current flow of saving record**** {color:#36b37e}TransactionID: must-have{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Category: {color}{color:#36b37e}-Points Redemption for both Gift card and Product-{color}***** {color:#36b37e}*Nov 11, 2020*{color}{color:#36b37e}:  keep the current transaction types of Kanoo app ( Gift Card Buy for Gift card) of Gift card and Product{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Status: Completed ( for GC), Scan to Pickup, Scan to Delivery ( for Product){color}**** {color:#36b37e}Beneficiary: merchant’s name{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Remitter: consumer’s full name{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Transaction Amount: 200 points or 2,000 points{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Transaction Date: must-have{color}**** {color:#36b37e}The rest fields are blank{color}** {color:#36b37e}App:{color}*** {color:#36b37e}Save record in tab Points → My Points{color}*** {color:#36b37e}Sync the balance with Web{color}** {color:#36b37e}Web:{color}*** {color:#36b37e}Save record in tab Points → My Rewards{color}*** {color:#36b37e}Update the points balance{color}** {color:#36b37e}App and POS:{color}*** {color:#36b37e}Save record in My Points ( on App){color}*** {color:#36b37e}Order list:{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Merchant name{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Phone number: registered phone{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Status: Completed ( for GC case), Scan to Pickup or Scan to Delivery ( for product case ){color}**** {color:#36b37e}Order date: must-have{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Order number: must-have{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Pickup/ Delivery Address: must-have ( only for product case){color}**** {color:#36b37e}Pickup/ Delivery Time: must-have ( only for product case){color}*** {color:#36b37e}Order details:{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Merchant name{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Phone number: registered phone{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Pickup/ Delivery Address: must-have ( only for product case){color}**** {color:#36b37e}Pickup/ Delivery Time: must-have ( only for product case){color}**** {color:#36b37e}Status: Completed ( for GC case), Scan to Pickup or Scan to Delivery ( for product case ){color}**** {color:#36b37e}Order number: must-have{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Qty: 1{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Item: GC’s name or product name{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Unit price: blank{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Total price: points, Ex: 200 points{color}**** {color:#36b37e}Total: points{color}*** {color:#36b37e}Can scan to pickup or delivery like buying product ( for Product only){color}*** {color:#36b37e}*Dec 1, 2020*{color}{color:#36b37e}:
