title: Mobile Apps - Login - Timeout
description: I don’t want to be logged out after a period of timeout as the current way and my login can be kept until I want to log out actively.AC:# When user login into the mobile app, the login API should return a *refresh-token* along with the token# Whenever the user’s token is expired and they call any API from the mobile app, this API should return with an HTTP code 401 (Unauthorized) along with a statusCode is “expired_token“.# In the case above, the mobile app will use the refresh-token to renew the user’s token and use this token to call the previous API again.

title: Backend - Save Shopping Cart
description: As a customer I want to be able to save products to my shopping cart to order then.+*Acceptance Criteria:*+* Show the toast message “{color:#00b8d9}*_Product added to cart_*{color}“ every time adding product to cart successfully.* Cart Icon (Home screen):** Users should able to see the cart icon on the home screen.*** The number badge on the cart icon is the total products on cart. The maximum number displayed here is 99+.*** The number badge will be refreshed when the home screen is opened*** If only number is refreshing, user should not see the loading circle, it is a bad UX, just call the API to refresh and update the UI when it done** Tapping the cart icon will navigate the user to the “Cart“ screen.* I can select and save products of different merchants into my Cart.* I can select a product multiple times to add to my Cart.* Cart is saved on server and I can see it after that on all devices.* I can open Product Detail screen from the Cart screen (for product including or not including options).* For each product on the cart, I want to see:** Product name** Product image** Quantity field to edit** Original price** Discount price (for a single item)** Delete icon: On clicking this icon, the app shows a confirmation pop-up (the pop-up template depends on mobile platform) saying _“Are you sure to remove this product from your cart?“_ with two option buttons OK and Cancel.*** OK: Close the pop-up and remove the pop-up.*** Cancel: Close the pop-up and nothing’s changed.** Options for a product (if available)* Cart should be update when:** I added new product from store detail to my card** I update the number of product that I want to buy on cart detail screen:** I remove any product on cart detail screen** Product of a merchant on my cart should be reset after I buy them* I can see Checkout button for each merchant on Cart like the web app is doing.* This feature is applied for all kard-based mobile/web apps.* Recent purchased history is out of scope of this story.+_Validation Rules:_+* If there is no products in the cart, show the message at center of screen _“Your Cart Is Empty.“_* For the product which has options, user can tap on that product (image or option) to edit options of that one.* User can edit the number of a product they want to buy:** By (+) or (-) buttons. User can only decrease minimum to 1 and increase maximum to the current inventory number of a product.** By enter manually. If they enter the number larger than the current inventory number of that product, show the toast message saying _“_{color:#ff5630}_This product has_ {color}{color:#ff5630}*_x_* {color}{color:#ff5630}_items left in stock._{color}_“_, then the number user enters will be auto-changed to *x*. (*x: the current inventory number of a product*).* When user is at Product screen, the merchant admin disables any products, user adds that product to cart, show the toast message “{color:#ff5630}_This product is not available currently._{color}“* If the cart on mobile app and web app has 3 items: ** User removes all 3 items on mobile app:*** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart Detail page, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** If they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** User removes 1 of 3 items on mobile app*** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart page, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely*** On web app, if they click Checkout button, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely*** On web app, if they update any item on web app (edit number, change options, …), show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“_. After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** -User does payment for 1 of 3 items on mobile app completely-*** -On web app, if they click Checkout button on web app, show the notification message pop-up- -_“_-{color:#00b8d9}*-_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._-*{color}-_“._- -After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.-*** -On web app, if click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up- -_“_-{color:#00b8d9}*-_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._-*{color}-_“_--. After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.-* When user opens Shopping Cart from Home screen or tapping Checkout button on Shopping Cart screen , if there is any products is changed before they do payment:** *_Case 1: For products which changed or affected by Product Image / Product Title / Option / Product Description / Inventory Number (out of stock or not enough in stock) or the category containing product deleted by merchant admin._**** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}*** After close the pop-up:**** The products which have been changed should be removed.**** Keep the products which have not been changed anything.** *_Case 2:  For products which changed or affected by Price or Tax_**** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}*** Show the list of products normally.*** Update the latest price and tax for products which are changed about price and tax.XD for Kard app: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5688e576-1ee5-4bf4-af68-b035af2b8d0b-03db/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5688e576-1ee5-4bf4-af68-b035af2b8d0b-03db/]Git: \\KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2036\\KP-988 Save Shopping CartPlease note that the shopping cart button on the left menu is out of scope of this ticket

title: Android - Delete Credit Card
description: As a customer, I want to be able to delete my credit card which I have added to my wallet.+*AC*+* I login to web app and open Wallet screen.* On Wallet screen, I can see the credit cards (assuming that I have added them before)* On the top-right corner of card image, I can see the More options (three dots icon). On tapping, I can see Delete option:** iOS: use Action Sheet** Android: same as design* When I choose Delete, I want to see a confirmation pop-up saying _“Are you sure you want to delete this card?“_ with two buttons OK and Cancel.  The pop-up format depends on each mobile platform.** OK: show the toast message saying _“Delete successfully\!“_, the card is only removed from user’s wallet (soft delete).** Cancel: close the pop-up.+_Validation rules:_+I can delete the credit card if that card has transactions or not. After deleting, make sure the card still saved in database.If I add a credit card which was deleted, that card should be considered as a new card, I cannot see any transactions which I did before.Git: KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2039\\KP-983 Delete Credit Card

title: [Android] Login screen - UI-UX enhancement
description: AC:# The current message when the user enters an incorrect password is unfriendly and insecure. Update it to “You have entered an invalid username or password. Please try again.”# Update the maximum attempt to 20 and make it configurable on the server-side. (This may need an API story).# In case of user login with incorrect username or password, do not display “You have entered an invalid username or password. title: [Backend] Consumer App - Enhance Store Detail screen
description: As a merchant admin, I want my store detail screen to be displayed as three tabs (Home / Products / Gift Cards) so that my customers can view and purchase more easily and conveniently.+*AC:*+Display the screen has three tabs.*_Home_*On this tab, I want to display as same as Nearby tab (refer to the current Nearby tab of Store Detail screen):* The UI will be the same.* Remove Buy Gift Card button.*_Products_*On this tab, I can see:* The list of all products of a specific merchant, the products here are from the connect category of a product belonging to the default connect zone which is being active. This list will be shown as grid view mode.* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one connect category of any connect zones and the connect zone must be active and set as default as well.* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on the Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.** I can select/deselect one or multiple categories to filter.** For each selected category, it will be checked on the box.** I can tap the Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to the Products tab.** The filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using the filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Discount percentage (if available)** Product image** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use an ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 1 line, use an ellipsis if the price is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* I can search product by product name, product category name and tags:** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keywords.* I can sort the product list by:** Latest: sort product list by the latest created date** Price:*** Low to High*** High to Low.* By default, the list of products will be sorted by discounted price (low to high), if multiple products have the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).* If no products are available or no matched searching/filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.*_Gift Cards_*On this tab, I want to display all my gift cards, same as when I tap Buy Gift Card button (refer to the Buy Gift Card button at Nearby tab of the current Store Detail screen).The list of gift cards displayed are the gift cards belonging to the konnect category of gift card from the konnect categories of GC. This is the current rule.+*Mockup:*+ Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/956224f9-0305-4aef-a244-b7be0dd4b8ad-c031/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/956224f9-0305-4aef-a244-b7be0dd4b8ad-c031/|smart-link]  Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8e9b834b-a12a-490d-8b26-2f725cfa8ca0-dbc8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8e9b834b-a12a-490d-8b26-2f725cfa8ca0-dbc8/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Visikard Admin - Manage Product Categories
description: As a System Admin, I want to be able to manage the list of default product categories and also support a tenant to manage their category list.+*AC:*+On the left menu, I click an item named Product Categories to open Product Categories page.The page will be seperated into 2 tabs: *System* and *Tenants*On System tab, I can see:* *New Category* button: On clicking New Product Category pop-up is opened, on this pop-up:||*Fields*||*Description*||*Display*||*Required*||*Validation*|||*Name*|I can enter category name.|Textbox|YesIf Name field is missing, show red error message {color:#ff5630}*_“Name is required“_*{color}|Name is unique.Max length: 50 characters.Error message: {color:#ff5630}*_“This name already exits.“_*{color}||*Tags*|I can enter tags for the new category. After each tag, I can seperate by hitting Enter.|Textbox|No|No|||*Buttons*||*Click to action*|||Save Changes|Close the dialog and add new category to the table.||Cancel|Close the dialog and the action is cancelled.|* Clone for Tenant button: On clicking, show Import Category pop-up:** Tenant field: displaying the list of tenants (*Kard, GreenCom, HYT, …*) as a drop-down list to select.** The list of categories are displayed, each item will have a checkbox, I can search, select one by one / multiple / all.** Buttons:*** Clone: close the pop-up, the list of selected categories will be cloned for the selected tenant. *** Cancel: close the pop-up, the action is cancelled.* Below the *New Category* button, there’s a table of created categories including columns:** Name: displaying category name** Tags: displaying tags of the category** Action:||*Buttons*||*Click to action*|||Edit ({color:#ff5630}*this option is not displayed on Tenant tabs*{color})|Edit Category pop-up is opened. On this pop-up, the UI and function are as same as when creating a new category, but the fields are populated from the current info.||Remove|Remove Category pop-up is opened:* Message: *_“Are you sure to remove the category \[category name]?“_** Buttons:** Remove: Close the pop-up and remove the category.** No: Close the pop-up and the action is cancelled.|* I can search category on the table by name and tags.On Tenants tab, I can see* The list of categories of all tenants have been cloned from system.* The list of categories are displayed as a table including below columns:** Name: displaying category name** Tags: displaying tags of the category** Tenant: displaying tenant name** Action:*** Remove* I can filter the list by tenant.+_Note:_+On System tab:* When system admin adds a new category,{color:#00b8d9} *it will not impact to the list of other tenants.*{color}* When system admin edits or removes a category, {color:#00b8d9}*it will impact to the list of tenants, the list displayed on consumer web / app.*{color}On Tenants tab: When system admin removes a category, {color:#00b8d9}*it will not impact to the list of other tenants or system (on System tab)*{color}. (For ex: System admin removes a category of GreenCom tenant on Tenants tab, there is only tenant admin of GreenCom cannot see it anymore).On the table of product categories of each tab:* Name and Tags should be displayed maximum only one line * If Name and Tags are too long, there should have ellipsis, if admin hovers the mouse cursor on it, he can see the full Name and Tags.In case if there’s not any categories or no results of searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b338abc6-9c2f-4b5e-9930-3950981bf1a8-e66b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b338abc6-9c2f-4b5e-9930-3950981bf1a8-e66b/|smart-link]

description: As a staff using Order Process App, I want to scan the order to complete any orders without searching it on Order List screen.+*AC:*+* On Home screen, I can click Scan Order button and it’ll open the scan screen (camera).* The text shown on scan screen: “_Scan QR to View Order”_.* Depending on the status of order displayed on customer app, I can or cannot scan that order.* After scanning, the order detail screen will be opened.* Tapping on Confirm button at the bottom, Success screen will be shown (Order Completed).* Tap close button on Success screen, user will be navigated to Order Detail screen (the status is Completed).*Note:* If I scan order from Order Detail screen, the text shown on scan screen should be “_Scan to Complete Order_“

title: Android - KardPOS app - Display order status
description: As a staff using KardPOS app, I want the created orders to display the status so that I can track and manage them more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on the orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_*.* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever the order status is updated.* I want the status to display on both Orders screen (Orders List: Processing and Completed tabs) and Order Detail screen. * Each tab will contain all the orders which the type is Pickup or Delivery.** For Processing tab: displaying the orders which the status is New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping.** For Completed tab: only displaying the orders which the status is Completed.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.{color:#ff5630}*_Note: For the Pay Now orders, they will be displayed at Completed tab all the time._*{color}

title: Android - Display order status
description: As a customer, I want my created orders to display the status so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_*.* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever my order status is updated.* I want the status to display on both Orders screen (Orders List: Processing and Completed tabs) and Order Detail screen. Each tab will contain all the orders which the type is Pickup or Delivery.** For Processing tab: displaying the orders which the status is New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping.** For Completed tab:  only displaying the orders which the status is Completed.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.{color:#ff5630}*_Note: For the Pay Now orders, they will be displayed at Completed tab all the time._*{color}

title: Web - Display order status
description: As a customer, I want my created orders to display the status so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_*.* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever my order status is updated.* I want the status to display on both Orders screen (Orders List: Processing and Completed tabs) and Order Detail screen. Each tab will contain all the orders which the type is Pickup or Delivery.** For Processing tab: displaying the orders which the status is New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping.** For Completed tab:  only displaying the orders which the status is Completed.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app, updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.

title: API - Send email to customer after creating order successfully mobile/web app
description: As a customer, after creating a new order on mobile/web app, I want the system to send me an email about confirming my order created successfully.+*AC:*+* I can create a new order on mobile / web app.* After making payment for my order, I can check my mailbox and receive a new email.* Email Structure:** Subject: Order Confirmation \[Order ID]** Content:_“Dear \[Customer Name],__We are delighted to inform that your order \[Order ID] at \[Business Name] has been received._ _You can check your order detail as information below:”_ * I want to see my order detail displayed as a table below. * Below the order detail table, I want to see the message _“Click_ +_here_+ _to check your order detail at HYT/Kard/GreenCom/GreenLife.“_ attach the hyperlink to “here“ word. On clicking, I can be directed to Orders page of the web app of corresponding tenant. I can be required to login if I haven’t login before._“Sincerely,__HYT/Kard/GreenCom/GreenLife.”_* Display the merchant’s logo image and contact information (business name, email address, phone number) at the bottom so that I can contact if I have any problems with the current order.*_Note: The email template is used correponding to the template of tenant web app that I am using._*

title: BE - ARM - Monthly Subscription - Change Email Content of Expiration Remind
description: As a merchant admin, I want to receive an email from system every time my ARM account is about to expire.+*AC:*+* My account is about to expire in \[n] day. (n can be configurable).* The system will auto send an email to me.* The template of email should follow the current style of email sent from ARM.!image-20200911-044805.png|width=618,height=350!* Change currency from B$ to $.* Email content is similar to the current one:!image-20200911-033933.png|width=372,height=229!Subject: _\[Kard ARM] Your Merchant Account is about to expire_* _Dear \[Merchant Name],_* _We would like to inform that your subscription package \[package name] is about to expire on \[date] (x day(s) left). The system will auto-charge a monthly subscription fee from your kash kard then so that you can continue using Kard ARM services. Please maintain your kash kard balance ready for the fee, otherwise, your merchant account will get deactivated._** _Current kash kard balance: $x.xx_ ** _Monthly subscription fee: $yy.yy_ (This fee about depends on the subscription package which the merchant registered.).* _Arm Corporate Office__4480H South Cobb__Drive #321Smyrna, GA 30080_* _All Arm emails will be sent from our_ [_support@kardsys.com_|mailto:support@kardsys.com] _domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses._

title: API - Receive Notification for Status Update of Order
description: As a customer, I want receive the notification every time my order status is updated so that I can track my order more conveniently.+*AC:*+* After creating an order on my app, I go to Orders screen.* I click my order to view Order Detail screen.* On Order Detail screen, I can see a new line named Status, it’s left-aligned on the screen.* Below the Status line, I can see my order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed), it’s also left-aligned on the screen.* I also want my order status also displayed on Orders screen.* Every time my order status is updated by the staff, I can receive the notification by 2 ways:** Push notification: “Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“. When I tap on that one, it’ll open Order Detail screen correspondingly. This only applied for mobile platform:** Email:*** I want to see the message _“Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“_ with my order detail displayed below this message.*** I can see my order detail displayed as a table, below this table I want to see the message _“Click_ {color:#00b8d9}+*_here_*+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}_to view your order at \[tenant].“_, attach the hyperlink to “here“ word. On clicking, I can be directed to Order Detail page of the web app. I can be required to login if I haven’t login before.*** _“Sincerely,_*** _\[tenant]  team.”_

This will be applied for both mobile and tablet platforms.

title: Order Process App - Order Detail and Update Order Status
description: As a staff of the store, I want to have a screen named “Order Detail“ for each order on Order Process app, so that I can check with customer which items they bought and perform deliver order as exact as possible.+*AC:*+* On Order Detail screen, I can tap on any orders to open Order Detail screen.* On Order Detail screen:** Title: Order Detail** I can see customer name, phone number and call icon. On clicking Call icon, it’ll open the dialog of system which allows me to choose an external app to call customer (Phone default app, Skype, Zalo, etc…).** I can see order number, order status, payment status, order type, address:*** Order Status: All / New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed. I can update status on this screen. (use bottom sheet style here)*** Payment status: Paid / Unpaid.*** Order Type: Delivery / Pickup*** Delivery/Pickup Address: show exactly the address which customer has inputted while buying product on app or the address where the other staff created the order at the store.** Below the address, show the map with the defined address above. (only for Delivery orders).** I can see the list of items of the order below:*** Quantity, Items, Unit Price and Total Price for each item*** Tax, Coupon, Gift Cards.*** Total amount** A button shown at the bottom of this screen depending on how the staff open this one:*** If the staff starts with Scan Order button at Home screen, after scanning QR code of the customer’s order, the button shown at the bottom named “Confirm“. On tapping this button, show success screen to inform the order completed. (refer to the ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-858|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-858|smart-link])*** If the staff starts with Orders button at Home screen, firstly they open Order List screen, on tapping any orders it’ll open Order Detail screen, the button shown at the bottom named “Scan Order“. On tapping this button, it’ll show the scan screen (camera), the order will be completed immediately after being scanned.+Validation rules:+* Customer’s avatar must be synced up with the one on consumer apps.** Customer changes avatar, it’ll changed, too.** Customer does not upload avatar, show the default one (two-first characters)* The customer name should be fully displayed on this screen.* Phone number must match to the one on consumer apps.* Update status:** When order status is New. I can only update to Preparing.** When order status is Preparing. I can only update to Ready.** When order status is Ready. There’s 2 options of status for me to update:*** I can update to Completed. (for Pickup orders) by scanning QR code.*** I can update to Shipping (only for Delivery orders).** When the status is Shipping (only for Delivery orders). I can update to Completed by scanning QR code.** Finally, when order status is Completed. I cannot update any status anymore.* Payment Status:** Paid: for the orders created by customers on their apps or created by the staff directly at store.** Unpaid: not available in the sprint of S2036* The list of order items: all information must match to the one on consumer app or KardPOS app.* Scan Order button:** This button is enabled when the order type is pick-up and order status is Ready.** Or this button is enabled when the order type is delivery and order status is Shipping.

title: Order Process App - Order List
description: As a staff of the store, I want to view all the orders created from consumer apps, so that I can review and deliver the orders to customers.+*AC:*+* After login to Order Process App, I can see a button named “Orders”.* On “Orders” button, I can see the number displayed on the icon, which shows new orders created from consumer apps or KardPOS app. This number represents for the number of processing orders, and it is displayed all the time. If there is any order status turning Completed, this number goes down correspondingly. The maximum number is 100, if there are more than 100 processing orders, show “99+”.* When tapping Orders button, the new screen (“Order List”) opened.* On Order List screen:** I can see all the orders having been created by customers on their apps or by other staffs on KardPOS app.** I can search orders by Customer Name, Phone Number. Search field is fixed at the top of screen, I can slide from orders list.** I want to see the filter icon at the top-right of screen so that I can filter the list of orders. On clicking Filter icon, show the bottom sheet filter:*** Status (All / New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed). The default value is All.*** Type (All / Pickup / Delivery). The default value is All.*** Date range: this range should last for a latest week from the current date. (Ex: 09/15/2020 - 09/21/2020).*** Cancel button: close the filter.*** Clear Filter button: clear all filter set and return the original status.*** Filter icon should be highlighted when I’m using filter. If not applying filter or clearing filter, the color icon returns normal.** For each order shown on the list:*** I can see the customer name, phone number, order number, order status, delivery/pickup address, delivery/pickup time (both date and time here).*** I can tap any orders to view Order Detail list. (refer ticket KP-721)+Validation rules:+* The list of orders is sorted by created date from the top downwards.* Search orders:** Customer Name: I can search with first name / last name / the phrase contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Phone Number: I can search with full phone number or the string of number contained in the phone number.** If no orders found, I want to see the message “No orders found.“. This message shown directly on the screen and center-aligned.* Date: Follow this format MM/DD/YYYY (Ex: 04/21/2020 - 09/21/2020). * For each order shown on the list:** All the information displayed on the order must match to the one on consumer apps / KardPOS app.** Customer’s name and phone number must match to the order info when customer makes the order. There info would be fixed for each order.** If the customer name is long, use ellipsis, make sure the name only shown in a line.** {color:#ff5630}*_If the order created by user with Pay Now option chosen and the order created from KardPOS by order creation feature, they’ll not be shown on the list._*{color}XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/29f97e9e-5996-44e9-b4d1-b0600884bc8e-7caa/screen/226754e7-506a-4931-9c66-10744615b33e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/29f97e9e-5996-44e9-b4d1-b0600884bc8e-7caa/screen/226754e7-506a-4931-9c66-10744615b33e/]Git: KardSys\\KardPICKUP\\05-Export\\Sprint-2036\\KP-708 Kard Order Process.xd

title: Web Apps - Buy Product Flow - Payment with coupons
description: As a customer, I want to be able to buy product with using coupon to make payment.+*Acceptance Criteria:*+* User can add products to the cart.* On Cart page, user clicks Proceed to Checkout. * On Confirm Purchase page, user can see an option Coupon below Gift Cards.* On clicking Coupons option, the pop-up shown up:** Title: Select Coupon** Show the list of coupons which user has added to wallet.** User can select or unselect any coupons on the list.* The total amount which user has to pay finally must be correctly calculated.* After payment:** The order is saved on Orders page. (user can also see coupon amount which was used).** The transaction named Coupon Redemption should be recorded on Transactions page, ARM site (Merchant Admin / Master Admin), Visipay site, Visikard Admin site.+Validation rule:+* The list of coupons shown on the pop-up only belongs to the certain store which user has added before, which means user cannot see the coupon from the store A if they buy product from the store B.* If the coupon amount makes the final total amount which user has to payment is $0, Point option is disabled. (Ex: User buys a product with the total amount $3.00, he uses a coupon $3.50, so the final total amount he has to pay is $0.00, he cannot select point at that time).* The coupon buy X get X only shown if user buys products corresponding to its content. (Ex: The coupon is Buy 2A to get 1B, this only shown if user buys enough 2A. Otherwise, it’ll be not shown). * User can only use one coupon at the same time while doing payment. * User cannot see the coupons which was used in Wallet page (Coupon tab). The coupon is shown again on Store Detail page and they can add to wallet and use again if they want.

title: [Android] - Save selected Location on Marketplace
description: !CB32CEF9-F9B5-4EFC-88BF-DD6F61A8ABDB.jpg|width=1152,height=2048!AC:The location on the image above (Marketplace and Search Business screen) should be:# If the user granted the location permission: the current location of the user.## Need to store this location to use later in case we don’t have location permission next time# If the user did not grant the location permission, meaning we cannot get the current location of the user:## If the location was detected before or the location is selected by the user manually before: use the saved location## If we never detect the location and the user never select the location: Display “Unknown“

title: Web Apps - Konnection - Add user/merchant to group
description: +*AC:*+When connecting a friend (web app consumer) or a business (merchant), the list of connection groups will be shown and user can choose any connection group to store that friend or merchant. The list of connection group includes items: Co-workers, Family, Friends, Favorites and a Create New Group button. When user click at Create New Group button, the Create New Group pop-up shown up, there’s a field user can enter group name and two buttons Save and close (x)||*Button*||*Action*|||Save|Create a new group successfully, redirect user to the list of group connections.A new group is added to the list above Create New Group button.||Close (x)|Close the pop-up.|*_Validation rule:_** User can create multi groups while adding a new connection.* User can add a new connection to multi groups that they want.* If user do not choose any group to store a new connection, that connection will be added to the default group named All Kards.UI Design: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/95fb18c2-d35e-431a-a779-8dac14be92fa-c0a8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/95fb18c2-d35e-431a-a779-8dac14be92fa-c0a8/]

title: [Android][KardPos][Login] - Decrease the font size of text on the "Enter Your PIN" screen
description: At the login screen, a staff enters their userID then entering their PIN: the "Enter Your PIN" screen is too large  !image-2020-08-05-15-36-09-697.png|thumbnail! , expected: decrease the font size like this  !image-2020-08-05-15-37-54-649.png|thumbnail! , please fix this UI for the "Close Out" feature

title: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Upgrade Subscription with Free of Charge
description: As an ARM master admin I want to be able to upgrade subscription plan for any merchant for free of charge in order to provide them the trial period of exploring the system before they pay for monthly subscription fee.* Change column “Complimentary Platinum Mode” to “Complimentary Mode”.* Add new button “Free Upgrade” button under the current subscription plan in Current Plan column.** This button is enable for merchants that are active and verified for KYC only.** When I click on this button, I can select one of the subscription plans except FREE (ECONOMY plan) on the popup.*** The popup needs to have a note “You want to upgrade subscription plan for this merchant with free of charge for first month.“ for ARM master about this action.*** The popup needs to show Business Name of the selected merchant as well.*** The popup does not show the current subscription plan of the selected merchant.** If I select “Confirm” button on the popup, the system proceeds to upgrade the selected merchant to the selected subscription plan with 1 free month and close the popup.*** A transaction of “Subscription Fee” must be recorded with zero amount to track this activity.*** New subscription plan of the selected merchant must be updated on Merchant Accounts screen.*** Expire date of this merchant will be 1 month from the current day.** If I select “Cancel” button, the system cancels the current action and close the popup and no change is applied.

title: API - VisiKard Admin - Gift Card Catalog
description: As VisiKard Admin I want to see the list of gift cards issued by both ARM merchant and Incomm merchants to sell in the platform.* The approving GK by ARM master admin is kept as the normal.* I can see the list of gift cards with below columns when accessing Gift Card Catalog menu on VisiKard Admin Portal.** Name** Image** Value** Merchant** Discount of Merchant** VK Split** Marketing Partner** Customer Discount** Status (Active / Inactive)* The values of Discount of Merchant (Original Commission), VK Split, Marketing Partner and Customer Discount is shown based on the configuration on ARM Master Admin for each merchant. I cannot edit any of these columns.* Total of VK Split, Marketing Partner and Customer Discount must be always 100%.* I can search gift cards by name and merchant business name.* I can sort the list by clicking on columns: Name, Discount of Merchant, VK Commission, Discount for Customer, Merchant, Status* -I can select any merchant to see their gift cards.-* I can export the list of gift cards to CSV.* I can disable/enable a gift card.** Once a gift card is disabled, it will not be shown on Gift Card list of store in the app.** If a gift card is disabled after user buys it, they can use one to buy product normally, it’s not affected.UI: Git: KardSys\\Visikard Admin Portal\\05-Export\\Sprint 2033\\KP-451 Gift Card Catalog

title: Web Apps - Points Tab of Wallet

I have to select maximum 31 days on this filter or I will receive a message “You cannot select more than 31 days” when I click on the Filter button** Because the API do not support paging, so we will fetch all transactions for the selected filter, then split it into pages on client-side.** I can export the list of transactions to CSV file by selecting Export CSV button.* I can export the list of mastercards to CSV file by selecting Export CSV button.* I can disable/remove a mastercard by selecting a Disable/Remove button on Action column.XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/051247bb-58fa-410e-bdde-07a8375c4cba-5041/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/051247bb-58fa-410e-bdde-07a8375c4cba-5041/]Git: KardSys\\Visipay\\05-Export\\Sprint 2036\\KP-445 Davinci Mastercard\\KP-445 DaVinci MasterCard.xd

title: [Android] - Promotions - Update UI and Functions
description: As an app customer, I want to see the promotion campaigns created by the merchants on ARM site.+*_Acceptance Criteria:_*+After login to the app, user can find and see promotions by two ways:* On Home screen, the promotion posts will be displayed below the categories of default merchant.* On Store Detail screen, the promotion posts will be displayed below the categories of merchant.* A promotion post will have info below:** Merchant logo.** Merchant name** The create or modified date/time (followed the rule as table below)** Caption**  Promotion image / video||*Created/Modified Time*||*Display*|||Today|1 minute ago, 2 minutes ago…1 hour ago, 2 hours ago…||After 24 or 48 hours since the created/modified time.|Yesterday, 2 days ago…||After 7 days since the created/modified time|1 week ago, 2 weeks ago…||After 30 days since the created/modified time|1 month ago, 2 months ago…|* On tapping the image/video or caption of a promotion post , it will open the promotion post detail.* On tapping merchant name or merchant logo, it will open the store detail screen of that merchant.* User can like, comment, -share- on the promotion post.** -On tapping the number of likes, it will open the pop-up with title as “People Who Liked“ which contains all the users liked (the number of users on the pop-up who liked the post must match the number of likes). This pop-up will show 5 people as default, sorted by liked time from the top downwards, if the number is more than, there will have See More text, on tapping it, user can scroll to see more people liked this post. User can also open Person Kard screen when tapping any person on the list.- **  User can unlike the post.** -User can delete his/her own comment on the post. For this function, on each comment will have the More button (three dots icon), on tapping user can see Delete button, on tapping Delete button, it will show a pop-up message “Are you sure you want to delete this comment?“ with two buttons Yes and No. On tapping Yes, it will close the pop-up and user’s comment is deleted, on tapping No, it will close the pop-up, user’s comment is still there.- ** -On tapping Share icon, the app will open the default sharing function of system for each mobile platform.- ** User can see the other customers who have commented on the current post. user can also open Person Kard screen when tapping any person on the list of comments. +_Validation rules:_+* The promotion posts can be shown no matter if user connects to that merchant who created that promotion or not.* The promotion posts are only shown on the tenant app which is a partner of the merchant creating that post. (Ex: The promotion post of Hyt store can only be shown on Hyt app, if it’s associated with Hyt tenant partner on ARM Master Admin site). * The promotion posts cannot be shown on the app if it’s paused or deleted by merchant admin on ARM site.* The promotion posts are shown depending on the age and gender of user. (it’s configured when merchant admin creates that promotion campaign on ARM site), also depending on user’s current location.* The promotion posts should be sorted by the created / modified latest time from the top downwards. (both Home screen and Store Details screen).* User can comment -/ share- many times on a promotion post. * The number of likes / comments -/ shares-  should be updated correctly.* The comments of a promotion post should be sorted by the added date/time, the latest one to oldest one from the top downwards.* On the list of promotion posts, the caption should be displayed maximum 3 lines. On Promotion Details screen, that should be displayed fully.XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/e9b3e349-ca0d-4450-b517-00c30a3431c7-bce0/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/e9b3e349-ca0d-4450-b517-00c30a3431c7-bce0/]

title: Web Apps - Refund feature for Kash Kard
description: As a customer, I want to have the refund same as mobile app, so that I can refund money to my kash kard for payment transaction.+*_Acceptance Criteria:_*+* On Kash Kard detail page, user can see a new button named Refund. On clicking that button, it will open the Refund In-Store pop-up, there’s a QR code on that pop-up, this QR code is used for refunding.* The staff B at store will use KardPOS to help customers to refund. They logins to POS app, open Transactions screen, on this screen they will find the payment transaction which the customer had done before and tap it open Transaction Detail screen, on which contains Refund Transaction button.* On tapping Refund Transaction button, it will open the camera (scanning screen), the staff will scan the QR code on the web app which user is openning above. After scanning, POS app shows Refund Transaction screen, which allows the staff enter amount that user wants to refund, then tap Continue to show the refund confirmation screen, on this screen, user can check how much had he/she done payment and how much he/she wants to refund.* After checking confirmation, the staff will tap Confirm button to finish Refund process:# -Refund successful pop-up will be shown.- *On web, user need to close the refund popup manually. We will enhance this later by implement notification system on web*#  The refund amount will be transfer to user kash kard from merchant’s kash kard, the balance on PrimeTrust must be updated as well.# Record transaction on KardPOS app / web apps / ARM site (merchant and admin) / Visipay site.+_Validation rules:_+* User can only refund to Kash Kard, that means Refund button only shown on Kash Kard detail page, not on any other card detail.* User can only refund with the QR code from Refund button. If using any other ones, the POS app will show the error message pop-up and says “This code is invalid.“* The staff can only help customers to refund for payment transaction which had been performed directly at store. If customers perform doing payment internally on web app such as buying products or gift cards of merchant, they cannot refund for such these transactions.* The refund amount must be equal to or less than payment amount.* Each payment transaction can only refunded one-time only, if a transaction is refunded already, Refund Transaction button will be hidden.* KYC limitation will be applied for refund transaction. If the refund amount makes customer kash kard exceeds over hold limit ($15,000.00), the refund transaction cannot be done and the error message pop-up will show on POS app and says “Your customer cannot hold more than $15,000.00“.

title: API - Visipay - Point Configuration
description: As VisiKard Admin I want to be able to manage point reward on the Admin site instead of the current ARM site.* I can open the left menu “Point Management” to access the page to configure point reward with below* This shows the list of activities that the system or merchants reward points to customers.** Display the list of point categories that the system supports:*** System reward:**** Sign up**** Get KYC verified**** Trade with a friend (first time only)**** First successful money loading to KK from any credit card/crypto card/bank account. (*_this activity is only applied for the first-time loading of a certain card_*, if user has credit card and bank account, they can only get reward for loading from credit card for the first time).**** Invite a friend and that friend registers account with the platform successfully*** Merchant reward:**** Buy Gift Card**** Buy Product**** Trade with Merchant (first time only)**** Rate Merchant** The list have these columns:*** Name*** Description*** Values (Points): User will earn this amount of point when doing this activity*** Rewarded by: System/Merchant*** Status*** Actions**** Edit:***** Description***** Value (rewarded points)***** Validation rule:****** Description and Value fields are required. If they are empty (no input or input space character), show the red error message “Description is required.“ / “Value is required.“ under each field.****** Value field only accepts integers (ex: 1, 2, 3, …, 20, 30), if inputting decimal/negative value show the red error message “Value is invalid.“ next to the field name.**** Disable: Display a confirm popup before disable: “Are you sure to disable this reward activity?“ (Disable, Cancel buttons)**** Enable: Display a confirm popup before enable: “Are you sure to enable this reward activity?“ (Enable, Cancel buttons)** If an activity is disabled, consumer cannot see it on *_“How to earn point”_* screen in the app, which means they cannot earn points from it as well. ** If the admin edits any activities (description, value), the content in the app must be changed (on *_“How to earn point”_* screen) corresponding to edited information.** *Remove this feature from ARM Master.*

title: API - Consumer Apps - Buy Product Flow - Redeem Points
description: As a customer, I would like to be able to redeem points when purchasing products while the current process allows me to pay with kash kard, gift cards and coupons.* I select a product from anywhere in a consumer app.* At the Purchase Confirmation screen:*# Apply the priority on subtracting the amount the user has to pay: coupon => gift card => points.*# If the amount subtracted when the user selects the coupon / gift card is $0.00, the point selection will be disabled, user cannot select point.*# If user chooses points first, then chooses coupon / gift card, the subtracted amount will be recalculated based on the priority of rule #1 above. If the final total amount is $0.00 (after choosing gift card / coupon card), rule #2 is applied.** Example:*** The total amount that the user has to pay is $ 20.00, they first choose $15.00 of points, then choose $6.00 of coupon. The value of the coupon will be subtracted as the highest priority (20.00 - 6.00 = $14.00), so the points the user previously selected is reset up to maximum $14.00.*** The total amount the user has to pay is $20.00, they first choose $15.00 of points, then choose $20.00 of coupon. The value of the coupon will be subtracted as the highest priority (20.00 - 20.00 = $ 0.00), so the points previously selected by the user are reset to $0.00, which also means that point selection will be automatically disabled at that time.* At the checkout step of buying product, I can select number of points that I want to use to pay for the order of buying product.** Maximum value of "seekBar" must be*** If my balance is in USD, so total amount I pay: Exchange rate * total amount to be paid.**** For example, my balance is 1200, the exchange rate is 100 points = $ 1, the total I pay is $ 3.12 => maximum I can choose = 100 * 3.12 = 312 point = 3.12 dollars.*** If the balance of feature II with the USD small more or by total money, I must be paid: Maximum points, I can choose will be the points I use:**** Example: my balance is 1200, the exchange rate is 100 points = $ 1, the total I pay is $ 15 => I can choose a maximum of $ 1200 = $ 12** The increment step of “seekBar” should be $1 (100 pts)** Whenever I select points, I can see the exchanged amount that I can pay for the current order based on the used points.* If the transaction is failed because I don’t have enough points that I selected for any reason. Display the error message “You don’t have enough points“.* Seperate the value of points with a comma  (like money). Ex: 1,500 points / 10,000 points* After buying the order successfully:** My point account is updated by reducing the points used for the order.** I see one reward transaction in Reward Redemption section under Points tab of wallet.** Update one more row in Order Detail: Point with** I can take orders through delivery or pickup (at exactly the store which I have purchased).** Disable the point selection if user point balance is 0 or the final amount that user need to pay is 0*Do not update current steps. We'll have another ticket to enhance the current flow to reduce the steps for it later.*

title: Android - Kard/GreenCom/KingdomPay Mobile Apps - Invite Friend - Unhide and Correct Invitation Link
description: As a customer I expect to see the ability to invite a friend to get commission on Kard/GreenCom/KingdomPay mobile apps with the same function of the web app.* Invitation commission model of HYT and other tenants are different, so we don’t update for HYT in this scope of this story.* Invite button on Home Screen or Invite a Friend on the left menu** Open Share Dialog like HYT app.** The functions of Share dialog is the same as HYT app but need to update the invitation link to be same as the link the system sends to invitees from the web app.* My Personal Kard (select avatar on the top left corner)** Do the same as HYT but update the invitation link.* User can invite friends with or without KYC passed

title: Backend - Invite Friend - Update commission model
description: As a Tenant I want to offer a commission to my existing customers when new users who are invited by them to make the first purchase in order to attract more customers to join the platform and make payment.* I want to be able to configure the commission amount when accessing left menu “Commission Configuration on Visipay.** Add new menu “Commission Configuration” into the left menu of Visipay under Fee Configuration.** Add new field “Invitation Bonus” in order to configure the bonus amount in USD.*** Invitation Commission**** Bonus for Inviter**** Bonus for Invitee**** Bonus must be positive number with the format $0.00* Update the logic of current invitation commission.** Current: customer gets commission as soon as invitee registers new account with the system.** New: customer gets commission when invitee makes the first purchase.*** Buy products*** Buy gift cards*** Pay at store with QR code (use KardPOS)** The transaction of sending commission is the same as the current flow.*** Transfer commission amount from the default merchant of the current tenant to customer’s KK if the commission amount is greater than 0.*** Transfer commission amount from the default merchant of the current tenant to invitee’s KK if the commission amount is greater than 0.* UI design: Git - KardSys\\VisiPay\\05-Export\\Sprint 2036\\KP-420 Commission Config

title: API - Consumer Apps - Buy Gift Card - Redeem Points
description: As a customer I want to be able to redeem my points when buying a GC while the current flow allows me to pay by kash kard.* I select a GC from any place in the consumer app** Marketplace > Online tab** Store detail > Buy gift card** Store detail > Gift card konnect category* At the checkout step of buying a GC, I can select number of points that I want to use to pay for the order of buying a gift card.** Maximum Value of the “seekBar“ should be*** If my point balance in USD is greater than the total amount that I have to pay: exchange rate * total pay amount.**** For example: my point balance is 1200, exchange rate is 100 pts = $1, total amount that I have to pay is $3.12 => max point I can select = 100*3.12 = 312 pts = $3.12*** If my point balance in USD is smaller than or equal to the total amount that I have to pay: max point I can select will be my available point:**** For example: my point balance is 1200, exchange rate is 100 pts = $1, total amount that I have to pay is $15.00 => max point I can select = 1200 pts = $12** -The increment step of “seekBar” should be $1 (100 pts)-** Whenever I select points, I can see the exchanged amount that I can pay for the current order based on the used points.* If the transaction is failed because I don’t have enough points that I selected for any reason. Display the error message “You don’t have enough points“.* After buying an order of a gift card successfully (These things should be worked already, please re-check)** My point account is updated by reducing the points used for the order.** I see one reward transaction in Reward Redemption section under Points tab of wallet.** I can see the gift card bought in my wallet (Gift Card tab) if I buy it for my wallet or in my friend’s wallet if I select to gift to friend.** I can redeem the gift card at exactly the store which I bought.* Disable the point selection if user point balance is 0UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/22000490-cc77-4eb8-963e-cc0bbfb86326-7753/screen/ca557291-774b-4dfe-bf45-04d5af2dae87|https://xd.adobe.com/view/22000490-cc77-4eb8-963e-cc0bbfb86326-7753/screen/ca557291-774b-4dfe-bf45-04d5af2dae87]

title: ARM - Allow Merchant to buy points from KK
description: As a merchant I want to be able to manage my point account on ARM so that I can reward points the customers through the defined rewarded activities with my merchant.* I can view current balance of my point account on ARM.** Point balance is showed on new tab Points into Account → Payment tab under Payment method section.** Use comma to separate the value of point if it’s too large. (Ex: 1,500 / 100,000…), this should be applied for all places displaying point in ARM merchant.* I can view exchange rate below Exchange Amount field.  (The exchange rate is configured by ARM Master Admin).*_Format: Exchange Rate: $x = y point(s) (Ex: $1 = 10 points)_**  I can purchase points using Kash Kard from my wallet through below steps.*# I enter the amount in USD to buy points and I can see the points with entered amount right after I enter amount.*# I select a card from my wallet to pay for this request but I expect to see Kash Kard only for this scope.*# I confirm to purchase.*## I expect to see the error message “Please input amount.“ if I do not enter amount and click Buy button.*## If amount equals to 0, Buy button should be grey out.*## I expect to see the error message “Your Kash Kard does not have enough money for this transaction.” if my KK’s balance is not enough.*## If my KK has enough money, I expect to see new transaction with type “Point Purchase” under my transactions and my point account is increased. Show the message above Buy button: “You have bought \[number] points successfully.“*### I can filter my transactions of buying points with category “Point Purchase” on Transactions screen.*## Money flow is as below.*### Transfer merchant’s KK to System KK and trigger to update PrimeTrust accounts for this transaction too.*### Add points to merchant account after charging money from their KK successfully.* If my point account’s balance is not enough for an reward activity, let skip the reward transaction to customer and don’t record anything for this case.

title: API - Visipay - Point Account Management
description: *Description:*As a VisiKard Admin I want to manage all point accounts of the platform* Here are the point accounts managed in the platform.** Each merchant has their own point account.** Each customer has their own point account.*AC:** Add new tab Points to Reserve Accounts page to display:** Total points with amount of Merchant Point Accounts.** Total points with amount of Consumer Point Accounts.** Total points of system= Merchant’s points + Consumer’s points** Exchanged Amount of Total Points = Total points of system/Exchange rate.*** For example: total points is 1000, exchange rate is 100pts = $1 => Exchanged Amount = 1000/100 = $10* Exchange rate: 100 pts = $1.** This value should be stored on DB** Currently we dont have UI function to modify it** Use comma to separate the value of point if it’s too large. (Ex: 1,500 / 100,000…)

Let investigate the best solution to sync data from Entertainment to the platform.* Businesses and their locations should not be synced up every day because this information is not updated regularly. Let have another scheduled job to sync up businesses and locations.* Insert subcategories from Entertainment into the list of business categories if they don’t exist.* Insert main categories from Entertainment into the list of category groups.

title: iOS Apps - Marketplace - Online tab
description: As a customer I want to be able to see the list of merchants who are selling gift cards near to me and view the list of gift cards to purchase.* *Update Menu*** Change Local Marketplace to Marketplace.** Remove Gift Cards from the left menu (for mobile apps).* *Set My Location*** Whenever I access Marketplace page, I expect to receive the request from the app to access my device’s location if my current location is not configured.** I can change my location whenever I want in order to filter the merchants near to me on Nearby tab.** I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location.* *Nearby tab*** Incomm merchants are added into ARM by VisiKard admin and linked to Incomm gift cards so that these merchants can be showed in this review like in-store merchants. ** This is the list of merchants who have the default active konnect zone. Currently a merchant can have only ONE active KZ but in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-76|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-76|smart-link] the system will allow merchant to have multiple active KZs and must configure the default one.** Marketplace list of businesses should be built from these sources and shown in Geo Proximity from closest to farthest.*** ARM Business List*** Incomm Business List → I suggest we call VisiKard businesses because these business can sell coupons from another company not Incomm in the future. ** The default active KZ of each merchant can participate with different locations and different locations will be show from near to far on this view.*** For example: KFC has 3 locations L1, L2, L3 from near to far. Lotteria has 2 locations L4, L5.*** Distance order from these locations to the current location: L1, L4, L2, L3, L5.*** I expect to see as below**** KFC at L1**** Lottera at L4**** KFC at L2**** KFC at L3**** Lotteria at L5 ** I can search businesses by entering Name, Business Category into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.** I can scroll down to load more businesses based on their konnect zone’s locations to be showed from near to far.** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter businesses and All option is selected by default.** Each business must have below information.*** Logo*** Business Name*** Address (Business Location)*** Business Category*** Distance from current member location ** When I select a merchant on this list, I can see store detail of this merchant.** The current UI of Local Marketplace should be kept as it is nearly the same as Nearby tab.* *Online tab*** This is the list of active gift cards under active konnect zones including the gift cards from ARM merchants and Incomm merchants.** Gift cards are sorted with below criteria.*** Discount % descending*** Brand (gift card of the same brand must be showed continuously) → merchant who sell gift card** I can search gift card on this tab by entering Name, Brand into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter gift cards on the selected business category and All option is selected by default.** When I select a gift card to buy, I will go through the flow of buying gift card defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-147|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-147|smart-link]

title: Web Apps - Update Store Detail for Merchant
description: As a merchant I want to be able to setup a basic KZ for customers to review my store with minimum data.* Minimum data** ARM Coupons** ARM Gift Cards** Incomm Gift Cards* I can setup only one Konnect Category for my KZ at basic level instead of 4 as current requirement.* Basic KZ should have below information.** Address** Phone Number** Distance from current member location** Business categories – show multiple if available** Pay Button** See sample*** !image-20200719-142941.png|width=328,height=385!

title: Visikard Admin - Gift Card Report - Revenue report
description: As a VisiKard Admin, I want to have a report of all gift cards purchased by customer when accessing VisiKard Admin portal.* I want to access Gift Card Report menu to open the report page.* I can see 2 tabs on this page.** Gift Card Listing** Gift Card Revenue Report* Gift Card Listing** Search and filter criteria.*** Filter by gift card type: “In-Store” or “Incomm”.*** Filter by Order Date in date range.** When I fill in all the above information, I can view the list of gift cards as a table.*** Gift Card Number*** Image*** Customer → First Name + Last Name of customer who purchased gift card.*** Order Date → the date when the gift card has been purchased.*** Brand → This is business name of merchant who issue the gift card.*** Price → the price that customer purchase for the gift card.*** Amount → value of gift card that can be redeemed.** I can export the list of gift cards to CSV.* Gift Card Revenue Report** Filter criteria*** Month and Year**** Default value is the current month of the current year.**** I can select “All” option from Month drop-down list to view the report for a selected year.**** Values of year must not be greater than the current year.*** Gift Card Type: In-store, Incomm, All**** All is default value** Review Chart*** Month and Year are selected**** Chart***** Display total amount of gift cards that are sold in the system for each day of the selected month. ***** Skip the date that don’t have any transaction**** The detail listing for each date***** Number of Transactions***** Revenue (total gift card amount - total discount)***** Commission**** Have a summary at the end of the detail listing.*** Only Year is selected**** The same as above report but it show for each month instead of each day.*** I can export this report to PDF.

title: Web Apps - Marketplace - Online tab
description: As a customer I want to be able to see the list of merchants who are selling gift cards near to me and view the list of gift cards to purchase.* *Update Menu*** Change Local Marketplace to Marketplace.** Remove Gift Cards from the left menu (for mobile apps).* *Set My Location*** Whenever I access Marketplace page, I expect to receive the request from the app to access my device’s location if my current location is not configured.** I can change my location whenever I want in order to filter the merchants near to me on Nearby tab.** I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location.* *Nearby tab*** This is the list of merchants who have gift cards to sell in the platform.** Marketplace list of businesses should be built from these sources and shown in Geo Proximity from closest to farthest.*** ARM Business List*** Incomm Business List** Each gift card can be sold at different locations and the nearest location will be showed under the business on this view. ** I can search businesses by entering Name, Business Category into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.** Incomm merchants are added into ARM by VisiKard admin and linked to Incomm gift cards so that these merchants can be showed in this review like in-store merchants. ** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter businesses and All option is selected by default.** Each business must have below information.*** Logo*** Business Name*** Address (Business Location)*** Business Category*** Distance from current member location ** When I select a merchant on this list, I can see store detail of this merchant.* *Online tab*** This is the list of active gift cards that are sold in the platform.** Gift cards are sorted with below criteria.*** Discount % descending*** Brand (gift card of the same brand must be showed continuously)** I can search gift card on this tab by entering Name, Brand into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.** I can select the filter icon to select the list of konnect categories of gift cards with All option is selected by default.*** Sample categories should be: **** All**** Food**** Shop**** Entertainment**** Play**** Live**** Travel**** Services** When I select a gift card to buy, I will go through the flow of buying gift card defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-151|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-151|smart-link]

title: ARM - Merchant Accounts - Approve for Visikard Merchant
description: As a VisiKard Admin I want to be able to register merchants for Incomm Gift Cards in the platform and can approve these merchants after registration without through KYC process.* I register new merchant as normal process with any subscription type that is not free.* I log in as ARM Master Admin and select Merchant Accounts.* I can select new merchant and indicate that this is owned by VisiKard so that this merchant does not go through KYC process.** Add new button “Set as VK Merchant” on Action column.** Select on this button I will see a confirmation message “Please confirm that VisiKard owns \[Business Name]”.* I can approve a VisiKard merchant although it does get KYC verified because this merchant is using the VisiKard prime Trust account for KK payment.

title: Backend - Security - SQL Injection
description: * Review the report of SQL injection errors provided by Sonarqube server.** [http://icci.tpssoft.com.vn:9008/project/issues?id=Visikard-Kard-KashKard&open=AXNq6vwyVySa8tJAsfI8&resolved=false&sonarsourceSecurity=sql-injection&types=SECURITY_HOTSPOT|http://icci.tpssoft.com.vn:9008/project/issues?id=Visikard-Kard-KashKard&open=AXNq6vwyVySa8tJAsfI8&resolved=false&sonarsourceSecurity=sql-injection&types=SECURITY_HOTSPOT] (Login by using TPS domain account - Contact devops guys if you cannot access to this report)* Fix the errors from the above report with the below priority.** Critical issues that break the functions from data input from normal users who don’t know the deep knowledge to try to test security.** Remaining* Note down the list of impacted features when fixing the draw SQL query to solve this issue. Impact functions must be tested by the developers who work on this task.

title: Web App - Search Screen
description: As a customer, I want to have a feature on web app allowing to search other customers as well as businesses (merchants).+*Acceptance Criteria:*+* People item is removed from the top navigation bar.* A new icon (magnifying glass) is added on the top navigation bar, next to Cart icon. When user click at Search icon, it shows the Search page.* On Search page:** The page title: Search** The page is devided into 2 tabs (People and Business). If user want to search people, choose People tab, choose Business tab to search merchant.** There is a field which user can enter keyword to search on each tab.** The placeholder text: “Enter people name / business name” and a search icon before (magnifying glass)** User can only search people or merchants being associated with the same tenant of web app which they are using. If user search some customer or merchant belonging to the other tenant, show the error message “There are no results that match your search.”** For each tab, user can see:||*Tab*||*Action*|||People|Show the list of customers currently using the same web app.||Business|Show the list of merchants being associated with the same tenant partner.|* If search session do not display any result, show the error message “There are no results that match your search.”.* After searching, the result will be displayed:** Customer: show the name, avatar. User can open the user detail pop-up by clicking on that.** Merchant: show the business name, business logo image, location, rating stars, distance and discount percentage. User can open the store detail page by clicking on that.User can change the location to search merchants from the other location.* If user do not allow or block location on web app, the page shows all merchants.* If user set the current location (for example: Ho Chi Minh City), the page shows below business (merchants) being in HCM City.* If user change the location (for example: New York, US), the page shows business (merchants) being in New York, US.+_UI design:_+XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/370571bd-252f-451a-9451-fbc8ec6492f7-6256/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/370571bd-252f-451a-9451-fbc8ec6492f7-6256/]Git: KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2033\\KP-154 Web App - Search Screen

title: Web Apps - Konnection
description: As a customer, I want to connect other customer users or merchants and add each customer or merchant which I had connected to each connection group.+*AC:*+On Home page, user can see a Connections button. When I click at that one, it shows Your Connections page.* On Your Connections page:** The page title: Your Connections** The default connection group: All Kard (All GreenCom), Co-workers, Family, Friends, Favorites.** If user has not connected any user / merchant, the default image of group is used as same as All Kard group (Kard loading).** When user click at any connection group, it shows the page of that connection group, they can see all connections I had chosen and added to this group.* On the page of connection group:** The group name displayed at the top.** The list of connections are shown below (avatar/merchant logo and customer name or business name).** In a group, user detail pop-up (containing chat and send icons) is opened on clicking at user’s avatar. Store detail page is opened on clicking at merchant’s logo image.** There are buttons “Edit group” and “Remove this group”.*** When I click at Edit Group button:**** Remove icon appears on each connection, if user click that icon, that connection will be removed.**** Edit icon appears next to group name, if user click that icon, Edit Group Name pop-up is displayed, user can enter a new name and click Done button to save.**** There are two buttons: Done and Add Member.***** Add Member: user click that to open the list of connections pop-up, on this pop-up, user can see the connections which they had added but not existing in the group, each line of list will have a checkbox, which allows user to add multiple connections to the current group, below the list is OK button, on clicking that the pop-up will be closed, user can see the new connection(s) added at the bottom of the list.***** Done: user click that to return View mode.*** When I click at “Remove this group” text, a confirmation pop-up shown up and says “Are you sure you want to remove this group?“ and two buttons Remove, Cancel and a close button at the corner (x).||*Button*||*Action*|||Remove|Remove the group, redirect to Your Connections page.User cannot see that group on Your Connection page any more.||Cancel|Close the confirmation pop-up, no action performed.||Close button (x)|Close the confirmation pop-up.|*_Validation rules:_* * Edit group: ** If the connections are removed from a group, they can be stored in the other groups (at least in the default group All Kard). ** The name of default group (All Kard) is not allowed to edit, user can only edit the name of other groups. * Remove group: The default group (All Kard) is not allowed to remove, user can only remove the other groups except that one.There’s a button “Add new group” so that user can actively add a new group to Your Connections page. When I click at Add New Group button, Add New Group pop-up. User can enter new group name then save by clicking Save button. A new group is added next to Add new group button (on the left side).XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/38f63fd4-5853-4191-94ea-c4567799bfb7-6da5/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/38f63fd4-5853-4191-94ea-c4567799bfb7-6da5/]Git:KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2033\\KP-212 Kollections Web\\KP-122 Kollection Web.xd

title: VisiPay Admin - Credit Cards
description: As a VisiPay Admin, I want to view all Credit Card information at “Credit Cards” feature by click on “Card Number”, then I can:* Filter by category.* Date range: From date / To date.As a result, I can view all the transactions associated with that credit card number.

title: Consumer - Verification Credit Card
description: As a user, I need to verify my Credit Card by inputting the verification code (4 digits) OR the amount (temporary charge) which are sent to me by my issuance credit card:* Verification Code (4 digits):!Verification Code.png|width=1280,height=625!* Amount (temporary charge):!Amount.png|width=1280,height=625!* Once input the correct verification code or amount, the success message is shown as below.  The result: my credit card is added to my wallet and ready to use.!Success verification.png|width=1893,height=189!Note:* *Development (Dev/Staging/Sandbox/Demo) environment:* in the development environment,  the verification code or amount can be obtained through the following endpoint:GET /v2/credit-card-resources/:id/sandbox\{   "data": \{     "type: "credit-card-resources",     "id": "CREDIT_CARD_RESOURCE_ID",{noformat}"attributes": {       "descriptor": "VERIFICATION_CODE"     }   } } {noformat}In addition, for +User Acceptance testing convenience (QC/PO/Customer)+, that verification code or amount are needed to be received *easiest*, without running API by Postman. For instance, the verification code is 1111, and the amount is 1.00 as always in the development environment.  If else, *kindly suggest (contact point: PO)*.* *PRODUCTION environment:* In production, the customer would check their billing statement to get this code.  This is a sample billing statement which is sent by the issuance credit card has included the verification code (3482) and amount (temporary charge of $1.06):!image-20200715-064550.png|width=288,height=454!
