title: Visikard Admin - Gift Card Report - Gift Card Listing
description: As a VisiKard Admin, I want to have a report of all gift cards purchased by customer when accessing VisiKard Admin portal.* I want to access Gift Card Report menu to open the report page.* I can see 2 tabs on this page.** Gift Card Listing** Gift Card Revenue Report* Gift Card Listing** Search and filter criteria.*** Filter by gift card type: “In-Store” or “Incomm”.*** Filter by Order Date in date range.** When I fill in all the above information, I can view the list of gift cards as a table.*** Gift Card Number*** Image*** Customer → First Name + Last Name of customer who purchased gift card.*** Order Date → the date when the gift card has been purchased.*** Brand → This is business name of merchant who issue the gift card.*** Price → the price that customer purchase for the gift card.*** Amount → value of gift card that can be redeemed.** I can export the list of gift cards to CSV.* Gift Card Revenue Report** Filter criteria*** Month and Year**** Default value is the current month of the current year.**** I can select “All” option from Month drop-down list to view the report for a selected year.**** Values of year must not be greater than the current year.*** Gift Card Type: In-store, Incomm, All**** All is default value** Review Chart*** Month and Year are selected**** Chart***** Display total amount of gift cards that are sold in the system for each day of the selected month. **** The detail listing for each date***** Number of Transactions***** Revenue (total gift card amount - total discount)***** Commission**** Have a summary at the end of the detail listing.*** Only Year is selected**** The same as above report but it show for each month instead of each day.*** I can export this report to PDF.

Another story will be created for this page separately.*** Users (Implementation will be in other story)*** Transactions  (Implementation will be in other story)*** Merchants  (Implementation will be in other story)*** Gift Cards  (Implementation will be in other story)** Let show message “The feature will be available soon.” when I access a menu that link to an unavailable feature.

title: API - Update Flow of Buying A Gift Card
description: As I customer I want to be able to make order to purchase a gift card with a better UI and less steps than the current flow.# Select a gift card## I can enter amount to buy for a  gift card it has min-max value.## Otherwise I must buy with the fixed value.## I can see term and condition of the current gift card on this screen.# I can select the option to add into my wallet or send to friend.# I can select a card from my wallet to pay for ordering the current gift card.## I am notified that “You need to get KYC verified” if I select kash kard to pay for the current order.# I expect to be asked for confirmation for the current order with the message “Confirm to purchase gift card \[Name] for $\[Amount]?”.# -If I confirm, the order will be processed. Otherwise, I am pending a the current step.-# -After the order of buying a gift card is processed successfully.-  (We have another story to handle this requirement)## -If the order is failed, I expected to receive an error for the failing reason.-## -If the order is success, I can see the detail of gift card on a new screen.-### -Card Image-### -Value-### -Barcode-#### -For in-store gift card, let show barcode of the current flow in order customers to scan this to the merchant at store.-#### -For Incomm gift card, let show barcode or QR code if having.-### -GC number-### -PIN: this is empty for in-store gift card and might be empty for some Incomm stores-

title: Visipay - Fail-over for E-commerce Credit Card Payment
description: As a Visipay admin I want to be able to configure credit card payment channel to support multiple MIDs to handle below features.* Setup payment gateways and payment channels - this feature is available already.** Setup different payment gateways for different MID accounts → one payment gateway is configured with with MID account.** Setup different payment channels for one tenant with different payment gateways of [Authorize.net|http://Authorize.net]/QuickCard by identifying the priority.* Handle fail-over of multiple payment gateways for credit card process. ** Whenever there is any issue with the first channel that causes the transaction failed, the system must send credit card transaction to the next channel based on the priority automatically instead of stopping the transaction and inform the customer about the error.

title: BHT Tenant Admin - Settings - Banner ad
description: As a BHT Tenant Admin, I should the ability to configure banner to dipslay advertisement on the top of BHT site. Bringing users a banner of crucial or special meetings is an effective method to help them to not miss any meetings or sale campaigns*Acceptance Criteria:** There is a new tab called “Banner“ positioned next to “Experts“ tab* Accessing “Banner“ tab sees the list of adversiethat will be displayed in Home page of user site+_Advertisement creation_+* I see following things** “Event“: This an auto-suggest field. It lists out names of all active upcoming and past events from Events page. This list is sorted via alphabetical order** “Host”: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays host of selected event. If selected event does not have a host, do not display this field. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field.** “Speakers“: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays speakers of selected event. If selected event does not have any speakers, do not display this field. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field.** “Start Time“: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays start time of selected event. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field.** “End Time“: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays end time of selected event. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field. ** “Content”*** This is the content area where admin has to enter content of advertisement. *** Use ckeditor as we are using for “Experts“ feature to enter text. I should have the ability to make the text bold, italic as normal. Also, add a new option to change the text color (colorpicker)** “Save“ button*** Clicking on this saves the creation then is back to the list of advertisement*** If admin does not select an event, display the validation text*** If amins does not enter content, display validation message “Advertisement content is required“*** After saving creation successfully, display the message “Successful to save advertisement“ and “OK button“. If clicking on “OK button“, the modal is gone.** “Cancel“ button: clicking on this cancels the creation+_Advertisement editing_+* I can edit banner by entering new data then save as normal.* Banner in BHT user site applies the latest change from admin configuration Mockup:[https://xd.adobe.com/view/bd75e3f7-0e60-40dc-b920-ebe3b23f2b0b-e826/screen/d02754d0-e322-418b-99e6-83900d32be67/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/bd75e3f7-0e60-40dc-b920-ebe3b23f2b0b-e826/screen/d02754d0-e322-418b-99e6-83900d32be67/|smart-link] Use the type of modal below to notify the completion of creating advertisement!image-20210323-110328.png|width=100%!

title: BHT Web App - Banner
description: As a BHT user or guest accessing Home page, I’m able to see banner displaying crucial meetings or big sale campaign. This is for advertising purpose so that it will make BHT site more attractive in users' view.*Acceptance Criteria:** Banner is positioned below the navigation bar* Banner displays infomation of crucial or special upcoming events. * Content of banner is configured by BHT Tenant Admin. An event displayed in banner includes following things:** Meeting date *** This is always aligned center*** Display exactly the start time of the event configured by admin*** The start time is converted into PST and EST format. The date is converted into EST** Content: *** This is always aligned center*** The content here is configured by admin, including color, style, font-size * If I click on the banner, it opens the modal to be ready to watch the event. The modal is the same with that in Schedule page, including:** Thumbnail*** When the event has not been started, display the thumbnail.*** When the event is being happened, user can watch it as normal.*** When the event is ended, display the thumbnail.** Meeting (Event) name** Host** Speaker** Start Time** Status: this includes only LIVE** “Close“ button:*** Clicking on this closes the modal*** User’s able to view modal again when clicking on banner* If that event has been disabled while the notification is still being displayed, clicking on that notification displays the message “This event has been disabled by admin“Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c65e3a0-26b1-451a-b23f-e92abfbd4962-6936/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c65e3a0-26b1-451a-b23f-e92abfbd4962-6936/|smart-link]

This field is the same as when editing a past event.* There are changes in rules for uploading thumbnail** Remove “This banner should be 929x404px“ text next to Upload button** Display and apply new rules*** “Recommend resolution is 1280x720 (with minimum width of 640 pixels)“: when admin uploads a thumbnail whose width is less than 640 pixels, display the validation message “The uploaded file is being less then 640 pixels in width “*** “File must be less than 10MB“: when admin uploads a thumbnail whose size is greater than 10MB, display the validation message “The uploaded file is exceeding the maximum file size (10MB)“*** “Allowed file types: .JPG, .JPEG, .GIF, .BMP, or .PNG”: when admins uploads a thumbnail whose file type is not one of allowed ones, display the validation message “The uploaded file is not an allowed file type“* Apply the changes above for editing upcoming and past events also* We will no longer use the random thumbnail selection form JWPlayerMockup:!EditEvent001 (c7445056-1968-42a4-85eb-95460d3a34fd).png|width=100%!!CreateAnEvent001 (8c4e364b-b2e6-4eb5-9a03-7a378a4d1396).png|width=100%!

title: Request a Phone Call for OTP
description: Currently, our system will send OTP via SMS when there's a new registered Merchant, forgot password, send money...etc. This caused an issue when Merchant using a landline phone which cannot receive sms. Even on mobile phones, there're cases the service provider turn off sms.Solution: We build a function so that Merchant can get their OTP via Phone Call.Scope: ARM Merchant Registration, ARM Merchant Change Phone Number*AC1:*1. Allow Merchant to use landline phone number2. When Merchant provides a phone number. We have dropdown options for verify the phone number on the same screen, allow Merchant to choose: “Send OTP via SMS” or “Get OTP via Phone call”.3. If Merchant chooses “Send OTP via SMS” but using a landline. We should warning:3.1. When change phone number: “Unable to send OTP via SMS to your new phone number. Please make sure your new number is a valid mobile phone number and try again.“3.2. Other cases: “Unable to send OTP via SMS to your phone number. Please make sure your number is a valid mobile phone number and try again.“4. When Merchant chooses the Phone Call option, our system will make a phone call to Merchant automatically with a pre-defined message: "This is Kanoo calling with your verification code. Your verification code is \[OTP code]. Again, your verification code is \[OTP code]. Thank you.5. Merchant confirms OTP.Phone calls will cost a lot of money. We will need to prevent Merchant from repeatedly use this feature.*AC2:*Configure a rule for admin say: Maximum Phone calls request per day e.g 10 times / dayWhen the Merchant has reached limitation, we don’t make anymore phone call but warning the Merchant: “You seem to have trouble getting and verifying your OTP. Please contact customer service for support.“

title: BHT Tenant Admin - Speaker - Rank
description: As a BHT admin, I should have the ability to edit the order of speakers displayed in Our Doctor page*Acceptance criteria:** There are two ways to give speakers a rank. +_Speaker list_+* There is a new column added in Speaker page. It is called Rank.* I can input a number from 1 to 100 directly in each speaker row.** For example, the speaker A has rank 2, the speaker B has rank 5 so that speaker A will be displayed first  in the carousel then speaker B.** If two different speakers have the same rank, they will be sorted based on the alphabetical order.* The default rank of all users is 100.+_Speaker Edit Detail page_+* There is also a new field Rank in Speaker Edit page.* I can input a number from 1 to 100 to give that speaker a rank then save the change.* Ensure the rank numbers of a speaker in +_Speaker Edit Detail page_+ and +_Speaker list_+  are equal.Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/ae5d49b5-485d-46ab-9f34-f4ceeaec9892/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/ae5d49b5-485d-46ab-9f34-f4ceeaec9892/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web - Schedule - View your events
description: As a BHT speaker logging to system, I want to have the ability to view all events that I will join as an official speaker.*Acceptance criteria:*+_Improve Today button_+* Move Today button on the top of the calendar.* It works as normal.+_Your events_+* Add a button called Your events next to Today button.* Clicking on the button displays all events (including past, today, and upcoming) in which the logged user is assigned as a speaker.* There is a button callled All events** Clicking on the button is back to all events page as normal.

title: BHT Tenant Admin - Our doctors - Featured doctors management
description: As a tenant admin, I should have the ability to manage featured doctors display.*Acceptance Criteria* * Add a new tab called Our Doctor positioned below Articles.* Clicking on the button navigates to the page where I can manage static data of featured doctor.* There is a fieldset displayed as default** One fieldset is equivalent to one featured doctor.** In each fieldset, there are following things:*** Doctor name: this is fixed field as default*** Doctor images: this is fixed field as default. I should have the ability to upload one image of that doctor.*** A default heading field and its value field. This can not be deleted.*** Add heading button**** Clicking on this add a new heading field and its value field. For example, I add a new heading named Education and enter its value is Graduated Cambridge University.**** I can add many headings.*** Delete heading buttons**** Each heading field has this button.**** Clicking on this button deletes the heading field and its value fields instantly.* There is a button called Add Doctor at the top-right corner** Clicking on the button adds new fieldsetMock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/52af7c27-f18b-423c-bb96-a3c6ee42c227/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/52af7c27-f18b-423c-bb96-a3c6ee42c227/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web - Create Events - Add Speakers field.
description: As a tenant admin, I should have the ability to select speakers and host while creating an event.*Acceptance Criteria:*+_Improve Host By field_+* Host By field is no longer be a text field. It is an auto-suggest and non-required field.* I can select one existing BHT user to be the host. One event has one host only.+_Speakers field_+* It is an auto-suggest and non-required field.* I can select many speakers, including BHT and Outside speakers (defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1260|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1260|smart-link] ). One event has one or many speakers.+_Event list_+* Add a new column positioned next to Host By called Speaker.* If an event has many speakers, display them clearly by commas.+_Event details_+* Add a new field positioned below Host By called Speaker.* If an event has many speakers, display them clearly by commas.Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/6d31954a-1721-4ed1-94cb-804d4b370c83/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/6d31954a-1721-4ed1-94cb-804d4b370c83/|smart-link]

title: BHT Tenant Admin - Speakers management
description: As an tenant admin, I want the ability to create some speakers. *Acceptance Criteria:** There is a tab called Speakers positioned below Events option.+_Speaker List_+* The list of speaker includes the following columns Name, Email, Specialist, Rank, Status, Action.** Rank: see [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1295|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1295|smart-link] to get more information.+_Speaker creation_+* There is a new button called New Speaker.* Clicking on the button leads to a page including Email field and Next button. ** Email is a text field.* There are two types of speaker for creation, BHT speakers and Outside speakers** BHT speakers: This type is created based on existing users. When entering email of an existing BHT user then clicking on OK, it should display following information of that user, including:*** First Name, Last Name, Email (fetch the correct data of that BHT user)*** Specialist**** If users has entered Specialist at the registration form, fetch the correct data. Otherwise, user should be able to enter specialist.**** This is a required and text field.**** Specialist defined here will be displayed in Our doctor page***  Upload Avatar**** This is a non-required field.**** Speaker avatar is not related to user avatar.** Outside speakers: This type is created without BHT system relation. When entering email NOT belonging to BHT then clicking on OK, it should display following fields to enter:*** First Name *** Last Name*** Email (show the entered email again)*** Phone Number**** This is non-required field. The same behavior as Email field*** Specialist**** This is a required and text field.**** Specialist defined here is displayed in Our doctor page.***  Upload Avatar**** This is a non-required field.**** Speaker avatar is not related to user avatar.* While entering an email, there are some cases below need displaying validation** “This speaker already exists“: when entering an email that has been used.** “Please enter valid email address”: when entering an incorrect format email.** When entering nothing, disable Next button.+_Speaker editing_+* Basic actions such as Edit, Disable/Enable, and Delete are included in three-dot icon as other pages.* Edit speakers:** Display correctly entered information.* Disable/Enable speakers:** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to disable/enable this speakers? <speaker name>.** When a speaker is disabled, *** Technically it is not displayed in the list of speakers in Our Doctor page.*** It is not displayed within related events.** When a speaker is enabled*** If that speaker has been related to an event, just display it in each event again.*** Display that speaker in the list of speakers in Our Doctor page.* Delete speakers:** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to delete this speaker? <speaker name>.** When a speaker is deleted*** It is removed from the list of speakers in Out Doctor page.*** It is removed from related events.+_Speaker seaching_+* Search speakers based on Name and EmailMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/ae5d49b5-485d-46ab-9f34-f4ceeaec9892/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/ae5d49b5-485d-46ab-9f34-f4ceeaec9892/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web - Our Doctors - Connect with speakers
description: As a BHT user, I should have the ability to view the details of speakers. Basic information should be displayed to available to contact speakers instantly.*Acceptance Criteria:*+_As a logged user_+* When selecting  a speaker belonging to BHT user in Our doctor page, display a modal being the same with that when connecting a BHT user, including:** Profile image: this is user avatar, not speaker avatar** Name** Connect button*** Clicking on Connect button works as the current behavior when connecting a BHT user.* When selecting a speaker NOT belonging to BHT user (called it Outside speakers) in Our doctor page, display a modal including:** Profile image: This is speaker avatar. ** Name+_As a guest_+* When selecting  a speaker belonging to BHT user in Our doctor page, display a modal being the same with that when connecting a BHT user, including:** Profile image: this is user avatar** Name* When selecting a speaker NOT belonging to BHT user (called it Outside speakers) in Our doctor page, display a modal including:** Profile image: This is speaker avatar. ** NameMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/10357954-190a-470d-b8ce-002ce4a42da8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/10357954-190a-470d-b8ce-002ce4a42da8/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web - Our Doctors - View all speakers
description: As a BHT user, I should havethe ability to view all speakers mentioned in BHT system.*Acceptance Criteria:*+_The order of speakers displayed_+* Speakers are ordered by ranks. Who having the higher rank are displayed first then others.* If two speakers have the same rank, the priority is based on alphabetical order.+_View all speakers_+* Move View more button below the speaker carousel* When clicking View more button, all speakers (including both outside and BHT speakers) are displayed.* It displays all speakers without pagination.* When all speakers are displayed, there is a button called View less** Clicking on this is back to the default.* Ensure all profile images of speakers are converted to black-white.Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/10357954-190a-470d-b8ce-002ce4a42da8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/10357954-190a-470d-b8ce-002ce4a42da8/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web - Registration - Doctor identification
description: As a user experiencing BHT registration, I should have the ability to be identifed as a doctor. It is better if a doctor attempting to register an account provides his specialist.*Acceptance Criteria:** Add a new checkbox “I’m a doctor“ positioned below Last Name while registering an BHT account.* When I ticked on this checkbox, a new text field called Specialist displayed below the checkbox** I have to enter a specialist to continue .* If I do not tick on the checkbox, it continues working as normal workflow.Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/0c76d6c0-1799-4b2b-91ec-10089b4fa25a/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/0c76d6c0-1799-4b2b-91ec-10089b4fa25a/|smart-link]

title: BHT Tenant Admin - Articles management
description: As a tenant admin I should have the ability to manage articles. My work includes articles creation, editing, deleting. This is a new feature to make BHT content more attractive.*Acceptance criteria:** Add a new tab called Articles to the left panel (below Events).* Selecting on the tab leads to Article page, including article names, authors, description.* Articles are ordered from the latest to oldest created ones as default.+_Article creation_+* There is a button called New Article.* Clicking New Article button leads to page includes the following things:** Article name** Author** Upload button*** Allow uploading only PDF format.*** No limit on PDF size.*** After uploading PDF, display the cover as a preview image.** Description** Create button** Cancel button** All fields are required.+_Arcticle editing_+* Basic actions such as Edit, Disable/Enable, and Delete are included in three-dot icon as other pages.* Edit articles:** Display correctly entered information.* Disable/Enable article:** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to disable/enable this article? <article name>.** When an article is disabled, technically it is not displayed anywhere.* Delete article:** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to delete this article? <article name>.** When an article is deleted, technically it is removed from anyplaces.+_Article searching_+* Search articles based on names, authors, descriptions.Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/d37b38bd-757b-4805-bce0-6f3ee0243cd1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/d37b38bd-757b-4805-bce0-6f3ee0243cd1/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web - Articles
description: As a user attempting to explore BHT content I want to have the ability to see articles managed by tenant admin and download them directly. *Acceptance Criteria:** Add a new tab called ARTICLE on main nav-bar. This is always available for both guests and logged users to access.+_Article page_+* Articles uploaded by BHT tenant amdin are displayed here.* An article display includes:** Title** Author** Publish date** Cover image** File type** Size** Download button*** Clicking on the button downloads PDF instantly.*** Guests are not allowed to download PDFs. When a guest click on Download button, display the login pop-up as a requirement.* Clicking on aticle names or preview images navigates to article details page.* Put articles in latest-to-oldest published date order as default.* Display message "No articles found” in case there is no articles published.* There is no pagination.+_Search articles_+* Search items based on article names and authors.* Display message "No articles found”, in case there is no articles found.+_Article details page_+* Display the following information:** Title** Author** Publish date** Cover image with larger dimensions** File type** Size** Download button*** Clicking on the button downloads PDF instantly.*** Guests are not allowed to download PDFs. When a guest click on Download button, display the login pop-up as a requirement.Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/cdc79c4c-e24e-42b1-8624-31bb99e68209/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/cdc79c4c-e24e-42b1-8624-31bb99e68209/|smart-link]

title: ARM Master/Merchant & Visipay - Transactions - Fix Performance Issue
description: Currently, the system is down due to a memory leak if Admin tries to export transactions to CSV if it has a large of records. Please use the Staging environment to verify this case and implement the fix.Please also show a progress dialog and disable the Export button when the current exporting request is being processed because it does not show anything for the processing and it causes users to confused.

title: [Web] Tenant Admin - Create/Edit/delete Events for BHT community
description: Admin should able to schedule any events related to BHT. This can be recurring or meetings requested by the users.*Acceptance Criteria:** I should able to enter the topic of the discussion.** This is required.** Free text.* I should able to set the meeting date and time (start) → this is required.** Meeting Date** Start/End Time** Meeting date/time can not be in the past.* I should be able to choose the timezone for my meeting.* I should be able to enter the information of the person who hosts the events as a free text box.* I should be able to fill in the conference URL that I set up for this event in Zoom.** This is required.* I should be able to fill in URL of the recording video of the event after it is done into the event so that it can be shown in the Archive screen for users to see past events.** This is optional.** If Admin enters an URL that is not from youtube, the system needs to ask Admin to upload an event thumbnail to show on the Archive screen.** This field is active for Admin when the event is in the past. Other fields can be modified before the event happens.* Send email for new and modified events to all existing BHT users.{color:#ff5630}*\[AC update]*{color}* The default order is created date of events* Upcoming Events tab: include events on current and future days. Events that have NOT passed their End Times are displayed here.* Past Events tab: include events in the past, meaning events that have passed their End Times are displayed here.*_Event creation_** There are totally 5 fields when creating an event** Event Name** Hosted By** Start Time** End Time** Description* A latest event created is always displayed on the top of Upcoming Events tab.*_Event editing_** In terms of Upcoming events, until the event is done (moving to Past Event tab), I can edit all fields* In terms of Past events, when editing them,** There is a field called Record to display recorded video of streaming** When the video has not been fetched, there is a small message “Processing“.** When the video is fetched succcessfully, display the default thumbnail of that video and duration. ** I only have the ability to update the thumbnail. Other fields can not be edited.

title: BHT Web - Schedule Screen
description: * Acceptance Criteria** Calendar*** The dates that have events are highlighted.***  The default is the current month.*** I can navigate to future months but cannot past months.*** I can select a date to view events of that day.** Event list*** Top section**** Show the events of today by default.**** I can select a date from the calendar to view events of the selected date in this section.**** Show “No event on this day” will be shown if there is no event.*** Bottom section**** It shows all upcomming events always.*** Each event will be shown with the following information.**** Topic (title)**** Date - Start/End time as current browser’s timezone**** Conference URL**** Hosted By**** Description* Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/08b32251-29fe-408e-b3d8-6e9a52073de9-5de0/screen/c8848a63-664b-4d09-978e-e9d6a3d6c91f|https://xd.adobe.com/view/08b32251-29fe-408e-b3d8-6e9a52073de9-5de0/screen/c8848a63-664b-4d09-978e-e9d6a3d6c91f|smart-link]

Size: follow the design{color:#ff5630}\[Update AC]{color}* Viewing details of an upcoming/past event, I could see the following fields:** Event name** Hosted By** Start Time** End Time** Stream URL** Stream Key!image-20210107-093002.png|width=100%!

title: Mobile Apps - Force user to upgrade new version
description: User should be forced to upgrade a new version of the app.+*AC:*+* Information on the pop-up:** Title: Update Version** Content: “_Version_ *\[Version]* _of_ *\[App Name]* _has been released. You have to update to this version to continue using the app._“** Button: *** iOS: Open App Store.*** Android: Open Google Play Store.* When user haven’t logged in yet, the pop-up should be displayed when:** User try to login.** User sign up a new account (at the first step).* When user is using the app, the pop-up should be displayed when they are doing something in the app.* User cannot close the pop-up. They have only 1 option that is updating the version as required.

title: VisiPay - Reserve Accounts - Display Crypto Accounts
description: As a Visipay admin, I want to monitor all Visipay’s Crypto reserve accounts with balances.There is a new left menu which is called "Crypto Wallets". In that function, there are three (3) tabs that are showing the list of reverse accounts and balances which are retrieved from Crypto Server: BTC - 15zckzjK2penH2TfnBUBbG2FnKtGyqvFbtETH - \['0x9c5d1347Ed8f97E557555640558f0f304Ee82F88','0xf401420EB759b1f828b22d7f5d1Eda0330afEf18','0x1EDDA559ef4c6740D6A0CD82cfD5f72661a703E8','0xd6EA59250e1B426a69c225bd6609148116F4775E']ETH MASTER - 0xF3318a3875e96Ae32cC55a029A460b63caA94701KARD - \['0xf0aC46ef659871Db5BbfE364a2A00AA8C29EF700','0x7337EFa8A34cDEeCc2a7470e7F1De68b11850270','0x0bEC650800672F766Cce2D8131B7e8546CF8D208','0x6212E308B60b5bB489702c7A4146E2edFEbf469c','0xA04FC6fd5195BA0a eF42C7e22622733BBe8Cc9FF']KARD MASTER - 0x512D31aaA5A4962e96F93aFbC5550B36243De2D0ZVC - \['0x3e8A415b9657C2382dF03aF21da32fD390D1c606','0xcADb15696D031A0F7d57d7949daC919cbE9d7F00','0x5B370A558BFd14AEBCA3520B96b96aB55A60BD6a','0xaE17a718a494E54438854fbf4Cab15c112bCA359','0x8F708b7C39c3C6125 8C53DFa6F5cB290157FF6FE']ZVC MASTER - 0x03ba17CE15825f3094Acc0Fc748AEB4687092516*Important Note*: * All Crypto addresses are stored at VisiPay’s database for effective maintenance.* Crypto balance will have X digits in decimal (follow the config from Visipay)* We can setup a minimum threshold for each reserve account. If the reserve account balance goes below that amount, the account should be automatically funded to a specified threshold (UI will be updated later)* Each 20 min we will check the balance with the threshold then fund to reserved account if the balance is under the threshold** See updated API document with the new endpoint {{'api/admin/fund_reserve'}} to fund reserve accounts.** When you call the endpoint, the account is funded from the master account. ETH MASTER, ZVC MASTER or KARD MASTER* Admin can add/edit/remove the reserved accounts* We should also display the balances of ETH MASTER, ZVC MASTER or KARD MASTER in Visipay* Allow user to config the amount of auto funding for each address[^Visipay Cryptocurrency API_v_1.0.2.pdf]

title: Web Apps - Wallet PIN - Change and Forgot
description: As a customer I want to be able to change and forgot my wallet PIN that I enter when registering new account with the platform on the mobile and web app.* After signing the app successfully, I have a menu to update my current PIN.** I can only enter 4 digits for new PIN.** Refer to UI of this feature on Kanoo app as the feature is the same.** *Error Messages* *** Invalid current PIN: Current PIN is incorrect.** I can use new PIN after the system informs to save it successfully.* After signing the app successfully, I have a menu to forgot my PIN if I don’t remember my current PIN for some reason.** I expect to be able to forgot my PIN through ether email address like Kanoo app.** Format of email address must be validated as a standard in the system.*** Email format is invalid: Email address has invalid format.*** Email does not exist: Email address has not registered with the platform yet.** I will receive an email with a verification code to enter into the next step if my email address is active.** I will end verification code received in email to process to next step to enter new PIN.** I can use new PIN after the system informs to save it successfully.

title: Web Apps - daVinci MasterCard - View Detail with PIN
description: As a customer  I want to be able to view the detail of mastercard in my wallet in case I lose it for some reason.# I sign in the app/web.# I open an existing mastercard from my wallet and select View Info button.# I must enter PIN that I set when registering my account to be able to view all details of mastercard including full card number and CVV.# If I enter a correct PIN, I can see the details. Otherwise, the system will show error message “You provide an invalid PIN.“ at MasterCard detail screen.# Not allow customers to copy any information from the MasterCard detail.Noted: PIN is the wallet PIN not a master card PIN

title: Create GoldZ Product
description: Create this new HYT GoldZ package on HYT Website with the flow and specifications:1) User will buy this new package at $250, and $7 monthly fee. This new GoldZ is located next to the Gold (attached package and design).2) After bought that package, user will:    a) Receive 1000 ZVC (Internal ZevenCoin Card) immediately. title: User role - Accessibility without KYC verified
description: As a logged-in user who hasn't verified KYC yet.  After entering valid credentials, user can access to insider pages with left menu:1) Dashboard.2) Member Accounts.3) Genealogy.4) Products:  click on the "Select Plan" buttons, then show a message "Please get KYC verified to use this feature." and "Get KYC Verified" button.  Once user clicks on "Get KYC Verified" button, user will be re-directed to the KYC Procedure page.5) Transactions.6) Commissions.7) Account:    a. Account Information:         1. Everything is the same,        2. Except the "Billing Information" tab will show a message "Please get KYC verified to use this feature." and "Get KYC Verified" button.  Once user clicks on "Get KYC Verified" button, user will be re-directed to the KYC Procedure page.    b. Payment:       1. Hide the "Payment Method" tab and Kash HYT Card/Information.       2. Show a message "Please get KYC verified to use this feature." and "Get KYC Verified" button.  Once user clicks on "Get KYC Verified" button, user will be re-directed to the KYC Procedure page.8 ) Invite - Follow up.

title: ARM Campaign - Konnect Category for Video
description: As I merchant I want to be able to create a konnect category to upload videos to show them to customer on store detail of consumer apps.* Keep the current way of saving video files and we will enhance later to make this issue fixed quickly.* Video library for the consumer apps to use will not changed in the scope of this update.
